chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Kneels down and sighs. He picks up some ash as it slowly seeps through his hand and drops to the ground; sadly.] Why would anyone do this? How could I let this happen?
character_words: Why would anyone do this? How could I let this happen?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Aang, you didn't let this happen. It has nothing to do with you.
character_words: Aang, you didn't let this happen. It has nothing to do with you.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Sadly.] Yes, it does. It's the Avatar's job to protect nature. But I don't know how to do my job.
character_words: Yes, it does. It's the Avatar's job to protect nature. But I don't know how to do my job.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: That's why we're going to the North Pole. [Smiling softly.] To find you a teacher.
character_words: That's why we're going to the North Pole.  To find you a teacher.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Yeah. A waterbending teacher. But there's no one who can teach me how to be the Avatar. Monk Gyatso said that Avatar Roku would help me.
character_words: Yeah. A waterbending teacher. But there's no one who can teach me how to be the Avatar. Monk Gyatso said that Avatar Roku would help me.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The Avatar before you? He died over a hundred years ago; how are you supposed to talk to him?
character_words: The Avatar before you? He died over a hundred years ago; how are you supposed to talk to him?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I don't know. [Momo comes up to Aang and settles in his lap.]
character_words: I don't know.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: In another area, Zuko comes looking for Iroh.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Uncle! It's time to leave! Where are you? Uncle Iroh!
character_words: Uncle! It's time to leave! Where are you? Uncle Iroh!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Relaxing in a hot spring.] Over here!
character_words: Over here!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Uncle? We need to move on. We're closing in on the Avatar's trail and I don't want to lose him.
character_words: Uncle? We need to move on. We're closing in on the Avatar's trail and I don't want to lose him.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: You look tired, Prince Zuko. Why don't you join me in these hot springs and soak away your troubles?
character_words: You look tired, Prince Zuko. Why don't you join me in these hot springs and soak away your troubles?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: My troubles cannot be soaked away. It's time to go!
character_words: My troubles cannot be soaked away. It's time to go!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: You should take your teacher's advice and relax a little. The temperature's just right. I heated it myself. [He breathes steam through his nose.]
character_words: You should take your teacher's advice and relax a little. The temperature's just right. I heated it myself.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Enough! We need to leave now. Get out of the water!
character_words: Enough! We need to leave now. Get out of the water!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Very well! [He gets up, exposing himself.]
character_words: Very well!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Shielding his eyes.] On second thought, why don't you take another few minutes? But be back at the ship in a half-hour or I'm leaving without you!
character_words: On second thought, why don't you take another few minutes? But be back at the ship in a half-hour or I'm leaving without you!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text:
Iroh sighs as he slumps back into the water.
The scene returns to the forest.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Approaches Aang.] Hey, Aang! You ready to be cheered up?
character_words: Hey, Aang! You ready to be cheered up?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Sadly.] No. [An acorn is thrown at him.] Ow! Hey, how is that cheering me up?
character_words: No.  Ow! Hey, how is that cheering me up?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Chuckles.] Cheered me up. [An acorn gets thrown at him.] Ow. Yeah, I probably deserved that.
character_words: Cheered me up.  Ow. Yeah, I probably deserved that.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: These acorns are everywhere, Aang. That means the forest will grow back! Every one of these will be a tall oak tree someday, and all the birds and animals that lived here will come back. [She places the acorn in his hand and closes it.]
character_words: These acorns are everywhere, Aang. That means the forest will grow back! Every one of these will be a tall oak tree someday, and all the birds and animals that lived here will come back.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Thanks, Katara.
character_words: Thanks, Katara.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Katara smiles at him before gasping at the sight of an old man approaching.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Hey, who are you?
character_words: Hey, who are you?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: When I saw the flying bison, I thought it was impossible! [Approaches Aang.] But, those markings ... are you the Avatar, child? [Aang look to Katara, who nods. He nods himself.] My village desperately needs your help!
character_words: When I saw the flying bison, I thought it was impossible!  But, those markings ... are you the Avatar, child?  My village desperately needs your help!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The scene cuts to them at Senlin Village at sunset. The village has been partially destroyed. The wanderer leads them into the center building.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: This young person is the Avatar!
character_words: This young person is the Avatar!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: So, the rumors of your return are true! It is the greatest honor of a lifetime to be in your presence.
character_words: So, the rumors of your return are true! It is the greatest honor of a lifetime to be in your presence.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Nice to meet you too! So ... is there something I can help you with?
character_words: Nice to meet you too! So ... is there something I can help you with?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I'm not sure ...
character_words: I'm not sure ...

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Our village is in crisis, he's our only hope! [To Aang.] For the last few days at sunset, a spirit monster comes and attacks our village. He is Hei Bai, the black and white spirit.
character_words: Our village is in crisis, he's our only hope!  For the last few days at sunset, a spirit monster comes and attacks our village. He is Hei Bai, the black and white spirit.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Why is it attacking you?
character_words: Why is it attacking you?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: We do not know, but each of the last three nights, he has abducted one of our own. We are especially fearful because the winter solstice draws near.
character_words: We do not know, but each of the last three nights, he has abducted one of our own. We are especially fearful because the winter solstice draws near.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: What happens then?
character_words: What happens then?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: As the solstice approaches, the natural world and the Spirit World grow closer and closer until the line between them is blurred completely.
character_words: As the solstice approaches, the natural world and the Spirit World grow closer and closer until the line between them is blurred completely.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Hei Bai is already causing devastation and destruction. Once the solstice is here, there's no telling what will happen.
character_words: Hei Bai is already causing devastation and destruction. Once the solstice is here, there's no telling what will happen.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: So, what do you want me to do, exactly?
character_words: So, what do you want me to do, exactly?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Who better to resolve a crisis between our world and the Spirit World than the Avatar himself? You are the great bridge between man and spirits.
character_words: Who better to resolve a crisis between our world and the Spirit World than the Avatar himself? You are the great bridge between man and spirits.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Right ... that's me.
character_words: Right ... that's me.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Hey great bridge guy, could I talk to you over here for a second? [She leads him toward a window.] Aang, you seem a little unsure about all of this.
character_words: Hey great bridge guy, could I talk to you over here for a second?  Aang, you seem a little unsure about all of this.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Yeah, that might be because I don't know anything at all about the Spirit World. It's not like there's someone to teach me this stuff!
character_words: Yeah, that might be because I don't know anything at all about the Spirit World. It's not like there's someone to teach me this stuff!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: So ... can you help these people?
character_words: So ... can you help these people?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I have to try, don't I? Maybe whatever I have to do will just ... come to me. [Momo lands on his shoulder.]
character_words: I have to try, don't I? Maybe whatever I have to do will just ... come to me.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [With a kind and reassuring smile.] I think you can do it, Aang.
character_words: I think you can do it, Aang.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [With a similar expression.] Yeah. [Brief pause.] We're all going to get eaten by a spirit monster.
character_words: Yeah.  We're all going to get eaten by a spirit monster.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Cut back to the hot spring. A sleeping Iroh is awoken by nearby stirring in the trees.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Who's there? [He sees a rat-like animal.] A meadow vole! I should have known. [He takes the creature into the palm of his hand.] You startled me, little one. [Sighs.] It seems I dozed off and missed my nephew's deadline, but it was a very sweet nap.
character_words: Who's there?  A meadow vole! I should have known.  You startled me, little one.  It seems I dozed off and missed my nephew's deadline, but it was a very sweet nap.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The meadow vole leaps up and down. This is followed by shaking and the ground moving toward Iroh. Suddenly, the rock at the bottom of the spring jumps up, capturing him. Three Earth Kingdom soldiers surround him.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Picks up Iroh's clothes.] He's a Fire Nation soldier.
character_words: He's a Fire Nation soldier.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: He's no ordinary soldier. This is the Fire Lord's brother, the Dragon of the West. The once-great General Iroh, but now, he's our prisoner.
character_words: He's no ordinary soldier. This is the Fire Lord's brother, the Dragon of the West. The once-great General Iroh, but now, he's our prisoner.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text:
Iroh gives the captain a stern look.
Cut back to Senlin, near sunset. Aang steps outside the center building and awaits the Hei Bai.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Walking toward the village entrance.] Hello, Spirit? Can you hear me? This is the Avatar speaking. I'm here to try to help stuff.
character_words: Hello, Spirit? Can you hear me? This is the Avatar speaking. I'm here to try to help stuff.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Cut to the building interior. Sokka and Katara watch.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: This isn't right. We can't sit here and cower while Aang waits for some monster to show up.
character_words: This isn't right. We can't sit here and cower while Aang waits for some monster to show up.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: If anyone can save us, he can.
character_words: If anyone can save us, he can.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: He still shouldn't have to face this alone.
character_words: He still shouldn't have to face this alone.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The sun sets and night falls. Cut back to Aang.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The sun has set. Where are you, Hei Bai? Well ... spirit ... uhhh ... I hereby ask you to please leave this village in peace. [He spins his staff and sticks it down, in apparent authority.] Okay ... well ... I guess that's settled, then.
character_words: The sun has set. Where are you, Hei Bai? Well ... spirit ... uhhh ... I hereby ask you to please leave this village in peace.  Okay ... well ... I guess that's settled, then.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: He walks away. Behind him, however, the Hei Bai fades into the real world. He walks right behind Aang, who turns to see him.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: You must be the Hei Bai spirit. My name is–
character_words: You must be the Hei Bai spirit. My name is–

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The spirit releases a burst of energy at him. It moves past him.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: My name's Aang! I'm the Avatar and I would like to help. Hey, wait up! [Hei Bai wreaks havoc, smashing buildings and destroying a tower with energy.] Uhhh.
character_words: My name's Aang! I'm the Avatar and I would like to help. Hey, wait up!  Uhhh.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The Avatar's methods are ... unusual.
character_words: The Avatar's methods are ... unusual.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: It doesn't seem too interested in what he's saying. Maybe we should go help him.
character_words: It doesn't seem too interested in what he's saying. Maybe we should go help him.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: No. Only the Avatar stands a chance against the Hei Bai.
character_words: No. Only the Avatar stands a chance against the Hei Bai.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Aang will figure out the right thing to do, Sokka.
character_words: Aang will figure out the right thing to do, Sokka.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Hei Bai smashes another building.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Please, would you stop destroying things and listen? I'm trying to do my job as spirit bridge! Excuse me, would please turn around? I command you to turn around now!
character_words: Please, would you stop destroying things and listen? I'm trying to do my job as spirit bridge! Excuse me, would please turn around? I command you to turn around now!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The spirit hits Aang and sends him flying to the roof of another building.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: That's it. He needs help. [Exits the building.]
character_words: That's it. He needs help.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Sokka, wait! [Starts to follow him.]
character_words: Sokka, wait!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Stops her.] It's not safe!
character_words: It's not safe!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Hei Bai, over here! [He throws his boomerang at him, but it barely affects the monster. He runs toward it.]
character_words: Hei Bai, over here!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Sokka, go back!
character_words: Sokka, go back!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: We'll fight him together, Aang.
character_words: We'll fight him together, Aang.

full_text: I don't want to fight him unless I– [Sokka is taken by the Hei Bai, and the spirit flees. Aang chases it.]
character_words: I don't want to fight him unless I–

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Running to the village entrance.] Sokka! [The villagers go the entrance as well. Katara is left standing fearful.]

full_text: Back near the hot spring. Two soldiers and Zuko look for Iroh.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Uncle! Uncle, where are you?
character_words: Uncle! Uncle, where are you?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Sir, maybe he thought you left without him.
character_words: Sir, maybe he thought you left without him.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Something's not right here. That pile of rocks.
character_words: Something's not right here. That pile of rocks.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: It looks like there's been a landslide, sir.
character_words: It looks like there's been a landslide, sir.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Land doesn't slide uphill. Those rocks didn't move naturally. [Stands up straight.] My Uncle's been captured by earthbenders!
character_words: Land doesn't slide uphill. Those rocks didn't move naturally.  My Uncle's been captured by earthbenders!

full_text: Back to the forest. Aang continues to pursue the Hei Bai, looking for Sokka.

full_text: Aang! Over here! Help!

full_text: Hang on, Sokka!
character_words: Hang on, Sokka!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text:
Aang pulls out his hand, trying to free Sokka. However, before he can grab him, the spirit fades away, taking Sokka with it. Aang falls in front of a bear-like statue, knocked out.
A couple of hours later, Aang awakens.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Sokka! [He realizes Sokka is nowhere to be seen.] I failed.
character_words: Sokka!  I failed.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The next scene cuts back to the soldiers who captured Iroh. They are riding ostrich horses. One soldier carries a torch with him for light.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Where are you taking me?
character_words: Where are you taking me?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: We're taking you to face justice.
character_words: We're taking you to face justice.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Right, but where, specifically?
character_words: Right, but where, specifically?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: A place you're quite familiar with, actually. You once laid siege to it for 600 days, but it would not yield to you.
character_words: A place you're quite familiar with, actually. You once laid siege to it for 600 days, but it would not yield to you.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Ah, the great city of Ba Sing Se.
character_words: Ah, the great city of Ba Sing Se.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: It was greater than you were, apparently.
character_words: It was greater than you were, apparently.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I acknowledge my defeat at Ba Sing Se. After 600 days away from home, my men were tired, and I was tired. [Yawns.] And I'm still tired. [He falls off one of the horses. He is quickly picked back up. However, he leaves one of his sandals behind and smiles cleverly.]
character_words: I acknowledge my defeat at Ba Sing Se. After 600 days away from home, my men were tired, and I was tired.  And I'm still tired.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Cut back to Senlin Village. Katara awaits at the village entrance for Sokka and Aang. The Old wanderer approaches her.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I'm sure they'll be back.
character_words: I'm sure they'll be back.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I know.
character_words: I know.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Places a blanket around her.] You should get some rest.
character_words: You should get some rest.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Everything's going to be okay ...
character_words: Everything's going to be okay ...

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Your brother is in good hands. I would be shocked if the Avatar returned without him. [As he is speaking, Aang approaches.]
character_words: Your brother is in good hands. I would be shocked if the Avatar returned without him.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Katara? Katara, I lost him.
character_words: Katara? Katara, I lost him.

full_text: The sun rises.

full_text: The sun is rising. Perhaps he will return soon.

full_text: [His appearance is blue.] What? No, I'm right here! [He waves his hand in the Wanderer's face, only to notice his own appearance.] I'm in the Spirit World!
character_words: What? No, I'm right here!  I'm in the Spirit World!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Cut back to the forest. Zuko comes up on Iroh's sandal.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: [Sniffs and gets a disgusted look.] Yeah, that's Uncle Iroh. [He re-mounts his rhino.]

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Back at the Village.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I'll figure this out, Katara. I promise. Like they said, I'm the bridge between the worlds, right? All I have to do is ... figure out what I have to do. But once I do that, no problem. [Appa approaches.] Appa! Hey buddy, I'm right here! [He breathes on Katara.] But, I guess you can't see me either.
character_words: I'll figure this out, Katara. I promise. Like they said, I'm the bridge between the worlds, right? All I have to do is ... figure out what I have to do. But once I do that, no problem.  Appa! Hey buddy, I'm right here!  But, I guess you can't see me either.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: It's okay, Appa, don't worry. I'm sure they're on their way back. I bet they even found you a bunch of moon peaches for a treat. [The two return the village.]
character_words: It's okay, Appa, don't worry. I'm sure they're on their way back. I bet they even found you a bunch of moon peaches for a treat.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: What am I supposed to do? Avatar Roku, how can I talk to you? [He hears something.] Sokka? [He notices a dragon coming toward him.] That's definitely not Sokka. [He tries to fly away but cannot. He notices his airbending is not working at all.] What? I can't airbend in the Spirit World. [The dragon lands just before him.] You don't know where Sokka is, do you? [The dragon touches him. He sees a vision of Roku flying on this dragon.] You're Avatar Roku's animal guide! Like Appa is to me! I need to save my friend and I don't know how! Is there some way for me to talk to Roku? [The dragon curls around him, and he gets on him.] I'll be back, Katara. [It gets up.] Take me to Roku! [The dragon flies away.]
character_words: What am I supposed to do? Avatar Roku, how can I talk to you?  Sokka?  That's definitely not Sokka.  What? I can't airbend in the Spirit World.  You don't know where Sokka is, do you?  You're Avatar Roku's animal guide! Like Appa is to me! I need to save my friend and I don't know how! Is there some way for me to talk to Roku?  I'll be back, Katara.  Take me to Roku!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Cut to a mountain the earthbenders are leading Iroh through. Iroh looks at the skies and notices the dragon and Aang. He gasps in wonder.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: What's the problem?
character_words: What's the problem?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Nothing. [Pauses.] Actually, there is a bit of a problem. My old joints are sore and aching, and these shackles are too loose.
character_words: Nothing.  Actually, there is a bit of a problem. My old joints are sore and aching, and these shackles are too loose.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Too loose?
character_words: Too loose?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: That's right. The cuffs move and jangle around and bump my wrists. It would help me if you tighten them so they wouldn't shake around so much.
character_words: That's right. The cuffs move and jangle around and bump my wrists. It would help me if you tighten them so they wouldn't shake around so much.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Very well. Corporal, tighten the prisoner's handcuffs.
character_words: Very well. Corporal, tighten the prisoner's handcuffs.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text:
They all stop. The corporal dismounts and moves to Iroh. As he touches his handcuffs, Iroh breathes deeply and heats them up. He pushes the corporal's hand to the cuffs, causing him to scream in pain. Iroh jumps free and blasts fire at the soldiers. He rolls down the hill as the soldiers try to get control of their ostrich horses.
Cut back to Aang and Fang. Fang takes him to a temple on an unknown island. He flies into the temple and toward the roof.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Hey, what are you doing? [He screams, but they fly right through the roof and into a mysterious room. Within is a celestial calendar and a statue of Roku.] I don't understand, this is just a statue of Roku. [Fang presses one of his feelers to Aang's forehead. A vision of a comet appears to him.] Is that what Roku wants to talk to me about? A comet? When can I talk to him? [Fang moves his head, allowing a light beam to appear. This is just to the right of Roku's statue. With another feeler press, he sees a vision of the sun setting and rising repeatedly, and the light closing in on Roku.] It's a calendar, and the light will reach Roku on the solstice! So, that's when I'll be able to speak to Roku? [The dragon breathes an apparent yes.] But I can't wait that long! I need to save Sokka now! [The dragon takes Aang from the temple.]
character_words: Hey, what are you doing?  I don't understand, this is just a statue of Roku.  Is that what Roku wants to talk to me about? A comet? When can I talk to him?  It's a calendar, and the light will reach Roku on the solstice! So, that's when I'll be able to speak to Roku?  But I can't wait that long! I need to save Sokka now!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Cut back to Iroh rolling down the hill. One of the soldiers hits him with a rockslide. All of the soldiers chase after him, reaching him at the bottom of the hill.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: He's too dangerous, Captain! We just can't just carry him to the Capital! We have to do something now!
character_words: He's too dangerous, Captain! We just can't just carry him to the Capital! We have to do something now!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I agree. He must be dealt with immediately and severely.
character_words: I agree. He must be dealt with immediately and severely.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text:
Iroh spits a rock out.
Meanwhile, Katara is flying on Appa over the forest.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: It's no use, Appa. I don't seem them anywhere. Our best hope is to go back to the village and wait. [She re-directs Appa to the village's direction.]
character_words: It's no use, Appa. I don't seem them anywhere. Our best hope is to go back to the village and wait.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: While following the ostrich horse footprints, Zuko notices Appa.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The Avatar! [He turns slightly, but looks back at the footprints.]
character_words: The Avatar!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text:
Fang takes Aang back to the statue at fast speed. Aang notices his body is there and also prepares for impact. Suddenly, Fang disappears into the statue and Aang is returned to his body. He looks around at the statue, opens his glider, and flies back to the village.
Cut to the village, sunset. Katara stands outside the center building and notices Aang's return. Aang lands and Katara runs to him.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: You're back! [She embraces Aang.] Where's Sokka?
character_words: You're back!  Where's Sokka?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I'm not sure ...
character_words: I'm not sure ...

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text:
The evening gives way to night. 
Back to Iroh, who is surrounded by the soldiers.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: These dangerous hands must be crushed. [He brings up and prepares to drop it. However, Zuko jumps in and kicks the rock away before breaking Iroh's chain with his boot.]
character_words: These dangerous hands must be crushed.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Excellent form, Prince Zuko.
character_words: Excellent form, Prince Zuko.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: You taught me well.
character_words: You taught me well.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Surrender yourselves. It's five against two. You're clearly outnumbered.
character_words: Surrender yourselves. It's five against two. You're clearly outnumbered.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Yeah, that's true, but you are clearly outmatched.
character_words: Yeah, that's true, but you are clearly outmatched.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The solders fire rocks, but Iroh destroys them with the chains. Zuko takes out two soldiers with fire. A rock is fired at him, but Iroh catches it and throws it back at the soldiers, knocking them down. The Captain fires three rocks at Zuko, which he dodges. Zuko counters with fire blasts that are dodged. The captain brings up a large mass of rock, however, Iroh throws his chains around his ankles, knocking him and causing the rocks to fall on top of him. The soldiers are heard groaning underneath the rocks.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Now would you please put on some clothes?
character_words: Now would you please put on some clothes?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Cut back to Senlin. Aang awaits at the entrance for the Hei Bai. After some time, he gives up and returns to the center building. Just as he exits, however, the spirit appears to his left. He throws up an air shield to stop its attack.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Aang, what are you doing?! Run!
character_words: Aang, what are you doing?! Run!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The spirit prepares to resume its attack when Aang jumps in front of it. He feels its forehead and notices that a panda lurks below it.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: You're the spirit of this forest! Now I understand. You're upset and angry because your home was burned down. When I saw the forest had burned, I was sad and upset, but my friend gave me hope that the forest would grow back. [He shows it the acorn and leaves it at his feet. The spirit picks it up and reverts to the panda form. It walks away peacefully. As it exits, a series of branches grow, and three villagers and Sokka emerge from it.]
character_words: You're the spirit of this forest! Now I understand. You're upset and angry because your home was burned down. When I saw the forest had burned, I was sad and upset, but my friend gave me hope that the forest would grow back.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Sokka! [She runs to him and embraces him, while other villagers embrace their loved ones.]
character_words: Sokka!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: What happened?
character_words: What happened?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: You were trapped in the Spirit World for 24 hours! How are you feeling?
character_words: You were trapped in the Spirit World for 24 hours! How are you feeling?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Like I seriously need to use the bathroom. [Katara gives Sokka a somewhat disgusted look.]
character_words: Like I seriously need to use the bathroom.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Thank you, Avatar. If only there were a way to repay you for what you've done.
character_words: Thank you, Avatar. If only there were a way to repay you for what you've done.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: You could give us some supplies, and some money.
character_words: You could give us some supplies, and some money.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Sokka!
character_words: Sokka!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: What? We need stuff.
character_words: What? We need stuff.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: It would be an honor to help you prepare for your journey.
character_words: It would be an honor to help you prepare for your journey.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I'm so proud of you, Aang. You figured out what to do, all on your own.
character_words: I'm so proud of you, Aang. You figured out what to do, all on your own.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Actually, I did have a little help and there's something else.
character_words: Actually, I did have a little help and there's something else.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: What is it?
character_words: What is it?

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: I need to talk to Roku and I think I found a way to contact his spirit.
character_words: I need to talk to Roku and I think I found a way to contact his spirit.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: That's great!
character_words: That's great!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Creepy, but great.
character_words: Creepy, but great.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: There's a temple on a crescent-shaped island and if I go there on the solstice, I'll be able to speak with him.
character_words: There's a temple on a crescent-shaped island and if I go there on the solstice, I'll be able to speak with him.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: But the solstice is tomorrow!
character_words: But the solstice is tomorrow!

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Yeah, and there's one more problem. The island is in the Fire Nation.
character_words: Yeah, and there's one more problem. The island is in the Fire Nation.

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: The siblings grow fearful. The shot slowly moves up to the moon over the hills.
character_words: NA

chapter: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
full_text: Fade to credits.

full_text: The scene opens to a full moon in the sky. The camera pans down and shows Senlin Village during early morning hours. Cut to a view from among the houses, slowly zooming in on Aang who tries to get Appa to move, yanking on the reins, though the bison continually refuses and sits down.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Strained voice.] Let's go, Appa! Come on, boy! [Appa roars in protest and sits down. Cut to a close side-view; Aang sadly addresses his pet.] Look I'm sorry, but Katara and Sokka aren't coming to the Fire Nation with us. [Frontal shot; looks down and away, sadly.] If they got hurt, I'd never forgive myself. [Cut back to the side-shot; sternly, emphasizing his command by straightening himself.] So get your big butt off the ground and let's go!
character_words: Let's go, Appa! Come on, boy!  Look I'm sorry, but Katara and Sokka aren't coming to the Fire Nation with us.  If they got hurt, I'd never forgive myself.  So get your big butt off the ground and let's go!

full_text: He jerks at the reins, stretching them out, but is flung to the ground when the ropes pull him back as Appa did not move a muscle. Cut to a forlorn looking Aang, sitting spread-legged on the ground.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Voice-over; Aang gasps in surprise and looks over his right shoulder and over his left, turning around in search for the origins of the voice.] I think his big butt is trying to tell ya something.
character_words: I think his big butt is trying to tell ya something.

full_text: Cut to a frontal shot of Appa as the camera swiftly pans to the right to reveal a collection of Senlin villagers, with Katara and Sokka standing in the front.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Desperately.] Please don't go Aang. The world can't afford to lose you to the Fire Nation. [Closer shot of Katara's pleading face.] Neither can I.
character_words: Please don't go Aang. The world can't afford to lose you to the Fire Nation.  Neither can I.

full_text: [Looks away sadly and recalls an image of Sozin's Comet.] But I have to talk to Avatar Roku to find out what my vision means! [Side-shot as he approaches his friends.] I need to get to the Fire Temple before the sun sets on the solstice. That's today!
character_words: But I have to talk to Avatar Roku to find out what my vision means!  I need to get to the Fire Temple before the sun sets on the solstice. That's today!

full_text: Aang airbends himself atop Appa's head. Close shot of him looking back with a sad expression on his face as he prepares to leave. As Appa stands up, the shot changes to a frontal view, and Katara and Sokka run to stand before the bison, preventing him from moving any further.
character_words: NA

full_text: We're not letting you go into the Fire Nation, Aang.
character_words: We're not letting you go into the Fire Nation, Aang.

full_text: [Aang stares curiously.] At least, not without your friends. We got your back. [Momo soars up and perches atop Aang's shoulder, and Appa licks Sokka, who angrily looks at the bison.] Ew!
character_words: At least, not without your friends. We got your back.  Ew!

full_text: It's a long journey to the Crescent Island. [Hands Aang a small bundle.] You'll have to fly fast to have any chance of making it before sundown. Good luck.
character_words: It's a long journey to the Crescent Island.  You'll have to fly fast to have any chance of making it before sundown. Good luck.

full_text: Thank you for your-
character_words: Thank you for your-

full_text: [Interrupts sharply, yelling. Points toward the ocean.] Go!
character_words: Go!

full_text: Appa takes off with Aang, Momo, Katara, and Sokka. Later that morning, the Senlin Village leader exits a building, but he stops in his track upon finding Zuko standing in his path. In the background, Iroh is sitting on a komodo rhino.
character_words: NA

full_text: [The Senlin Village leader gasps.] Having trouble sleeping? [Pushes the man back through the door, knocking him down. Frontal shot as he approaches him.] Seen the Avatar lately?
character_words: Having trouble sleeping?  Seen the Avatar lately?

full_text: Day has come. Appa soars over the ocean. Aang, Katara, and Sokka all watch the ocean fearfully.
character_words: NA

full_text: Come on boy, we've got a long way to go. Faster!
character_words: Come on boy, we've got a long way to go. Faster!

full_text: [Close-up.] Sailing into Fire Nation waters ... Of all the foolish things you've done in your sixteen years, Prince Zuko, this is the most foolish!
character_words: Sailing into Fire Nation waters ... Of all the foolish things you've done in your sixteen years, Prince Zuko, this is the most foolish!

full_text: I have no choice, Uncle.
character_words: I have no choice, Uncle.

full_text: [Angrily.] Have you completely forgotten that the Fire Lord banished you? [Fearfully.] What if you're caught?
character_words: Have you completely forgotten that the Fire Lord banished you?  What if you're caught?

full_text: [Breaks away from telescope to talk to his uncle.] I'm chasing the Avatar! My father will understand why I am returning home!
character_words: I'm chasing the Avatar! My father will understand why I am returning home!

full_text: You give him too much credit. My brother is not the understanding type!
character_words: You give him too much credit. My brother is not the understanding type!

full_text: [Looks back into his telescope. Dark scope view reveals Appa mid-flight.] There they are. Helmsman! Full steam ahead!
character_words: There they are. Helmsman! Full steam ahead!

full_text: [Looking back to Zuko's ship.] Aang. We've got trouble!
character_words: Aang. We've got trouble!

full_text: [Panicked.] Yeah! And it's gaining, fast!
character_words: Yeah! And it's gaining, fast!

full_text: A Fire Nation catapult is raised to the deck of Zuko's ship. It is loaded with a steaming projectile.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Waving a fan at his face.] Uh, really Prince Zuko, couldn't you shoot them down with something more fragrant?
character_words: Uh, really Prince Zuko, couldn't you shoot them down with something more fragrant?

full_text: [Lights the stinking ball with a fire punch.] On my mark! Fire!
character_words: On my mark! Fire!

full_text: A guard beside him slices the rope holding back the catapult. The flaming projectile races toward Appa.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Yelling.] Fireball!
character_words: Fireball!

full_text: I'm on it!
character_words: I'm on it!

full_text: [Aang, Katara, and Sokka all make faces and grasp their noses.] We have to get out of Zuko's range, before he shoots another hot stinker at us!
character_words: We have to get out of Zuko's range, before he shoots another hot stinker at us!

full_text: Can't you make Appa go any faster?
character_words: Can't you make Appa go any faster?

full_text: Yeah. But there's just one little problem.
character_words: Yeah. But there's just one little problem.

full_text: [Close-up. Eyes widening.] A blockade.
character_words: A blockade.

full_text: Birds-eye view of a two-row line of Fire Nation ships stretching across the ocean as far as the eye can see. Brief glimpse of numerous Fire Nation catapults prepared to fire.
character_words: NA

full_text: Technically you are still in Earth Kingdom waters. Turn back now and they cannot arrest you.
character_words: Technically you are still in Earth Kingdom waters. Turn back now and they cannot arrest you.

full_text: If we fly north, we can go around the Fire Nation ships and avoid the blockade! It's the only way.
character_words: If we fly north, we can go around the Fire Nation ships and avoid the blockade! It's the only way.

full_text: There's no time!
character_words: There's no time!

full_text: This is exactly why I didn't want you to come! It's too dangerous!
character_words: This is exactly why I didn't want you to come! It's too dangerous!

full_text: And that's exactly why we're here.
character_words: And that's exactly why we're here.

full_text: [Boldly.] Let's run this blockade! [Both Katara and Sokka grin confidently.]
character_words: Let's run this blockade!

full_text: Appa, yip-yip! [Appa roars readily, sailing forward even quicker.]
character_words: Appa, yip-yip!

full_text: He's not turning around!
character_words: He's not turning around!

full_text: Please Prince Zuko! If the Fire Nation captures you, there is nothing I can do! Do not follow the Avatar.
character_words: Please Prince Zuko! If the Fire Nation captures you, there is nothing I can do! Do not follow the Avatar.

full_text: [Lowers his head, closes his eyes, and clenches his hands into fists. Sorrowfully.] I'm sorry, Uncle. [Raises his head, opens his eyes, and thrusts his right hand forward commandingly.] Run the blockade!
character_words: I'm sorry, Uncle.  Run the blockade!

full_text: [Gazing through telescope.] The Avatar. [Lowers telescope lens to spot Zuko's ship.] And the banished prince. [Lowers telescope.] This must be my lucky day.
character_words: The Avatar.  And the banished prince.  This must be my lucky day.

full_text: Commander Zhao. What are your orders?
character_words: Commander Zhao. What are your orders?

full_text: Shoot the bison down, captain.
character_words: Shoot the bison down, captain.

full_text: [Surprised.] But there's a Fire Navy ship out there, sir! One of our own! What if it's hit?
character_words: But there's a Fire Navy ship out there, sir! One of our own! What if it's hit?

full_text: So be it. [Captain backs up in shock. Zhao continues coolly.] It belongs to a traitor. [Command.] Ignite. Launch!
character_words: So be it.  It belongs to a traitor.  Ignite. Launch!

full_text: The sky becomes littered with flaming fireballs fired from the blockade. View from Zuko's ship as the fireballs fill the sky. Close-up of a screaming Aang, Sokka, and Katara. Zoom out as Appa evades numerous fireballs, some exploding mid-air. Camera switch to forward view, close-up, as they fly through a blanket of fireballs. The team flies directly through one that exploded before them, Appa's fur darkened from the explosion. Katara, Sokka, and Momo all slap out embers on Appa's fur.
character_words: NA

full_text: Appa, are you okay? [Appa roars a reply. They soar higher into the clouds.]
character_words: Appa, are you okay?

full_text: On the ocean surface, Zuko's ship is narrowly missing many falling fireballs. Sheets of ocean water crash over the ship, and crew members run for safety. A single fireball explodes on the aft side of the vessel.
character_words: NA

full_text: Prince Zuko! The engines are damaged! We need to stop and make repairs!
character_words: Prince Zuko! The engines are damaged! We need to stop and make repairs!

full_text: [Spins away from the man, facing the blockade.] Do not stop this ship.
character_words: Do not stop this ship.

full_text: Launch!
character_words: Launch!

full_text: Close-up of Aang's view. Just over a cloud; fireballs burst through everywhere and smoke fills the screen. Aang, Katara, and Sokka scream and duck away, while Katara and Sokka grip Appa's saddle. Appa dodges many fireballs before two collide and explode in front of him. Sokka is thrown from the saddle and begins to plunge for the ocean, screaming anew.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Cries out desperately.] Sokka! [Whips the reins down and begins a speedy descent in chase of Sokka.]
character_words: Sokka!

full_text: Appa reaches Sokka just in time. Katara grabs his hand, pulling him back into saddle. Appa skims the ocean surface. A fish appears out of nowhere and slaps Sokka square in the face, knocking him into the saddle. Momo leaps up and grabs the fish as Appa continues his swift flight mere feet above the ocean. Fireballs crash into the water all around them.
character_words: NA

full_text: Ready ... [Holds hand up, issuing his command.]
character_words: Ready ...

full_text: Close-up of Appa's view, approaching the ships. Camera switch once to Zhao, moving to prepare the signal. Back to Aang, a look of obstinate determination overcomes him.
character_words: NA

full_text: Fire!
character_words: Fire!

full_text: A single catapult launches a fire blast directly toward Appa. Close-up of Aang's eye as it snaps open, unafraid. Aang airbends forward off of Appa's head. He uses a powerful airbending kick, and the flaming boulder explodes in a large smoky blast. Aang falls back to Appa's head, Katara and Sokka grabbing him. Appa soars safely over the blockade, passing them.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Ecstatic.] We made it!
character_words: We made it!

full_text: [Katara and Sokka each grimacing in terror.] We got into the Fire Nation. [Meekly.] Great.
character_words: We got into the Fire Nation.  Great.

full_text: Where do you think the Avatar is headed, sir?
character_words: Where do you think the Avatar is headed, sir?

full_text: I'm not sure. [Turns aside, gazes at Zuko's smoking ship.] But I bet a certain banished prince will know.
character_words: I'm not sure.  But I bet a certain banished prince will know.

full_text: Scene switch to just overhead Zuko's ship. His small vessel approaches two ships in the blockade. These two ships sail opposite directions, in a moment they will close off Zuko's ship's path.
character_words: NA

full_text: We're on a collision course!
character_words: We're on a collision course!

full_text: [Confidently.] We can make it!
character_words: We can make it!

full_text: [Captain stands ahead of a squad of nine firebenders.] The boarding party is ready to apprehend Prince Zuko, sir.
character_words: The boarding party is ready to apprehend Prince Zuko, sir.

full_text: [Swiftly.] Wait! Cut the engines, and let them pass.
character_words: Wait! Cut the engines, and let them pass.

full_text: Sir?
character_words: Sir?

full_text: Each ship in the blockade halts, allowing Zuko's ship to glide by beneath their deck, untouched. Zhao stands high, sharing an interlocked gaze with the banished prince below. Zuko and Iroh look behind them in silence as they sail safely through. Iroh strokes his gray beard curiously.
character_words: NA

full_text:
The scene cuts back to Appa, flying among blue skies. Sokka and Katara sit up in the saddle, while Aang sits on Appa's head.
The scene changes to Sokka slumped in the back of the saddle. Katara is leaning her arms over the front of the saddle, and Aang is lounging against Appa's neck.
The sky has changed to a darker, sunset-filled evening. Appa is visibly tired. Aang is sprawled over Appa's head with Momo equally sprawled over Aang's head. Katara and Sokka have each collapsed into the saddle.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Close-up. Momo is shown bouncing about in eager surprise.] There it is! [Sokka and Katara pop up in the saddle.] The island where Roku's dragon took me. [Full view of Crescent Island and its smoking volcano as Appa descends.]
character_words: There it is!  The island where Roku's dragon took me.

full_text: Appa is lying at the base of a stone bridge leading up to the island's mountain. The bridge ends at an elegant, multi-story Fire Temple. Lava is flowing beneath the bridge. The air is thick with steam. Aang stands by Appa's head, and Katara stands to Appa's side. Sokka is stretching further away.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Rubs against Appa's head.] You did it buddy. Nice flying. [Appa bellows in satisfaction, rolling to his side to wave his three legs into the air lazily. Appa's tongue lolls out.]
character_words: You did it buddy. Nice flying.

full_text: [Smiles sweetly and approaches Appa. Rubs his belly.] Aww, you must be tired.
character_words: Aww, you must be tired.

full_text: [Joyous. Katara's expresses dumbfounded interest.] No! I'm good. Refreshed and ready to fight some firebenders! [Continues to work out and flex his body.]
character_words: No! I'm good. Refreshed and ready to fight some firebenders!

full_text: [Props hand off hip. Responds dryly.] I was talking to Appa.
character_words: I was talking to Appa.

full_text: [Instantly halts exercise.] Well ... I was talking to Momo. [Points to the lemur clinging to a dead tree's branch.]
character_words: Well ... I was talking to Momo.

full_text: Scene cut to Katara, Sokka, Aang, and Momo walking along the stone bridge to approach a multi-story Fire Temple.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Close-up, top-to-bottom view of the Fire Temple.] I don't see any guards.
character_words: I don't see any guards.

full_text: [Camera drops to show the group taking cover behind a lower wall below steps.] The Fire Nation must have abandoned the temple when Avatar Roku died.
character_words: The Fire Nation must have abandoned the temple when Avatar Roku died.

full_text: It's almost sundown. We better hurry! [The group leaps over the wall and charges for the front door.]
character_words: It's almost sundown. We better hurry!

full_text: [The group tip-toes through an enormous chamber with fire-decor columns.] Wait. I think I heard something.
character_words: Wait. I think I heard something.

full_text: [Turning around, they see five men standing in the hallway dressed in red with tall hats.] We are the Fire Sages. Guardians of the temple of the Avatar.
character_words: We are the Fire Sages. Guardians of the temple of the Avatar.

full_text: Great! I am the Avatar!
character_words: Great! I am the Avatar!

full_text: We know. [Inhales briskly before punching a blast of fire their direction.]
character_words: We know.

full_text: [Deflects three balls of fire with his airbending. Close-up. Shouts over his shoulder.] I'll hold them off. Run!
character_words: I'll hold them off. Run!

full_text: Aang leaps forward and spins his leg across the ground, sending a low air blade that sweeps the Fire Sages' legs out from beneath them, and they all fall to the ground. Aang flees after his friends.
character_words: NA

full_text: If the Avatar contacts Roku, there's no telling how powerful the boy will become! Split up and find him.
character_words: If the Avatar contacts Roku, there's no telling how powerful the boy will become! Split up and find him.

full_text: [Hallway view; Aang skids in front of Katara and Sokka and continues running.] Follow me!
character_words: Follow me!

full_text: Do you know where you're going? [The two follow Aang.]
character_words: Do you know where you're going?

full_text: [Rounds a corner and disappears from sight.] Nope! [A moment passes, Katara and Sokka stop when Aang skids into view again. Fearfully.] Wrong way! [Runs past them.]
character_words: Nope!  Wrong way!

full_text: [Rounds the corner, frightening Sokka and Katara to chase after Aang.] Come back!
character_words: Come back!

full_text: The trio turns another corner and charges down the hallway. However, they reach a dead-end as Aang skids to an immediate halt. Turning around, they face Shyu, who raises a hand in peace.
character_words: NA

full_text: I don't want to fight you! I am a friend.
character_words: I don't want to fight you! I am a friend.

full_text: Firebenders aren't our friends! [Aang steps ahead of his friends, assuming an airbending posture.]
character_words: Firebenders aren't our friends!

full_text: [Steps toward the Avatar, before dropping to his knees and pressing his palms to the floor in submission. This startles Aang, Katara, and Sokka.] I know why you're here, Avatar.
character_words: I know why you're here, Avatar.

full_text: [Surprised.] You do?
character_words: You do?

full_text: Yes. [Rises from the floor to stand again.] You wish to speak to Avatar Roku. I can take you to him.
character_words: Yes.  You wish to speak to Avatar Roku. I can take you to him.

full_text: [Skeptically.] How?
character_words: How?

full_text: [Slides back a lamplight on the wall. Places palm on wall, focuses firebending into this location to open a secret passage.] This way.
character_words: This way.

full_text: [Echoes in the distance.] Find him.
character_words: Find him.

full_text: [Briefly glances down the hall.] Time is running out! Quickly!
character_words: Time is running out! Quickly!

full_text: Aang and Katara exchange a look with one another, asserting each other's belief to trust this firebender. The group enters the passage and descends the steps into the cave. Shyu enters behind them and closes the passageway.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Close-up. Tightens knuckles on ship's railing. Smoke billows behind his ship.] What's he up to, Uncle? Why didn't Commander Zhao arrest me?
character_words: What's he up to, Uncle? Why didn't Commander Zhao arrest me?

full_text: Because he wants to follow you. He knows you'll lead him to the prize you're both after: the Avatar.
character_words: Because he wants to follow you. He knows you'll lead him to the prize you're both after: the Avatar.

full_text: [Close-up.] If Zhao wants to follow a trail of smoke, then that's exactly what I'll let him do.
character_words: If Zhao wants to follow a trail of smoke, then that's exactly what I'll let him do.

full_text: [Brief scene cut to show the sun nearly setting. Far overhead view of Shyu leading the group through caverns.] Avatar Roku once called this temple his home. He formed these secret passages out of the magma.
character_words: Avatar Roku once called this temple his home. He formed these secret passages out of the magma.

full_text: Did you know Avatar Roku?
character_words: Did you know Avatar Roku?

full_text: No. But my grandfather knew him. Many generations of Fire Sages guarded this Fire Temple long before me. We all have a strong spiritual connection to this place.
character_words: No. But my grandfather knew him. Many generations of Fire Sages guarded this Fire Temple long before me. We all have a strong spiritual connection to this place.

full_text: Is that how you knew I was coming?
character_words: Is that how you knew I was coming?

full_text: A few weeks ago, an amazing thing occurred. The statue of Avatar Roku; its eyes began to glow!
character_words: A few weeks ago, an amazing thing occurred. The statue of Avatar Roku; its eyes began to glow!

full_text: That's when we were at the Air Temple. Avatar Roku's eyes were glowing there, too!
character_words: That's when we were at the Air Temple. Avatar Roku's eyes were glowing there, too!

full_text: At that moment, we knew you had returned to the world.
character_words: At that moment, we knew you had returned to the world.

full_text: If this is the Avatar's temple, why did the sages attack me?
character_words: If this is the Avatar's temple, why did the sages attack me?

full_text: Things have changed. In the past, the sages were loyal only to the Avatar. When Roku died, the sages eagerly awaited for the next Avatar to return. But he never came.
character_words: Things have changed. In the past, the sages were loyal only to the Avatar. When Roku died, the sages eagerly awaited for the next Avatar to return. But he never came.

full_text: [Looking down, guiltily.] They were waiting for me.
character_words: They were waiting for me.

full_text: [Humorously mocking.] Hey don't feel bad. You're only a hundred years late! [Aang scowls heavily at Sokka.]
character_words: Hey don't feel bad. You're only a hundred years late!

full_text: They lost hope the Avatar would ever return. When Fire Lord Sozin began the War, my grandfather and the other sages were forced to follow him. [Shakes head sadly.] I never wanted to serve the Fire Lord. When I learned you were coming, I knew I would have to betray the other sages.
character_words: They lost hope the Avatar would ever return. When Fire Lord Sozin began the War, my grandfather and the other sages were forced to follow him.  I never wanted to serve the Fire Lord. When I learned you were coming, I knew I would have to betray the other sages.

full_text: Thank you for helping me. [Close-up as Shyu smiles to Aang.]
character_words: Thank you for helping me.

full_text: [Continues leading the group up a spiraling flight of stairs.] We'll follow these stairs to the sanctuary. [Time skip, Shyu continues talking as they near the top of the stairs.] Once you're inside, wait for the light to hit Avatar Roku's statue. Only then will you be able to speak with him.
character_words: We'll follow these stairs to the sanctuary.  Once you're inside, wait for the light to hit Avatar Roku's statue. Only then will you be able to speak with him.

full_text: Slides back a secret tile and climbs into the outer sanctuary. Massive columns with dragon statues atop them line the room. An immense door is before them with a device holding five open-mouthed dragons.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Gasps.] No!
character_words: No!

full_text: [Approaches door.] Shyu, what's wrong?
character_words: Shyu, what's wrong?

full_text: The sanctuary doors, they're closed!
character_words: The sanctuary doors, they're closed!

full_text: [Aang tugs at the door uselessly.] Can't you just open them with firebending? Like you opened that other door?
character_words: Can't you just open them with firebending? Like you opened that other door?

full_text: No. Only a fully realized Avatar is powerful enough to open this door alone. Otherwise, the sages must open this door together, [Sokka shown in deep thought.] with five simultaneous fire blasts.
character_words: No. Only a fully realized Avatar is powerful enough to open this door alone. Otherwise, the sages must open this door together,  with five simultaneous fire blasts.

full_text: [Ponderously states.] Five fire blasts, huh? [Zoom out to show a lamplight above him.] I think I can help you out.
character_words: Five fire blasts, huh?  I think I can help you out.

full_text: The scene switches to Zuko's smoke-billowing ship. Close-up to show a small vessel holding Zuko being slid into the waters.
character_words: NA

full_text: Uncle, keep heading north. Zhao will follow the smoke trail, while I use it as a cover.
character_words: Uncle, keep heading north. Zhao will follow the smoke trail, while I use it as a cover.

full_text:
Iroh grunts in doubt, stroking his beard in deep thought. Zuko's boat settles on the ocean's surface and disappears in the smoke. Switch to a telescope view of nothing but smoke. Zhao lowers telescope, staring with determination.
Switch to view of sanctuary door.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Kneeling. Pours oil into a bag.] This is a little trick I picked up from my father. I seal the lamp oil inside an animal skin casing, Shyu lights the oil soaked twine and, [Picks up bag, holds it proudly before him.] ta-da! Fake firebending!
character_words: This is a little trick I picked up from my father. I seal the lamp oil inside an animal skin casing, Shyu lights the oil soaked twine and,  ta-da! Fake firebending!

full_text: [Impressed.] You've really outdone yourself this time, Sokka.
character_words: You've really outdone yourself this time, Sokka.

full_text: This might actually work.
character_words: This might actually work.

full_text: [Time skip. Sokka places his last bag into the dragon's mouth.] The sages will hear the explosion, so as soon as they go off, you rush in!
character_words: The sages will hear the explosion, so as soon as they go off, you rush in!

full_text: [Hides behind a column with her brother. Holds Momo. Glances to the next column where Aang hides.] It's almost sunset. Are you ready?
character_words: It's almost sunset. Are you ready?

full_text: Definitely.
character_words: Definitely.

full_text: Shyu thrusts his finger forward, sending a small flare racing across the door to light all five bags at once. Shyu hurries to take cover. There is an intense explosion, producing a lot of smoke. Aang bursts forward and runs for the door. Aang strains to open the door, which has not budged.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Surprised.] They're still locked!
character_words: They're still locked!

full_text: [Sadly sighs. Sokka rises from hiding behind his sister.] It didn't work. [Aang falls to his knees.]
character_words: It didn't work.

full_text: [Time skip. Everyone stands in front of the door. Aang beats upon it furiously with consecutive airbending slices.] Why, won't, it, open?!
character_words: Why, won't, it, open?!

full_text: [Presses forward. Seizes Aang's arm.] Aang! Stop! [Relaxes, releasing his arm.] There's nothing else we can do ...
character_words: Aang! Stop!  There's nothing else we can do ...

full_text: [Glumly.] I'm sorry I put you through all of this for nothing.
character_words: I'm sorry I put you through all of this for nothing.

full_text: [Examining the explosion. Runs his finger across the black soot.] I don't get it. That firebending looked as strong as any firebending I've seen.
character_words: I don't get it. That firebending looked as strong as any firebending I've seen.

full_text: [A moment passes. Sudden excitement.] Sokka, you're a genius!
character_words: Sokka, you're a genius!

full_text: [Confused.] Wait. How is Sokka a genius? His plan didn't even work.
character_words: Wait. How is Sokka a genius? His plan didn't even work.

full_text: [Pleasantly.] Come on Aang. Let her dream.
character_words: Come on Aang. Let her dream.

full_text: You're right. Sokka's plan didn't work. But it looks like it did.
character_words: You're right. Sokka's plan didn't work. But it looks like it did.

full_text: [Dubiously.] Did the definition of genius change over the last hundred years? [Katara grasps her chin, slyly grinning toward Aang.]
character_words: Did the definition of genius change over the last hundred years?

full_text: [Time skip. Fire Sages run toward Shyu in front of the door.] Come quickly! The Avatar has entered the sanctuary!
character_words: Come quickly! The Avatar has entered the sanctuary!

full_text: How did he get in?
character_words: How did he get in?

full_text: I don't know. But look at the scorch marks! And down there! [Points to a shadow visible at the bottom of the door.]
character_words: I don't know. But look at the scorch marks! And down there!

full_text: He's inside! Open the doors, immediately! Before he contacts Avatar Roku!
character_words: He's inside! Open the doors, immediately! Before he contacts Avatar Roku!

full_text: Aang slides into position behind a nearby column as the five sages firebend the doors locks open. As the door opens, a sooty Momo is revealed sitting on the floor. Momo sneezes, blowing the soot off himself.
character_words: NA

full_text: It's the Avatar's lemur. He must have crawled through the pipes! We've been tricked!
character_words: It's the Avatar's lemur. He must have crawled through the pipes! We've been tricked!

full_text: Momo springs into action, leaping atop the Great Fire Sage's head and clinging to his hat. Katara charged forward, pulling a nearby sage's tunic over his head to blind him. Sokka grabs the lower skirt of a sage's outfit, lifting it completely over his body to cover his face.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Grabs the last free sage and hauls him into his grip, pinning him.] Now, Aang!
character_words: Now, Aang!

full_text: [A moment of silence.] Aang! Now's your chance!
character_words: Aang! Now's your chance!

full_text: [Steps out from behind column. Grips Aang from behind, pinning Aang's arms behind him.] The Avatar's coming with me! [The captured sages use their captors' surprise to reclaim the upper hand, pinning their captors down. Momo flies off with the Great Fire Sage's hat.] Close the doors! Quickly!
character_words: The Avatar's coming with me!  Close the doors! Quickly!

full_text: Walking down steps, Aang glances over his shoulders to see Sokka and Katara being chained to a column. He breaks free, spinning behind Zuko to send him down the stairs with an airbending blast. Aang runs for Katara and Sokka.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Chained. Sees him coming toward her. Turns head toward the closing door.] Go!
character_words: Go!

full_text: Aang listens without hesitation, turning to charge for the door guarded by two sages. He leaps into the air to avoid the Great Fire Sage's fire punch. Aang bounces off his hands from each of the two sage's heads before sailing through the door just as it closes.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Pleased.] He made it!
character_words: He made it!

full_text: Everyone looks away as the door seals with a blinding flash of white light. Inside, Aang is kneeling and looks up to a tall statue of Avatar Roku. A beam of red sunlight enters the room and strikes a glistening red jewel held by the statue.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Stands. Confused.] The light hits the statue and I talk to Roku. So why isn't anything happening?
character_words: The light hits the statue and I talk to Roku. So why isn't anything happening?

full_text: [He and four sages launch fire blasts into the door's locks. Nothing happens. Frustrated.] Why isn't it working, it's sealed shut?
character_words: Why isn't it working, it's sealed shut?

full_text: It must have been the light. Avatar Roku doesn't want us inside.
character_words: It must have been the light. Avatar Roku doesn't want us inside.

full_text: [Exasperated. Standing in the middle of the room, facing the statue.] Why isn't anything happening? I don't know what I'm doing! All I know is airbending! Please Avatar Roku, talk to me!
character_words: Why isn't anything happening? I don't know what I'm doing! All I know is airbending! Please Avatar Roku, talk to me!

full_text: Roku's statue turns red as sunlight engulfs it. Its eyes glow white. View of Aang as smoke fills the room. When the white smoke dissipates Avatar Roku is standing before him, they are on a mountaintop and only clouds are visible below.
character_words: NA

full_text: It's good to see you Aang. What took you so long? [Aang respectfully places a fist into his palm, bowing his head to the Avatar before him.]
character_words: It's good to see you Aang. What took you so long?

full_text: [Firmly to Shyu, who is kneeling before him with his hands behind his back.] Why did you help the Avatar?
character_words: Why did you help the Avatar?

full_text: [Sadly and proudly.] Because it was once the sages' duty. It is still our duty.
character_words: Because it was once the sages' duty. It is still our duty.

full_text: [Claps. Interrupts interrogation. Approaches with six firebender guards.] What a moving and heartfelt performance. I'm certain the Fire Lord will understand, when you explain why you betrayed him.
character_words: What a moving and heartfelt performance. I'm certain the Fire Lord will understand, when you explain why you betrayed him.

full_text: [Places palms together. Bows head forward.] Commander Zhao.
character_words: Commander Zhao.

full_text: And Prince Zuko. It was a noble effort, but your little smokescreen didn't work. [Zuko scowls sharply. Firebenders step behind him, seizing his arms.] Two traitors in one day, the Fire Lord will be pleased.
character_words: And Prince Zuko. It was a noble effort, but your little smokescreen didn't work.  Two traitors in one day, the Fire Lord will be pleased.

full_text: [Strains against his captor, snaps at Zhao.] You're too late, Zhao! The Avatar's inside and the doors are sealed.
character_words: You're too late, Zhao! The Avatar's inside and the doors are sealed.

full_text: No matter. [Grins confidently.] Sooner or later, he has to come out. [Katara and Sokka share a worried glance.]
character_words: No matter.  Sooner or later, he has to come out.

full_text: I have something very important to tell you, Aang. That is why, when you were in the Spirit World, I sent my dragon to find you.
character_words: I have something very important to tell you, Aang. That is why, when you were in the Spirit World, I sent my dragon to find you.

full_text: [Interested, curious.] Is it about that vision? The one of the comet?
character_words: Is it about that vision? The one of the comet?

full_text: Yes.
character_words: Yes.

full_text: What does it mean?
character_words: What does it mean?

full_text: One hundred years ago, [Viewers see a visual of a comet in the dark sky.] Fire Lord Sozin used that comet to begin the War. He and his firebending army harnessed its incredible power, and dealt a deadly first strike against the other nations.
character_words: One hundred years ago,  Fire Lord Sozin used that comet to begin the War. He and his firebending army harnessed its incredible power, and dealt a deadly first strike against the other nations.

full_text: [Close-up.] So the comet made them stronger?
character_words: So the comet made them stronger?

full_text: [Close-up.] Yes. Stronger than you could even imagine.
character_words: Yes. Stronger than you could even imagine.

full_text: [Close-up.] But that happened a hundred years ago. What does the comet have to do with the War now?
character_words: But that happened a hundred years ago. What does the comet have to do with the War now?

full_text: Listen carefully. [Viewers see silhouette of Fire Lord Ozai standing amid flames, fists taut.] Sozin's Comet will return by the end of the summer, and Fire Lord Ozai will use its power to finish the War, once and for all. [Visual and audio of Ozai's silhouette roaring upward, fire streaming from his mouth.] If he succeeds, even the Avatar won't be able to restore balance to the world. Aang. You must defeat the Fire Lord, before the comet arrives.
character_words: Listen carefully.  Sozin's Comet will return by the end of the summer, and Fire Lord Ozai will use its power to finish the War, once and for all.  If he succeeds, even the Avatar won't be able to restore balance to the world. Aang. You must defeat the Fire Lord, before the comet arrives.

full_text: [Counters anxiously.] But I haven't even started learning waterbending! Not to mention earth and fire!
character_words: But I haven't even started learning waterbending! Not to mention earth and fire!

full_text: Mastering the elements takes years of discipline and practice. But if the world is to survive, you must do it by summer's end. [Close-up of a shocked Aang.]
character_words: Mastering the elements takes years of discipline and practice. But if the world is to survive, you must do it by summer's end.

full_text: Firebenders, including Zhao and his crew, circle around the door's perimeter, assuming a firebending form. A monk chant begins for the audience only. They wait patiently for the door to open.
character_words: NA

full_text: When those doors open, [Shouts.] unleash all your firepower!
character_words: When those doors open,  unleash all your firepower!

full_text: [Worried.] How's Aang gonna make it out of this?
character_words: How's Aang gonna make it out of this?

full_text: [Troubled, questioning.] How are we gonna make it out of this?
character_words: How are we gonna make it out of this?

full_text: [Terrified.] What if I can't master all the elements in time? What if I fail?
character_words: What if I can't master all the elements in time? What if I fail?

full_text: I know you can do it Aang. [Close-up of half his face.] For you have done it before. [Close-up of half of Aang's now-smiling face.] The solstice is ending. We must go our separate ways, for now.
character_words: I know you can do it Aang.  For you have done it before.  The solstice is ending. We must go our separate ways, for now.

full_text: But I won't be able to come back to the temple. What if I have questions? How will I talk to you?
character_words: But I won't be able to come back to the temple. What if I have questions? How will I talk to you?

full_text: I am a part of you. When you need to talk to me again, you will find a way. [Closes his eyes, providing Aang a vision of Fire Navy ships surrounding the island. Speaks to his mind without words.] A great danger awaits you at the temple. [Provides a vision of the awaiting firebenders on the other side of the door.] I can help you face the threat. But only if you are ready.
character_words: I am a part of you. When you need to talk to me again, you will find a way.  A great danger awaits you at the temple.  I can help you face the threat. But only if you are ready.

full_text: [Eyes and arrows glow.] I'm ready.
character_words: I'm ready.

full_text: Scene switches to the guard surrounding the door. The door glows bright white once again. Smoke streams come through into the room. The door unlocks itself, beginning to open. As it opens, a blinding white light forces all present to look away.
character_words: NA

full_text: Ready ... [Light fades, revealing a pair of glowing white eyes in the darkness.]
character_words: Ready ...

full_text: [Sokka struggles against his chains. Katara is terrified.] No! Aang!
character_words: No! Aang!

full_text: Fire! [He and his guards cooperate in blasting fire onto the unseen target.]
character_words: Fire!

full_text: The wall of fire amasses, circling its new host as Avatar Roku, eyes aglow, is revealed behind the flames, untouched. Close-up of a shocked and horror-stricken Zhao.
character_words: NA

full_text: [In awe.] Avatar Roku ...
character_words: Avatar Roku ...

full_text: Avatar Roku draws the circling fire together in one motion. He sends it forward in one powerful wave that sears the room, blasting the offenders off their feet and melting the chains binding Katara, Sokka, Shyu, and Zuko with precision. View of outside the temple as the blast destroys the outer wall. Close-up of ghostly Avatar Roku, turning his glowing glare upon the offending sages. The sages panic, all turning to run from his wrath.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Implores.] Avatar Roku is going to destroy the temple! We have to get out of here!
character_words: Avatar Roku is going to destroy the temple! We have to get out of here!

full_text: Not without Aang!
character_words: Not without Aang!

full_text:
Roku kneels into a forward strike, melting the floor with a molten firebending trail. He steadily lifts his hand, causing the stream of lava below to erupt into maddened explosions. The lava soars through the temple, tearing it apart. Zhao and his firebenders are shown fleeing for the temple's exit.
Katara and Sokka huddle together, arm-in-arm, behind a column. Sokka kneels over his sister, protecting her in a brotherly fashion.
