full_text: Aang plays a note on the flute and a groundhog pops up underneath Sokka and sings the note.
character_words: NA

full_text: All right, we'll finish our vacations and [Mockingly.] then we'll look for Sokka's intelligence. [Aang laughs.]
character_words: All right, we'll finish our vacations and  then we'll look for Sokka's intelligence.

full_text: [Opening a map and shows it to Katara.] Your turn, Katara. Where would you like to go on your mini-vacation?
character_words: Your turn, Katara. Where would you like to go on your mini-vacation?

full_text: [Pointing at the map.] How about the Misty Palms Oasis? That sounds refreshing.
character_words: How about the Misty Palms Oasis? That sounds refreshing.

full_text: Oh, yeah, I've been there. It's a pristine natural ice spring. And I usually don't use the word "pristine". [Cut to the symbol on the map.] It's one of nature's wonders.
character_words: Oh, yeah, I've been there. It's a pristine natural ice spring. And I usually don't use the word "pristine".  It's one of nature's wonders.

full_text: The close-up of the map's illustration fades to the Misty Palm Oasis, which has a small ice spring in the center. Cut to a shot of Aang, Katara, Sokka, and Toph stare at the oasis in disappointment.
character_words: NA

full_text: Must've changed ownership since I was here. [Laughs sheepishly.]
character_words: Must've changed ownership since I was here.

full_text: They walk through the entrance and the hanging sign falls down. Fade to Team Avatar walking past the small ice spring. They walk into the bar and pass five sandbenders hanging around outside. One sandbender spits at Sokka's feet. Sokka looks at the man angrily. The man utters a raspy groan, slurps, and chuckles. Katara grabs Sokka and pulls him into the bar, which is filled with weary travelers.
character_words: NA

full_text: [To the bartender.] One mango, please.
character_words: One mango, please.

full_text: The bartender uses two swords to slice a bowl from a large chunk of ice. He cuts down some mangos from the overhanging fruit and dices them up. He chops up a piece of fruit and pours a jug of milk into the bowl, still using the swords. He throws a decorative umbrella and straw into the bowl and serves it to Zei, who gives the bartender a coin.
character_words: NA

full_text: I don't see anything wrong with having one of those fruity beverages while we plan our strategy. [Runs up to the bartender.] Excuse me.
character_words: I don't see anything wrong with having one of those fruity beverages while we plan our strategy.  Excuse me.

full_text: Zei bumps into Aang and spills his drink onto the airbender.
character_words: NA

full_text: No worries, I clean up easy. [Airbends the drink off of his clothes.]
character_words: No worries, I clean up easy.

full_text: [Gasps.] You're a living relic.
character_words: You're a living relic.

full_text: [Shrugs.] Thanks, I try.
character_words: Thanks, I try.

full_text: An Air Nomad, right in front of me. [Shot changes to show Katara holding an icy bowl.] Professor Zei, head of anthropology at Ba Sing Se University. [Grabs Aang's arm and points at his arrow tattoo. Camera pans to Aang's face.] Tell me, which of the air temples do you hail from?
character_words: An Air Nomad, right in front of me.  Professor Zei, head of anthropology at Ba Sing Se University.  Tell me, which of the air temples do you hail from?

full_text: The Southern Temple.
character_words: The Southern Temple.

full_text: [Measures Aang's head with a pair of calipers and speaking excitedly.] Oh, splendid! Now tell me- what was the primary agricultural product of your people?
character_words: Oh, splendid! Now tell me- what was the primary agricultural product of your people?

full_text: [Nervously.] Uh, are fruit pies an agricultural product?
character_words: Uh, are fruit pies an agricultural product?

full_text: Oh, truly fascinating. That is one for the journal. [While Sokka speaks, Zei writes in his journal.]
character_words: Oh, truly fascinating. That is one for the journal.

full_text: So Professor, you're obviously a well-traveled guy. Do you have a more current map? Ours seems to be a little dated.
character_words: So Professor, you're obviously a well-traveled guy. Do you have a more current map? Ours seems to be a little dated.

full_text: Certainly.
character_words: Certainly.

full_text: Sokka unrolls a map on a table and examines. Toph sips her drink and props her legs on another chair.
character_words: NA

full_text: What, no Fire Nation? [Straightening his back.] Doesn't anybody have a good map of that place?
character_words: What, no Fire Nation?  Doesn't anybody have a good map of that place?

full_text: [Examines the map while the camera pans across it.] You've made a lot of trips into the desert.
character_words: You've made a lot of trips into the desert.

full_text: All in vain, I'm afraid. I've found lost civilizations all over the Earth Kingdom, [Raises his fist slightly.] but I haven't managed to find the crown jewel: Wan Shi Tong's Library. [Cut to a shot of Toph laying down. Her feet are closest to the camera, showing her dirt-stained soles.]
character_words: All in vain, I'm afraid. I've found lost civilizations all over the Earth Kingdom,  but I haven't managed to find the crown jewel: Wan Shi Tong's Library.

full_text: [In disbelief.] You spent years walking through the desert to find some guy's library?
character_words: You spent years walking through the desert to find some guy's library?

full_text: This library is more valuable than gold, little lady. It is said to contain a vast collection of knowledge, and knowledge is priceless.
character_words: This library is more valuable than gold, little lady. It is said to contain a vast collection of knowledge, and knowledge is priceless.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Hmm, sounds like good times.
character_words: Hmm, sounds like good times.

full_text: Oh, it is. According to legend, it was built by the great Knowledge Spirit, Wan Shi Tong, with the help of his "foxy" knowledge seekers.
character_words: Oh, it is. According to legend, it was built by the great Knowledge Spirit, Wan Shi Tong, with the help of his "foxy" knowledge seekers.

full_text: [Intrigued.] Oh, so this spirit has attractive assistants, huh?
character_words: Oh, so this spirit has attractive assistants, huh?

full_text: [Puts her hand on the side of Sokka's face to stop him from talking.] I think he means they look like actual foxes, Sokka.
character_words: I think he means they look like actual foxes, Sokka.

full_text: You're both right. [Katara and Sokka turn to him in surprise. Cut to Zei.] Handsome little creatures. [Takes out a drawing of the library and places it on the table.] Wan Shi Tong and his knowledge seekers collected books from all over the world, and put them on display for mankind to read, so that we might better ourselves.
character_words: You're both right.  Handsome little creatures.  Wan Shi Tong and his knowledge seekers collected books from all over the world, and put them on display for mankind to read, so that we might better ourselves.

full_text: If this place has books from all over the world, [Aang walks over to look at the maps while he sips his drink.] do you think they've got info on the Fire Nation? A map, maybe?
character_words: If this place has books from all over the world,  do you think they've got info on the Fire Nation? A map, maybe?

full_text: I wouldn't know. But if such a thing exists, it's in Wan Shi Tong's Library.
character_words: I wouldn't know. But if such a thing exists, it's in Wan Shi Tong's Library.

full_text: Then it's settled. Aang, I do believe it's my turn. I'd like to spend my vacation [Cut to a shot of Sokka as he points his finger into the air dramatically. The background changes to a rushing one.] at the library! [Sokka's voice echoes. Zoom back to a group shot, with Sokka still having his finger raised in the air.]
character_words: Then it's settled. Aang, I do believe it's my turn. I'd like to spend my vacation  at the library!

full_text: [Waving her hand to gain the others attention.] Uh, hey, what about me? When do I get to pick?
character_words: Uh, hey, what about me? When do I get to pick?

full_text: You gotta work here a little longer before you qualify for vacation time.
character_words: You gotta work here a little longer before you qualify for vacation time.

full_text: Hmph! [Slams her drink on the table and folds her arms. Cut to a shot of Zei.]
character_words: Hmph!

full_text: Of course, there's the matter of finding it. I've made several trips into the Si Wong Desert and almost died each time. [In a depressed voice.] I'm afraid that desert's impossible to cross.
character_words: Of course, there's the matter of finding it. I've made several trips into the Si Wong Desert and almost died each time.  I'm afraid that desert's impossible to cross.

full_text: Professor, would you like to see our sky bison?
character_words: Professor, would you like to see our sky bison?

full_text: A sky bison?! You actually have one?
character_words: A sky bison?! You actually have one?

full_text: Cut to Appa retreating from four sandbenders, as he growls.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Runs toward the sandbenders.] Sandbenders, shoo, away from the bison!
character_words: Sandbenders, shoo, away from the bison!

full_text: The sandbenders run away and get into two sand-sailers. They drive the sailers by creating a small tornado of sand near the sail. Cut to a ground view of Appa flying across the sky. Cut to Appa's saddle and pan from Katara and Toph leaning against the sides to Sokka who grabs a telescope and looks over the side. The shot changes to Momo, Zei, and Aang on Appa's head. Zei leans over Appa's head.
character_words: NA

full_text: Tell me, sky bison, are you the last of your breed? [Appa growls and Zei responds enthusiastically.] Delightful! I only wish I spoke his tongue. [Scratches Appa's head.] Oh, the stories this beast could tell. [Momo crawls up to Zei's side and starts chittering.] Shush, chatty monkey.
character_words: Tell me, sky bison, are you the last of your breed?  Delightful! I only wish I spoke his tongue.  Oh, the stories this beast could tell.  Shush, chatty monkey.

full_text: [Examines the picture of the library.] Wow, shouldn't be too hard to find a place like this out here.
character_words: Wow, shouldn't be too hard to find a place like this out here.

full_text: Appa flies away from the camera. Cut back to the saddle.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Groans in frustration.] Does this place even exist?
character_words: Does this place even exist?

full_text: Some say it doesn't.
character_words: Some say it doesn't.

full_text: [Eyes widen in surprise before narrowing.] Shouldn't you have mentioned that before? [Collapses on the saddle, putting her feet over the side.]
character_words: Shouldn't you have mentioned that before?

full_text: Cut to an aerial view of Appa flying. Cut to Zei, who writes in his journal and pans to Toph.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Pointing over the side of the saddle with excitement.] There it is! [Everybody on Appa looks to where Toph is pointing, but they can only see sand dunes. Aang, Katara, and Sokka glare at Toph in annoyance for tricking them. Cut back to the shot of Toph.] That's what it will sound like when one of you spots it. [Waves her hand in front of her face with a blank grin to remind them of the fact that she is blind. She quickly goes back to clutching the saddle.]
character_words: There it is!  That's what it will sound like when one of you spots it.

full_text: Cut to Appa flying and shows a closer shot of Aang driving Appa while Momo sleeps on Aang's head. Sokka and Katara search for the library on Appa's saddle.
character_words: NA

full_text: It shouldn't be this hard to spot a giant, ornate building from the air.
character_words: It shouldn't be this hard to spot a giant, ornate building from the air.

full_text: [Looks through his telescope and spots a tower. Pointing.] Down there, what's that?
character_words: Down there, what's that?

full_text: Momo wakes up. Cut to the tower and Appa flies down next to it.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Holding the illustrations.] Forget it. It's obviously not what we're looking for. [Side shot.] The building in this drawing is enormous.
character_words: Forget it. It's obviously not what we're looking for.  The building in this drawing is enormous.

full_text: They see a sparkle in the distance and a fox holding a scroll with its mouth walking over a dune.
character_words: NA

full_text: [To Zei.] What kind of animal is that?
character_words: What kind of animal is that?

full_text: The fox runs up the tower. Shot changes to a window at the top of the tower through which the fox enters.
character_words: NA

full_text: I think that was one of the Knowledge Seekers. [Frontal shot.] Oh, we must be close to the library!
character_words: I think that was one of the Knowledge Seekers.  Oh, we must be close to the library!

full_text: [Looking at the illustration Katara is holding.] No, this is the library- look! [Camera pans down from the tower to the illustration.] It's completely buried.
character_words: No, this is the library- look!  It's completely buried.

full_text: Cut to a zoom out shot of the spire from far away.
character_words: NA

full_text: Further shot of the top of library. The camera pans up from the sand to the top of the library.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Shouting dramatically.] The library is buried?! [Cut to a shot of the group standing in front of the spire. Zei runs forward. Depressed.] My life's ambition is now full of sand. [Collapses. Smiling, he lifts his head and reveals a small shovel in hand. Excitedly.] Well, time to start excavating. [He attempts to unearth the library using the tiny shovel. Cut to a close-up of the spire's surface as Toph places her palm against it.]
character_words: The library is buried?!  My life's ambition is now full of sand.  Well, time to start excavating.

full_text: [Cut a small part of the library which Toph puts her hand on.] Actually, that won't be necessary. The inside seems to be completely intact. [Aerial shot.] And it's huge.
character_words: Actually, that won't be necessary. The inside seems to be completely intact.  And it's huge.

full_text: That fox thingy went in through a window. I say we climb up there and give it a look.
character_words: That fox thingy went in through a window. I say we climb up there and give it a look.

full_text: I say you guys go ahead without me.
character_words: I say you guys go ahead without me.

full_text: You got something against libraries?
character_words: You got something against libraries?

full_text: I've held books before. And I gotta tell you, they don't exactly do it for me.
character_words: I've held books before. And I gotta tell you, they don't exactly do it for me.

full_text: [Sheepishly.] Oh, right. Sorry.
character_words: Oh, right. Sorry.

full_text: Let me know if they have something you can listen to.
character_words: Let me know if they have something you can listen to.

full_text: Cut to the window at the top of the tower. A boomerang with a rope tied to it is thrown into the window. At the bottom of the tower, Sokka starts scaling the rope and the camera pans to Aang, Appa, and Toph.
character_words: NA

full_text: [To Appa.] Don't worry, buddy. I'm not making you go underground ever again. You can stay out here with Toph. [Walks off camera.]
character_words: Don't worry, buddy. I'm not making you go underground ever again. You can stay out here with Toph.

full_text: Appa makes a low, rumbling growl.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Awkwardly.] What's up?
character_words: What's up?

full_text: Cut to overhead shot Katara, Sokka, Aang, and Zei scaling the rope inside the library. The shot changes to a closer view as Zei, Aang, Sokka, and Katara climb down and Momo flies down. The shot changes to show the library's ceiling dome.
character_words: NA

full_text: Oh, it's breathtaking! [Shot changes to show Zei, Aang, and Sokka climb down the rope with owl arches in the background.] The spirit spared no expense in designing this place. [Pointing.] Look at those beautiful buttresses! [Cut to an above shot of Sokka, Aang, and Zei, who are hanging from the rope. Sokka and Aang giggle at the word.] What's funny?
character_words: Oh, it's breathtaking!  The spirit spared no expense in designing this place.  Look at those beautiful buttresses!  What's funny?

full_text: Nothing. We just like architecture.
character_words: Nothing. We just like architecture.

full_text: [Cut back to a smiling Zei.] As do I.
character_words: As do I.

full_text: They slide off the rope onto a bridge and Momo lands on Aang's shoulder.
character_words: NA

full_text: My word! [Examines an owl mosaic above two pillars.] The exquisite mosaic handiwork of this tile-rendered avian symbol ... [Sokka, Katara, and Aang look at Zei quizzically.] Eh, nice owl.
character_words: My word!  The exquisite mosaic handiwork of this tile-rendered avian symbol ...  Eh, nice owl.

full_text: They hear rustling noises. Sokka and Katara run behind a pillar. Aang grabs Zei and they hide behind another pillar. Wan Shi Tong, an owl spirit, walks over the bridge and examines the rope. Aang cranes his head around the pillar.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Turns his head around.] I know you're back there.
character_words: I know you're back there.

full_text: Aang gasps and hides again.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Smiles and walks from behind the pillar and up to Wan Shi Tong.] Hello, I'm Professor Zei, head of anthropology at Ba Sing Se University.
character_words: Hello, I'm Professor Zei, head of anthropology at Ba Sing Se University.

full_text: You should leave the way you came. [Looks to the side.] Unless you want to become a stuffed head of anthropology.
character_words: You should leave the way you came.  Unless you want to become a stuffed head of anthropology.

full_text: The camera pans to three stuffed animal heads on a pillar. Frontal shot of Zei, as he moans and clutches his neck. Katara, Sokka, and Aang walk out from behind their pillars and up to Wan Shi Tong.
character_words: NA

full_text: Are you the spirit who brought this library to the physical world?
character_words: Are you the spirit who brought this library to the physical world?

full_text: Indeed, I am Wan Shi Tong, "He Who Knows Ten Thousand Things." And you are obviously humans, which, by the way, are no longer permitted in my study.
character_words: Indeed, I am Wan Shi Tong, "He Who Knows Ten Thousand Things." And you are obviously humans, which, by the way, are no longer permitted in my study.

full_text: What do you have against humans?
character_words: What do you have against humans?

full_text: Hm! Humans only bother learning things to get the edge on other humans. [Cut to Zhao, studying scrolls in the library. Voice-over.] Like that firebender who came to this place a few years ago, looking to destroy his enemy. [Scene changes to the present.] So ... [Leans toward a sweating Sokka.] who are you trying to destroy?
character_words: Hm! Humans only bother learning things to get the edge on other humans.  Like that firebender who came to this place a few years ago, looking to destroy his enemy.  So ...  who are you trying to destroy?

full_text: [Cut to his reflection in Wan Shi Tong's eye.] What? No-no-no-no destroying. We're not into that.
character_words: What? No-no-no-no destroying. We're not into that.

full_text: [Blinks.] Then why have you come here?
character_words: Then why have you come here?

full_text: Um ... knowledge for knowledge's sake?
character_words: Um ... knowledge for knowledge's sake?

full_text: [Shot changes to him leaning toward Sokka.] If you're going to lie to an all-knowing spirit being, you should at least put some effort into it.
character_words: If you're going to lie to an all-knowing spirit being, you should at least put some effort into it.

full_text: I'm not lying, I'm here with the Avatar, [Grabs Aang and puts him into the shot.] and he's the bridge between our worlds. He'll vouch for me. [Nudges Aang.]
character_words: I'm not lying, I'm here with the Avatar,  and he's the bridge between our worlds. He'll vouch for me.

full_text: Ow. [Frontal shot.] Uh, yeah, I'll vouch. We will not abuse the knowledge in your library, good spirit. [Side shot.] You have my word. [They bow to Wan Shi Tong.]
character_words: Ow.  Uh, yeah, I'll vouch. We will not abuse the knowledge in your library, good spirit.  You have my word.

full_text: Hmm, very well. I'll let you peruse my vast collection [Shot changes to Zei, Aang, Katara, and Sokka looking hopefully.] on one condition. [They look at the spirit a little worriedly. Further overhead shot.] To prove your worth as scholars, you have to contribute some worthwhile knowledge.
character_words: Hmm, very well. I'll let you peruse my vast collection  on one condition.  To prove your worth as scholars, you have to contribute some worthwhile knowledge.

full_text: [Walks up to Wan Shi Tong holding a book and kneels down.] Please accept this tome as a donation to your library.
character_words: Please accept this tome as a donation to your library.

full_text: [Frontal shot.] First edition, very nice. [Grabs the book with his wing.]
character_words: First edition, very nice.

full_text: [Camera pans up to show her holding the waterbending scroll.] I have an authentic waterbending scroll.
character_words: I have an authentic waterbending scroll.

full_text: [Frontal shot.] Ooh, these illustrations are quite stylish. [Grabs the scroll.]
character_words: Ooh, these illustrations are quite stylish.

full_text: [Cut to him.] Uh ... oh, I know! [Grabs his wanted poster out of his shirt and shows it to Wan Shi Tong.] Hah!
character_words: Uh ... oh, I know!  Hah!

full_text: I suppose that counts. [Takes the poster.]
character_words: I suppose that counts.

full_text: [Side shot of him walking forward.] Oh, great spirit, [Frontal shot of him holding a piece of string.] check this out. [Ties the string into a butterfly knot and shows it to Wan Shi Tong.] Ta-da! [Aang, Katara, and Zei look at Sokka with uncertainty. Shot of Wan Shi Tong just looking at him in silence.] It's a special knot. That counts as knowledge!
character_words: Oh, great spirit,  check this out.  Ta-da!  It's a special knot. That counts as knowledge!

full_text: [Frontal shot.] You're not very bright, are you? [Sokka grunts as Wan Shi Tong takes the knot.] Enjoy the library. [Jumps off the bridge and flies down to lower levels of the library.]
character_words: You're not very bright, are you?  Enjoy the library.

full_text: Team Avatar and Zei walk toward the library.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Narrows his eyes.] Bright enough to fool you.
character_words: Bright enough to fool you.

full_text: Cut to an overhead view of the desert outside the library, where Appa and Toph rest in the shade. The shot changes to a closer view of Appa and Toph.
character_words: NA

full_text: [To Appa.] So ... you like ... flying? [Appa purrs deeply and scratches his ear.] Of course, I'm more comfortable on the ground where I can see. Well, I don't see the way you do. I feel the vibrations in the ground with my feet. [Closer shot of the two. Toph picks up a handful of sand and lets it fall.] But this sand is so loose and shifty, it makes everything look fuzzy. [Appa makes a rumbling groan with a further shot.] Not that there's anything wrong with fuzzy. [Appa grunts.]
character_words: So ... you like ... flying?  Of course, I'm more comfortable on the ground where I can see. Well, I don't see the way you do. I feel the vibrations in the ground with my feet.  But this sand is so loose and shifty, it makes everything look fuzzy.  Not that there's anything wrong with fuzzy.

full_text: Cut to a large room full of books and the camera pans down to show the Knowledge Seeker, Team Avatar, and Zei at a bookshelf. In a closer shot, the Knowledge Seeker deposits its scroll on a shelf and the camera pans to the right to Team Avatar and Zei. Closer shot of Aang, as he flips a page on his book. He finds an illustration of a person talking to a lion turtle with two more lion turtles in the background.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Holds the illustration up to show Sokka and Katara.] Hey, look at these weird lion turtle things.
character_words: Hey, look at these weird lion turtle things.

full_text: [Pulls a book off the bookshelf with the symbols 子白 on the cover.] Eh, I've seen weirder.
character_words: Eh, I've seen weirder.

full_text: [Walks up to Aang, carrying a book.] Aang, did you know in a past life, you were left-handed?
character_words: Aang, did you know in a past life, you were left-handed?

full_text: I always knew I was special.
character_words: I always knew I was special.

full_text: Cut to Sokka and Zei. While Zei takes books off of bookshelves and adds them to his stack, Sokka takes a scroll from a shelf, reads it, and puts it in his purse. Back shot of Sokka walking up to a podium. He sees the burnt piece of parchment framed on the podium with the characters 培治龍年七月九日烈火國最黑暗的一天.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Reading from the parchment.] "The darkest day in Fire Nation history." It's got a date at the top, but it doesn't say anything else. [He looks around, making sure no one is watching, before prying open the frame with his sword and taking the parchment.]
character_words: "The darkest day in Fire Nation history." It's got a date at the top, but it doesn't say anything else.

full_text: [Walks in with Katara and Zei.] Sokka, where are you going?
character_words: Sokka, where are you going?

full_text: [Running down a section of a library.] I want to know what happened to the Fire Nation on their darkest day. This could be promising. [Aang, Katara, and Zei follow him.] The information on the Fire Nation should be right up here.
character_words: I want to know what happened to the Fire Nation on their darkest day. This could be promising.  The information on the Fire Nation should be right up here.

full_text: [Looking at a room full of ashes.] Firebenders.
character_words: Firebenders.

full_text: They destroyed everything having to do with the Fire Nation.
character_words: They destroyed everything having to do with the Fire Nation.

full_text: That's so unfair! Just when I think I'm one step ahead of the Fire Nation, it turns out they beat us here a long time ago. [Collapses on his knees.] I need to know what happened on the darkest day. [Hears whimpering and looks at the entrance to see the Knowledge Seeker standing on its hind legs.] Hello, little weird fox guy.
character_words: That's so unfair! Just when I think I'm one step ahead of the Fire Nation, it turns out they beat us here a long time ago.  I need to know what happened on the darkest day.  Hello, little weird fox guy.

full_text: The Knowledge Seeker gets on its four legs and points outside the room.
character_words: NA

full_text: Seems it's trying to assist you.
character_words: Seems it's trying to assist you.

full_text: Um, sure, I guess I'll follow you.
character_words: Um, sure, I guess I'll follow you.

full_text: They follow the Knowledge Seeker to a large round door with a texture lining the bottom sides of the wall. The Knowledge Seeker enters a small door in the texture. The large door opens showing the Knowledge Seeker standing behind it. Team Avatar and Zei walk toward the center of the room. The Knowledge Seeker pushes a lever beside the calendar wheel and the domed ceiling changes from day to night.
character_words: NA

full_text: This room is a true marvel, a mechanical wonder. It's a planetarium that shows the heavens moving.
character_words: This room is a true marvel, a mechanical wonder. It's a planetarium that shows the heavens moving.

full_text: The domed ceiling changes back into day.
character_words: NA

full_text: Uh, this is beautiful, but how is it helpful?
character_words: Uh, this is beautiful, but how is it helpful?

full_text: Maybe these dials represent dates and times. Sokka, try entering that date from that parchment you took.
character_words: Maybe these dials represent dates and times. Sokka, try entering that date from that parchment you took.

full_text: [Mock whispering.] Shh, Katara, not in front of the fox, he's with the owl.
character_words: Shh, Katara, not in front of the fox, he's with the owl.

full_text: The Knowledge Seeker whimpers. Sokka glances at the parchment and changes four of the calendar wheels. He pushes the lever and the domed ceiling changes from day to night.
character_words: NA

full_text: Wow, I got to hand it to you, Sokka. You picked the best mini-vacation for sure.
character_words: Wow, I got to hand it to you, Sokka. You picked the best mini-vacation for sure.

full_text: The ceiling changes from night to day and the planetarium suddenly grows dark.
character_words: NA

full_text: Hey, wait. What happened to the sun?
character_words: Hey, wait. What happened to the sun?

full_text: [Narrows his eyes.] Great, you must have broken it.
character_words: Great, you must have broken it.

full_text: [Walks next to Aang.] It's not broken. [Shot changes to show the sun piece of the planetarium covered by the moon piece.] The sun is behind the moon. It's a solar eclipse! It's literally the darkest day in Fire Nation history. Now I get it. [Grabs Aang's shoulders and shakes him.] Something awful happened on that day. I don't know what, but I do know why. Firebenders lose their bending during a solar eclipse. [Pushes Aang back.] Sorry.
character_words: It's not broken.  The sun is behind the moon. It's a solar eclipse! It's literally the darkest day in Fire Nation history. Now I get it.  Something awful happened on that day. I don't know what, but I do know why. Firebenders lose their bending during a solar eclipse.  Sorry.

full_text: That makes sense. I mean, think what the lunar eclipse at the North Pole did to the waterbenders. This is huge.
character_words: That makes sense. I mean, think what the lunar eclipse at the North Pole did to the waterbenders. This is huge.

full_text: The Knowledge Seeker gets on its hind legs and begs.
character_words: NA

full_text: [To the Knowledge Seeker.] Fine, you earned it. [Tosses the fox a snack from his bag. To Aang and Katara.] We've gotta get this information to the Earth King at Ba Sing Se. We'll wait for the next eclipse, then we'll invade the Fire Nation when they're totally helpless. The Fire Lord is going down!
character_words: Fine, you earned it.  We've gotta get this information to the Earth King at Ba Sing Se. We'll wait for the next eclipse, then we'll invade the Fire Nation when they're totally helpless. The Fire Lord is going down!

full_text: [Enters the shot from behind Sokka.] Mortals are so predictable, and such terrible liars. [Sokka gulps. Shot changes to show Wan Shi Tong talking to them from the entrance.] You betrayed my trust. From the beginning, you intended to misuse this knowledge for evil purposes.
character_words: Mortals are so predictable, and such terrible liars.  You betrayed my trust. From the beginning, you intended to misuse this knowledge for evil purposes.

full_text: You don't understand. If anyone's evil, it's the Fire Nation. You saw what they did to your library. They're destructive and dangerous. We need this information.
character_words: You don't understand. If anyone's evil, it's the Fire Nation. You saw what they did to your library. They're destructive and dangerous. We need this information.

full_text: You think you're the first person to believe their war was justified? Countless others before you have come here seeking weapons or weaknesses or battle strategies.
character_words: You think you're the first person to believe their war was justified? Countless others before you have come here seeking weapons or weaknesses or battle strategies.

full_text: We had no choice. Please, we're just desperate to protect the people we love.
character_words: We had no choice. Please, we're just desperate to protect the people we love.

full_text: And now I'm going to protect what I love. [Flaps his wings and the library starts shaking.]
character_words: And now I'm going to protect what I love.

full_text: What are you doing?
character_words: What are you doing?

full_text: I'm taking my knowledge back. No one will ever abuse it again.
character_words: I'm taking my knowledge back. No one will ever abuse it again.

full_text: [Sand pours from the ceiling.] He's sinking the building. We've gotta get out of here.
character_words: He's sinking the building. We've gotta get out of here.

full_text: I'm afraid I can't allow that. You already know too much. [Pecks at them, but misses.]
character_words: I'm afraid I can't allow that. You already know too much.

full_text: Wan Shi Tong pursues them as they run out the planetarium. The camera pans up to the surface. Appa snarls as the library starts sinking and the ground starts shaking.
character_words: NA

full_text: I already told you, I don't wanna snuggle. [Appa stands up and hurries away from the library. Toph looks at the sinking library.] Library sinking. [Running up to the library.] Library sinking! [Punches both fists into the library to stop it from sinking. Her feet slip in the sand, so she pauses to solidify it.] Hi-yah! [Struggles to stop it from sinking again.]
character_words: I already told you, I don't wanna snuggle.  Library sinking.  Library sinking!  Hi-yah!

full_text: The camera pans down to an aerial view of Team Avatar and Zei running through the library. They round a corner, and Wan Shi Tong continues pursuing them.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Stops running and turns back toward Wan Shi Tong.] Great Knowledge Spirit, I beg you, do not destroy your vast collection of priceless tomes.
character_words: Great Knowledge Spirit, I beg you, do not destroy your vast collection of priceless tomes.

full_text: Aang uses air suction to move Zei out of Wan Shi Tong's attack. Aang fires an air blast at Wan Shi Tong, sending the spirit falling off the side of the bridge.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Runs back to Katara, Zei, and Sokka.] We've gotta get back to the surface!
character_words: We've gotta get back to the surface!

full_text: Sokka, let's go.
character_words: Sokka, let's go.

full_text: But we still don't know when the next eclipse is gonna to happen.
character_words: But we still don't know when the next eclipse is gonna to happen.

full_text: Don't be stupid! We'll find out later!
character_words: Don't be stupid! We'll find out later!

full_text: No, we won't. If we leave this place, we'll never get the information. Aang, come with me to the planetarium, [Aang runs up to him.] I need cover. Katara, take Momo and get out of here!
character_words: No, we won't. If we leave this place, we'll never get the information. Aang, come with me to the planetarium,  I need cover. Katara, take Momo and get out of here!

full_text: But ...!
character_words: But ...!

full_text: Wan Shi Tong breaks in between the two groups and pursues Katara and Zei.
character_words: NA

full_text: Go!
character_words: Go!

full_text: Hurry, Sokka!
character_words: Hurry, Sokka!

full_text: Sokka and Aang run away. Zei evades Wan Shi Tong by diving into a smaller aisle of books. He grabs a book, looking at the cover excitedly. Katara runs and Wan Shi Tong swoops down. Cut to the surface with Toph holding up the library. Appa grunts nervously.
character_words: NA

full_text: What is it now?
character_words: What is it now?

full_text: Cut to three sand-sailers. The camera pans across a sandbender's face and cuts to a side shot of the sailer. The sandbenders direct a sand blast at Appa.
character_words: NA

full_text:
Camera shows an overhead view of the situation. Cut to a dark skinned, pony tailed guy that swings his ball and chain at Iroh, who kicks it away. The chain wraps itself around the leg of a nearby standing Rhino. Iroh tumbles over the ground, dodging two fire blasts. He rises back up and hits the Rhino in the rear, making it dash away, yanking the dark skinned warrior off his rhino and dragging him along. Iroh waves goodbye as he watches them go.
The archer shoots a lit arrow at Zuko. He quickly reacts by knocking the arrow away and releasing a fire blast, burning a hole in the surprised archer's bow.
Mongke joins the fight by directing some fire blasts at Iroh. Iroh deflects each and every one of them. As Mongke is busy with Iroh, Zuko runs up and jumps on the back of the Rhino. With two spinning fire kicks, he sends Colonel Mongke flying.
Iroh runs up to the ostrich horse, jumps on and rides toward Zuko, who awaits him, standing on the Rhino of Colonel Mongke. As he jumps on, another Rough Rhino immediately starts the pursuit. The Rider throws a grenade at the fleeing ostrich horse. It explodes right in front of it, but Iroh and Zuko ride through the explosion's smoke.

character_words: NA

full_text: You brought us here to gamble on Pai Sho?
character_words: You brought us here to gamble on Pai Sho?

full_text: I don't think this is a gamble.
character_words: I don't think this is a gamble.

full_text: Zuko and Iroh walk toward the Pai Sho table. The camera zooms toward Xin Fu and Yu, who are sitting on a bench at the other side of the tavern. Xin Fu jumps up with the intention to grab them, but Yu places a hand on his shoulder to restrain him.
character_words: NA

full_text: Let's take them now!
character_words: Let's take them now!

full_text: This place is full of desperate characters. If they find out we're collecting a bounty, we might have to fight them all just to keep our prize. Patience.
character_words: This place is full of desperate characters. If they find out we're collecting a bounty, we might have to fight them all just to keep our prize. Patience.

full_text: Cut to Iroh and Zuko approaching the Pai Sho table.
character_words: NA

full_text: May I have this game?
character_words: May I have this game?

full_text: [Gesturing Iroh to sit down.] The guest has the first move. [Iroh places the lotus tile in the center of the board.] I see you favor the white lotus gambit. Not many still cling to the ancient ways. [He cups his hands toward Iroh.]
character_words: The guest has the first move.  I see you favor the white lotus gambit. Not many still cling to the ancient ways.

full_text: Those who do can always find a friend.
character_words: Those who do can always find a friend.

full_text: He copies the gesture of the old man, also cupping his hands toward him.
character_words: NA

full_text: Then let us play.
character_words: Then let us play.

full_text: The old man places a tile on the board, quickly followed by a tile placed by Iroh. Seemingly without even looking at what the other person is doing, the two man quickly place their tiles on the board. Zuko sits down and watches intently as the two man place one tile after the other. When they are done, their tiles form the shape of a lotus flower.
character_words: NA

full_text: Welcome, brother. The White Lotus opens wide to those who know her secrets.
character_words: Welcome, brother. The White Lotus opens wide to those who know her secrets.

full_text: What are you old gasbags talking about?
character_words: What are you old gasbags talking about?

full_text: I always tried to tell you that Pai Sho is more than just a game.
character_words: I always tried to tell you that Pai Sho is more than just a game.

full_text:
Iroh rolls a tile over his knuckles and clutches it.
Cut to a shot of Xin Fu and Yu. Xin Fu ran out of patience and jumps up.
character_words: NA

full_text: I'm not waiting all night for these geezers to finish yapping! [He walks over to the Pai Sho table, followed by Yu.] It's over! You two fugitives are coming with me!
character_words: I'm not waiting all night for these geezers to finish yapping!  It's over! You two fugitives are coming with me!

full_text: [Quickly places himself before Iroh and Zuko, preventing Xin Fu and Yu from reaching them.] I knew it! You two are wanted criminals with a giant bounty on your heads!
character_words: I knew it! You two are wanted criminals with a giant bounty on your heads!

full_text: I thought you said he would help!
character_words: I thought you said he would help!

full_text: [Places a hand on Zuko's shoulder to reassure him.] He is. Just watch.
character_words: He is. Just watch.

full_text: [To Yu and Xin Fu.] You think you're going to capture them and collect all that gold?
character_words: You think you're going to capture them and collect all that gold?

full_text: Gold?
character_words: Gold?

full_text: Every person in the bar looks up when they hear the word 'gold'. Some of them stand up, pulling a knife, ready to attack.
character_words: NA

full_text: Uh ... Maybe we shouldn't.
character_words: Uh ... Maybe we shouldn't.

full_text:
Camera shows a close-up of a grinning Xin Fu. As he moves toward Zuko and Iroh, two men jump in front of him to block his path. With a reverse roundhouse kick, the earthbender bends a rock from the ground and easily pushes them out of his way.
Yu readies himself for battle. He sinks the first person to charge him into the ground. Meanwhile Xin Fu kicks two sandbenders away while he is lifting another one up in the air and holding a fourth one back with his other hand. After he kicks another sandbender away, he twists his waist, sending the two men he is holding flying. One of them crashes into the wall behind the bar.
When there is no one left to fight, Xin Fu and Yu realize that their prey has escaped during the chaos. Xin Fu growls in frustration and slams his two fists on the ground, erecting a giant pillar of earth under a downed sandbender, shooting him out of the window and against a palm tree.
Cut to a scorpion walking over a rock. The camera shows how Momo is patting the sand he used to cover up Sokka while he is sleeping. He jumps away as Katara approaches Sokka to wake him up.
character_words: NA

full_text: Come on, get up. We need to go.
character_words: Come on, get up. We need to go.

full_text: Sokka drowsily sits up and smiles like a drunken idiot. Toph also erects herself, smacking her lips.
character_words: NA

full_text: Yesterday my mouth tasted like mud. Now it just tastes like sand. I never thought I'd miss the taste of mud so much.
character_words: Yesterday my mouth tasted like mud. Now it just tastes like sand. I never thought I'd miss the taste of mud so much.

full_text: Katara goes to Aang to wake him up, but he interrupts her before she can touch him.
character_words: NA

full_text: I'm awake. I couldn't sleep.
character_words: I'm awake. I couldn't sleep.

full_text: Well, we need to get moving if we want to get out of this sand pit.
character_words: Well, we need to get moving if we want to get out of this sand pit.

full_text: Aang and Katara spot something large in the sky. He quickly sits up. Cut to a shot of a large, bison shaped object floating by the bright, full moon. Aang's expression brightens up in an instant.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Joyfully.] Appa!
character_words: Appa!

full_text: Appa‌? But why would Princess Yue need him‌? She's the moon! [Grabs Momo's tail, using it to rub his cheek.] She flies by herself!
character_words: Appa‌? But why would Princess Yue need him‌? She's the moon!  She flies by herself!

full_text: A closer shot of the floating object reveals that it is just a small desert cloud.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Sadly.] It's just a cloud. Wait! A cloud! [Offers he pouch to Aang.] Here, fly up and bend the water from that cloud into my pouch.
character_words: It's just a cloud. Wait! A cloud!  Here, fly up and bend the water from that cloud into my pouch.

full_text: Aang gives Katara an angry look before snatching the offered water pouch out of her hands. The group gazes at him as he quickly passes two times over the cloud. The few remains of the cloud evaporate. He throws the pouch at Katara when he lands and she peeks in.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Disappointed.] Wow ... there's hardly any in here.
character_words: Wow ... there's hardly any in here.

full_text: [Lashes out.] I'm sorry, okay! It's a desert cloud; I did all I could! What's anyone else doing?! [Pointing his staff at Katara.] What are you doing‌?!
character_words: I'm sorry, okay! It's a desert cloud; I did all I could! What's anyone else doing?!  What are you doing‌?!

full_text: She returns his attack with a shocked look on her face.
character_words: NA

full_text: Trying to keep everyone together. Let's just get moving. We need to head this direction.
character_words: Trying to keep everyone together. Let's just get moving. We need to head this direction.

full_text: Katara looks at her charts once more and leads the group in the chosen direction. They are walking silently through the desert, until Toph trips and falls flat on her face. Aang and Katara are looking at Toph, while Sokka and Momo just stand there, staring blankly to the sky. Toph sits up and rubs her right foot.
character_words: NA

full_text: Ow! Crud! I am so sick of not feeling where I'm going! [Pointing toward the little rocklike shaped object she tripped over.] And what idiot buried a boat in the middle of the desert‌?
character_words: Ow! Crud! I am so sick of not feeling where I'm going!  And what idiot buried a boat in the middle of the desert‌?

full_text: A boat‌?
character_words: A boat‌?

full_text: Katara runs over to inspect the object.
character_words: NA

full_text: Believe me, I kicked it hard enough to feel plenty of vibrations.
character_words: Believe me, I kicked it hard enough to feel plenty of vibrations.

full_text: Sokka turns around, swinging like a string puppet, to see what Katara is so excited about. Katara begins to rub of the sand of the object that appears to be made of wood. Aang steps forward, suggestively holding up his staff. As soon as Katara backs away, Aang swings his staff around, creating a mighty gust of wind, revealing a boat of some sort. Katara crawls aboard and examines it.
character_words: NA

full_text: It's one of the gliders the sandbenders use! And look! It's got some kind of compass on it! [Tapping the compass.] I bet it can point us out of here! Aang, you can bend a breeze so we can sail it. We're going to make it!
character_words: It's one of the gliders the sandbenders use! And look! It's got some kind of compass on it!  I bet it can point us out of here! Aang, you can bend a breeze so we can sail it. We're going to make it!

full_text:
Shot of Sokka laughing childishly while burying Momo in the sand.
Cut to a shot of a small village at the edge of the desert, where Zuko and Iroh follow the Pai Sho player into a flower shop.
character_words: NA

full_text: It is an honor to welcome such a high-ranking member of the Order of the White Lotus. Being a Grand Master, you must know so many secrets.
character_words: It is an honor to welcome such a high-ranking member of the Order of the White Lotus. Being a Grand Master, you must know so many secrets.

full_text: [Annoyed.] Now that you played Pai Sho, are you going to do some flower arranging, or is someone in this club going to offer some real help‌?
character_words: Now that you played Pai Sho, are you going to do some flower arranging, or is someone in this club going to offer some real help‌?

full_text: You must forgive my nephew. He is not an initiate and has little appreciation for the cryptic arts.
character_words: You must forgive my nephew. He is not an initiate and has little appreciation for the cryptic arts.

full_text: The Pai Sho player leads Iroh toward a door with a peephole in it. He knocks two times. A man slides open the small window in the door and peeks through.
character_words: NA

full_text: Who knocks at the guarded gate‌?
character_words: Who knocks at the guarded gate‌?

full_text: One who has eaten the fruit and tasted its mysteries.
character_words: One who has eaten the fruit and tasted its mysteries.

full_text: Iroh smiles as the door opens to let him and the Pai Sho player through. When Zuko attempts to follow them, the door slams shut in front of him. He looks at the door with a pout when Iroh opens the small window.
character_words: NA

full_text: I'm afraid it's members only. Wait out here.
character_words: I'm afraid it's members only. Wait out here.

full_text:
An annoyed Zuko frowns and crosses his arms as he rests against a nearby table. He leans over to sniff the plant on the table.
Switch to a shot of the desert where the sand-sailer is making great speed. Katara navigates it through the desert, while Aang's driving it forward using strong gusts of wind.
character_words: NA

full_text: The needle on this compass doesn't seem to be pointing north according to my charts.
character_words: The needle on this compass doesn't seem to be pointing north according to my charts.

full_text: Katara places her charts over the compass. Sokka sits beside her, dangling his legs over the edge and holding Momo by the tail, who glides in the opposite direction.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Dreamily.] Take it easy little lady. I'm sure the sand folks who built this baby know how to get around here.
character_words: Take it easy little lady. I'm sure the sand folks who built this baby know how to get around here.

full_text: Katara looks annoyed at Sokka. When she focuses her attention back toward the horizon in front of her, she gasps is comprehension when she sees a giant rock in the distance.
character_words: NA

full_text: That's what the compass is pointing to! That giant rock! It must be the magnetic center of the desert.
character_words: That's what the compass is pointing to! That giant rock! It must be the magnetic center of the desert.

full_text: [Ecstatic.] A rock‌?! Yes! Let's go!
character_words: A rock‌?! Yes! Let's go!

full_text: [Hopeful.] Maybe we can find some water there!
character_words: Maybe we can find some water there!

full_text: [Darkly.] Maybe we can find some sandbenders.
character_words: Maybe we can find some sandbenders.

full_text: Aang continues to send gusts of wind into the sails of the glider, directing it toward the rock. Switch to a shot of the glider at the base of the rock. The sun's already rising when team Avatar reaches the top.
character_words: NA

full_text: Ahhh ... Finally! Solid ground!
character_words: Ahhh ... Finally! Solid ground!

full_text: Toph happily lets herself drop flat on her back, moving her arms and legs back and forth, creating a rock angel. After she is done, the group starts to explore the caves that decorate the top of the rock. They enter a round tunnel. The cave's surface is covered with a yellow, gooey substance.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Breathes deeply.] I think my head is starting to clear out the cactus juice. And look!
character_words: I think my head is starting to clear out the cactus juice. And look!

full_text: Sokka dips his hand in the yellow goo and tastes it, sharing his find with Momo. They both spit it out and Sokka makes a disgusted gagging noise.
character_words: NA

full_text: Tastes like rotten penguin meat! Awww, I feel woozy.
character_words: Tastes like rotten penguin meat! Awww, I feel woozy.

full_text: [Irritated.] You've been hallucinating on cactus juice all day and then you just lick something you find stuck to the wall of a cave‌?!
character_words: You've been hallucinating on cactus juice all day and then you just lick something you find stuck to the wall of a cave‌?!

full_text: I have a natural curiosity.
character_words: I have a natural curiosity.

full_text: I don't think this is a normal cave. This was carved by something.
character_words: I don't think this is a normal cave. This was carved by something.

full_text: Yeah ... look at the shape.
character_words: Yeah ... look at the shape.

full_text: [Close-up of her feet.] There's something buzzing in here. [Camera pans up to her.] Something that's coming for us!
character_words: There's something buzzing in here.  Something that's coming for us!

full_text:
The camera shows how the group runs out of the cave, back into the open. Toph and Aang scream as the first buzzard wasp emerges. Aang pulls Toph down as it flies over their heads. A second wasp dives directly toward the camera.
Cut to a shot of the giant rock from a distance, followed by a shot of the hive as more buzzard wasps swarm out and surround the group. Aang blasts the first wasp to come near them away with a strong air current.
A second wasp lands on a nearby rock. The moment it touches it, Toph turns around to send the wasp flying again, shooting up the rock from underneath it.
Another buzzard wasp flies between Sokka and Toph. She hears it fly behind her so she lifts the rock beside her and throws it in the general direction of the sound. The giant rock is only inches apart from crushing Sokka.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Surprised.] What are you doing? That rock almost crushed me!
character_words: What are you doing? That rock almost crushed me!

full_text: Sorry, I can't tell where they are in the air!
character_words: Sorry, I can't tell where they are in the air!

full_text: A loud buzzing signals the passing of another wasp. Sokka readies his machete and runs after it.
character_words: NA

full_text: I got this one.
character_words: I got this one.

full_text: He ferociously swings his weapon back and forth at the camera.
character_words: NA

full_text: Sokka, there's nothing there!
character_words: Sokka, there's nothing there!

full_text: The camera pans back. He lowers his machete, looking around in search for his imagined foe.
character_words: NA

full_text: I guess my head's not as clear as I thought.
character_words: I guess my head's not as clear as I thought.

full_text: Cut to a close-up of a crouched up Momo. In the background, Katara backs a few steps in Aang's direction.
character_words: NA

full_text: We have to get out of here! I'm completely out of water to bend!
character_words: We have to get out of here! I'm completely out of water to bend!

full_text: A buzzard wasp swoops in from the sky and snatches up a screeching Momo as it flies away from the hive and the benders.
character_words: NA

full_text: Momo! I'm not losing anyone else out here.
character_words: Momo! I'm not losing anyone else out here.

full_text: Full of anger, he takes off on his glider in hot pursuit of Momo and the wasp. Katara and Sokka watch him go.
character_words: NA

full_text: Come on, we're going down.
character_words: Come on, we're going down.

full_text: They descend along a narrow ledge. Katara leads Toph by hand.
character_words: NA

full_text: Toph, shoot a rock right there. Fire!
character_words: Toph, shoot a rock right there. Fire!

full_text: Katara places Toph in the right direction. Toph kicks up some rocks and shoots them forward. The incoming buzzard wasp is shot down, taking several blows to the head. Sokka cheers, swinging his machete in the air.
character_words: NA

full_text: Yeah! You got it! She got it, right‌?
character_words: Yeah! You got it! She got it, right‌?

full_text: Yes. Now let's move.
character_words: Yes. Now let's move.

full_text:
Katara leads Toph on as they start to run along the ledge.
Shift to a close-up of Aang. He is still chasing the buzzard wasp that took Momo. A grave expression casts shadows on his face. He dives, emerging again straight underneath the wasp. As he turns, he directs a strong gust of wind at the wasp with a kick of his leg. The gust forces the wasp to release Momo out of its clutches. Momo tumbles down, but quickly regains control and begins to soar next to Aang. Aang looks from Momo toward the rising sun at the horizon. With an angry glare, he notices that the wasp is getting away. Aang glides down, flying close to the ground. Using the speed of his descent, he closes his glider and swings his staff down. A powerful wall of air splits the sand, racing toward the escaping wasp. The animal is hit in mid air, knocking it to the ground. With a dark glare, Aang just stares at the downed wasp before walking back in the direction of the giant rock. Momo follows him quickly, frightened by this merciless outburst of power.
Cut back to a shot of the giant rock, where buzzard wasps circle around Sokka and the rest, who've reached the sand-sailer at the base by now. Katara looks over Toph's shoulder, acting as her eyes.
character_words: NA

full_text: On your left!
character_words: On your left!

full_text:
Toph reacts immediately and shoots a rock at her left. The buzzard wasp takes the rock full in the chest, shrieking on impact before tumbling down.
The camera pans out, showing many more wasps hovering in the air. Suddenly, gigantic pillars of sand rise from the ground and scare off the swarm. Katara, Sokka and Toph lower their arms they had lifted to shield their heads from the sand. As the wind blows the dust away, the camera pans to the left, revealing several sandbenders. Aang lands before Katara, Sokka and Toph, ready to face the sandbenders.
Cut back to a shot of the flower shop in the desert village, where a sleeping Zuko is startled by the squeaking of the door. Iroh steps through as Zuko takes on a defensive stance.
character_words: NA

full_text: What's going on? Is the club meeting over‌?
character_words: What's going on? Is the club meeting over‌?

full_text: Everything is taken care of. We're heading to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: Everything is taken care of. We're heading to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: Iroh and Fung bow to each other in respect.
character_words: NA

full_text: Ba Sing Se? ‌Why would we go to the Earth Kingdom capital‌?
character_words: Ba Sing Se? ‌Why would we go to the Earth Kingdom capital‌?

full_text: [Calmly.] The city is filled with refugees. No one will notice two more.
character_words: The city is filled with refugees. No one will notice two more.

full_text: We can hide in plain sight there. And it's the safest place in the world from the Fire Nation. Even I couldn't break through to the city. [Happily shrugs his shoulders.]
character_words: We can hide in plain sight there. And it's the safest place in the world from the Fire Nation. Even I couldn't break through to the city.

full_text: A bell signals that someone has entered the shop. A young man approaches the group, holding up some papers.
character_words: NA

full_text: I have the passports for our guests, but there are two men out on the street looking for them.
character_words: I have the passports for our guests, but there are two men out on the street looking for them.

full_text: Xin Fu and Yu can be seen through a small window in the door of the flower shop. They are holding up a wanted poster that depicts Iroh and Zuko to man walking by.
character_words: NA

full_text: You seen these guys‌?
character_words: You seen these guys‌?

full_text: Shift back to a shot of the base of the giant rock, where the leader of the sandbenders confronts Aang and the rest.
character_words: NA

full_text: What are you doing in our land with a sandbender sailer? ‌ From the looks of it, you stole it from the Hami tribe.
character_words: What are you doing in our land with a sandbender sailer? ‌ From the looks of it, you stole it from the Hami tribe.

full_text: We found the sailer abandoned in the desert. We're traveling with the Avatar. [She gestures at Aang. The leader's eyes widen a bit at this information.] Our bison was stolen and we have to get to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: We found the sailer abandoned in the desert. We're traveling with the Avatar.  Our bison was stolen and we have to get to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: A young man to the right of the leader takes a step forward and aggressively addresses Katara.
character_words: NA

full_text: You dare accuse our people of theft while you ride in on a stolen sand sailer‌?!
character_words: You dare accuse our people of theft while you ride in on a stolen sand sailer‌?!

full_text: Close-up of Toph's misty, green eye, narrowing as she hears the young man's voice.
character_words: NA

full_text: Quiet, Ghashiun. No one accused our people of anything. If what they say is true, we must give them hospitality.
character_words: Quiet, Ghashiun. No one accused our people of anything. If what they say is true, we must give them hospitality.

full_text: Sorry, father.
character_words: Sorry, father.

full_text: Toph's eye widens.
character_words: NA

full_text: I recognize the son's voice. He's the one that stole Appa.
character_words: I recognize the son's voice. He's the one that stole Appa.

full_text: Are you sure?‌
character_words: Are you sure?‌

full_text: I never forget a voice.
character_words: I never forget a voice.

full_text: Aang's tunic flutters around him as he charges forward, threateningly brandishing his staff toward Ghashiun.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Angry.] You stole Appa! Where is he? ‌What did you do to him?
character_words: You stole Appa! Where is he? ‌What did you do to him?

full_text: Ghashiun cowers back.
character_words: NA

full_text: They're lying! They're the thieves!
character_words: They're lying! They're the thieves!

full_text: With an angry frown and a growl of frustration, Aang smacks his staff on the ground, obliterating one of the sandbender's sailers with a powerful blade of air.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Enraged.] Where is my bison‌?
character_words: Where is my bison‌?

full_text: The scene changes again to the flower shop, where a man exits the door, pulling two big flowerpots on a wooden wagon. After he leaves, Xin Fu and Yu walk toward the door. Xin Fu slams the door open with such ferocity that an overhanging plant comes crashing down. He shoves Zuko's and Iroh's wanted poster under the nose of the florist.
character_words: NA

full_text: Hey you, where are these men‌? I got a tip that they're in your shop.
character_words: Hey you, where are these men‌? I got a tip that they're in your shop.

full_text: [Calmly.] As you can see, no one is here but us.
character_words: As you can see, no one is here but us.

full_text: We know all about your secret back room. [To Xin Fu.] Kick it down.
character_words: We know all about your secret back room.  Kick it down.

full_text: Xin Fu charges the door like a mad bull and knocks it down along with the surrounding wall, with one mighty kick.
character_words: NA

full_text: Hey! That room is for flowers only!
character_words: Hey! That room is for flowers only!

full_text: Some unlucky soul has an incomplete Pai Sho set.
character_words: Some unlucky soul has an incomplete Pai Sho set.

full_text: Yu picks up a lotus tile that lies in the center of the room and shows it to Xin Fu, who angrily knocks it out of his hands.
character_words: NA

full_text: Let's go back to finding the girl.
character_words: Let's go back to finding the girl.

full_text:
The scene switches to the man pulling the wooden wagon with the two large pots over some dunes. Zuko's and Iroh's head emerges from underneath the flowers. They briefly peek around before sinking back into their pots.
Cut back to the desert where Aang is confronting the sandbenders.
character_words: NA

full_text: You tell me where he is now!
character_words: You tell me where he is now!

full_text: To emphasize his order, Aang sends a strong blast of air toward another sailer. The sandbenders watch in shock as it blows up.
character_words: NA

full_text: [To Ghashiun.] What did you do‌?
character_words: What did you do‌?

full_text: I-It wasn't me!
character_words: I-It wasn't me!

full_text: You said to put a muzzle on him!
character_words: You said to put a muzzle on him!

full_text: [Enraged.] You muzzled Appa‌?
character_words: You muzzled Appa‌?

full_text: Aang's eyes and tattoos start to glow as he enters the Avatar State. With a swing of his staff, he destroys the last of the sandbender's sailers.
character_words: NA

full_text: I'm sorry! I didn't know that it belonged to the Avatar!
character_words: I'm sorry! I didn't know that it belonged to the Avatar!

full_text: [With the voices of all the Avatars.] Tell me where Appa is!
character_words: Tell me where Appa is!

full_text: [Frightened.] I traded him! To some merchants! He's probably in Ba Sing Se by now! They were going to sell him there! [The sandbenders raise their hands as if to ward off the Avatar's bright, angry glare.] Please! We'll escort you out of the desert! We'll help however we can!
character_words: I traded him! To some merchants! He's probably in Ba Sing Se by now! They were going to sell him there!  Please! We'll escort you out of the desert! We'll help however we can!

full_text: The wind around Avatar Aang starts the swirl, as his anger is reaching its peak. Sokka pull Toph along with him as he starts to make a break for it, running away from his enraged friend.
character_words: NA

full_text: Just get out of here! Run!
character_words: Just get out of here! Run!

full_text:
Aang drops his staff. The wind around him forms a fast moving sphere, knocking up sand high into the sky. As everyone runs away, Katara stays put, staring sadly at the ground. The sandstorm engulfs her and Aang completely, obscuring them from the sight of the others. They brace themselves as the whirlwind swoops over them.
Aang's air sphere slowly lifts him up in the air, his teeth clenched and his hands cramped with rage. Katara grabs his right arm, preventing him from rising any further. The terrible face of an outraged Avatar looks down upon her, only to be met by Katara's sincere, sad expression. She pulls him back to the ground and presses him close against her chest. Sokka and Toph lower their arms as the wind becomes less violent. Tears are streaming down the Avatar's glowing eyes. Katara tries her best to hold on as her own tears well up. The air sphere slowly dissolves away as Aang leaves the Avatar state. His rage subsides to make room for pure, heartbreaking sadness.
Fade to credits.
character_words: NA

full_text: The team is situated at the waterfall pond. Sokka is surveying a map. Toph is sitting with her feet in the water, moving it back and forth. Aang is swimming while Katara is located at the top of the lake near the waterfall. Aang goes underwater for a moment and bends an ice cube around himself for amusement.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Excitedly.] Waterbending bomb! Yeah! [Jumps into the water.]
character_words: Waterbending bomb! Yeah!

full_text: The splash sends Aang out of the water, breaks his ice prison, and soaks Sokka, Toph, and the maps which he tried to protect.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Sure, five thousand year-old maps from the spirit library. Just splash some water on 'em.
character_words: Sure, five thousand year-old maps from the spirit library. Just splash some water on 'em.

full_text: Sorry. [Wrings her hair dry and bends the water off the map.]
character_words: Sorry.

full_text: So, did you figure out what route we're going to take?
character_words: So, did you figure out what route we're going to take?

full_text: Okay, we just got out of the desert, so we must be around here. And we need to go to Ba Sing Se, which is here. It looks like the only passage connecting the south to the north is this sliver of land called the Serpent's Pass.
character_words: Okay, we just got out of the desert, so we must be around here. And we need to go to Ba Sing Se, which is here. It looks like the only passage connecting the south to the north is this sliver of land called the Serpent's Pass.

full_text: You sure that's the best way to go?
character_words: You sure that's the best way to go?

full_text: It's the only way. I mean, it's not like we have Appa to fly us there.
character_words: It's the only way. I mean, it's not like we have Appa to fly us there.

full_text: [Quietly.] Shush up about Appa. Can't you at least try to be sensitive?
character_words: Shush up about Appa. Can't you at least try to be sensitive?

full_text: Katara, it's okay. I know I was upset about losing Appa before, but I just want to focus on getting to Ba Sing Se and telling the Earth King about the solar eclipse.
character_words: Katara, it's okay. I know I was upset about losing Appa before, but I just want to focus on getting to Ba Sing Se and telling the Earth King about the solar eclipse.

full_text: [Surprised.] Oh ... well, okay. I'm glad you're doing better.

full_text: Then to Ba Sing Se we go. No more distractions.
character_words: Then to Ba Sing Se we go. No more distractions.

full_text: Suddenly, three refugees arrive.
character_words: NA

full_text: Hello there, fellow refugees!
character_words: Hello there, fellow refugees!

full_text: So, you guys are headed to Ba Sing Se, too?
character_words: So, you guys are headed to Ba Sing Se, too?

full_text: Sure are. We're trying to get there before my wife Ying has her baby.
character_words: Sure are. We're trying to get there before my wife Ying has her baby.

full_text: Great! We can travel through the Serpent's Pass together.
character_words: Great! We can travel through the Serpent's Pass together.

full_text: The three refugees look up in shock.
character_words: NA

full_text: The Serpent's Pass? Only the truly desperate take that deadly route!
character_words: The Serpent's Pass? Only the truly desperate take that deadly route!

full_text: Deadly route. [Punches Sokka in the arm.] Great pick, Sokka!
character_words: Deadly route.  Great pick, Sokka!

full_text: Well, we are desperate.
character_words: Well, we are desperate.

full_text: You should come with us to Full Moon Bay. Ferries take refugees across the lake. It's the fastest way to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: You should come with us to Full Moon Bay. Ferries take refugees across the lake. It's the fastest way to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: And it's hidden, so the Fire Nation can't find it.
character_words: And it's hidden, so the Fire Nation can't find it.

full_text: Hmm ... peaceful ferry ride or deadly pass?
character_words: Hmm ... peaceful ferry ride or deadly pass?

full_text: At Full Moon Bay.
character_words: NA

full_text: I can't believe how many people's lives have been uprooted by the Fire Nation.
character_words: I can't believe how many people's lives have been uprooted by the Fire Nation.

full_text: We're all looking for a better life, safe behind the walls of Ba Sing Se.
character_words: We're all looking for a better life, safe behind the walls of Ba Sing Se.

full_text: A ferry departs. Zuko and Iroh are on board.

full_text: Who would have thought after all these years, I'd return to the scene of my greatest military disgrace ... [Turns away for a second before turning back with a floral hat on his head.] as a tourist!
character_words: Who would have thought after all these years, I'd return to the scene of my greatest military disgrace ...  as a tourist!

full_text: Look around. We're not tourists, we're refugees. [Sips food and spits it out.] Ugh! I'm sick of eating rotten food, sleeping in the dirt. I'm tired of living like this!
character_words: Look around. We're not tourists, we're refugees.  Ugh! I'm sick of eating rotten food, sleeping in the dirt. I'm tired of living like this!

full_text: Aren't we all? My name's Jet and these are my Freedom Fighters, Smellerbee and Longshot.
character_words: Aren't we all? My name's Jet and these are my Freedom Fighters, Smellerbee and Longshot.

full_text: Hey. [Longshot nods.]
character_words: Hey.

full_text: Hello.
character_words: Hello.

full_text: Here's the deal. I hear the captain's eating like a king while the refugees have to feed off his scraps. Doesn't seem fair, does it?
character_words: Here's the deal. I hear the captain's eating like a king while the refugees have to feed off his scraps. Doesn't seem fair, does it?

full_text: What sort of king is he eating like?
character_words: What sort of king is he eating like?

full_text: The fat, happy kind. [At this, Iroh's mouth hangs open as he starts to drool.] You want to help us "liberate" some food?
character_words: The fat, happy kind.  You want to help us "liberate" some food?

full_text: [Tosses the bowl of rotten food into the water.] I'm in.

full_text:
Jet smirks. 
Back at the station.

full_text: I told you already ... no vegetables on the ferry! One cabbage slug could destroy the entire ecosystem of Ba Sing Se! Security!
character_words: I told you already ... no vegetables on the ferry! One cabbage slug could destroy the entire ecosystem of Ba Sing Se! Security!

full_text: A platypus bear destroys the cabbage cart.

full_text: Next!
character_words: Next!

full_text: Um, four tickets for the ferry to Ba Sing Se, please.
character_words: Um, four tickets for the ferry to Ba Sing Se, please.

full_text: Passports?
character_words: Passports?

full_text: Uh ... no one told us we had to have passports.
character_words: Uh ... no one told us we had to have passports.

full_text: Don't you know who this is? He's the Avatar!
character_words: Don't you know who this is? He's the Avatar!

full_text: Ah, I see fifty Avatars a day and, by the way, not a very impressive costume. [The screen pans to show several impostors; notices Momo.] Besides, no animals allowed. Do I need to call security?
character_words: Ah, I see fifty Avatars a day and, by the way, not a very impressive costume.  Besides, no animals allowed. Do I need to call security?

full_text: That won't be necessary.

character_words: I'll take care of this. My name is Toph Beifong, and I'll need four tickets.

full_text: Ah, the golden seal of the flying boar! It is my pleasure to help anyone of the Beifong family.
character_words: Ah, the golden seal of the flying boar! It is my pleasure to help anyone of the Beifong family.

full_text: It is your pleasure. As you can see, I am blind and these three imbeciles are my valets. [Sweeps her arm behind her, presenting her friends to the hesitant clerk.]
character_words: It is your pleasure. As you can see, I am blind and these three imbeciles are my valets.

full_text: But, the animal-

character_words: -is my seeing-eye lemur.

full_text: Well, normally it's only one ticket per passport, but this document is so official ... I guess it's worth four tickets. [Stamps an approval seal on the tickets.]
character_words: Well, normally it's only one ticket per passport, but this document is so official ... I guess it's worth four tickets.

full_text: Thank you very much.

full_text: All right, we scammed that lady good!
character_words: All right, we scammed that lady good!

full_text: Tickets and passports please.
character_words: Tickets and passports please.

full_text: Is there a problem?

full_text: Yeah, I got a problem with you! I've seen your type before. Probably sarcastic, think you're hilarious and let me guess, you're traveling with the Avatar.
character_words: Yeah, I got a problem with you! I've seen your type before. Probably sarcastic, think you're hilarious and let me guess, you're traveling with the Avatar.

full_text: Do I know you?

character_words: You mean you don't remember? Maybe you'll remember this!

full_text: Suki! [Embraces her.]
character_words: Suki!

full_text: Sokka, it's good to see you!
character_words: Sokka, it's good to see you!

full_text: Later, in a different location of the station. The gang and Suki talk.

full_text: You look so different without your makeup! And the new outfit.
character_words: You look so different without your makeup! And the new outfit.

full_text: That crabby lady makes all the security guards wear them. And look at you, sleeveless guy. Been working out?
character_words: That crabby lady makes all the security guards wear them. And look at you, sleeveless guy. Been working out?

full_text: Ahhh, I'll grab a tree branch and do a few chin touches every now and then. Nothing major.
character_words: Ahhh, I'll grab a tree branch and do a few chin touches every now and then. Nothing major.

full_text: Are the other Kyoshi Warriors around?
character_words: Are the other Kyoshi Warriors around?

full_text: Yeah. After you left Kyoshi, we wanted to find a way to help people. We ended up escorting some refugees and we've been here ever since. [Momo jumps up next to her.] Hi, Momo! Good to see you too! [Scratches his head near his ear.] So why are you guys getting tickets for the ferry? Wouldn't you just fly across on Appa?
character_words: Yeah. After you left Kyoshi, we wanted to find a way to help people. We ended up escorting some refugees and we've been here ever since.  Hi, Momo! Good to see you too!  So why are you guys getting tickets for the ferry? Wouldn't you just fly across on Appa?

full_text: Appa is missing. We hope to find him in Ba Sing Se.
character_words: Appa is missing. We hope to find him in Ba Sing Se.

full_text: I'm so sorry to hear that. [To Aang.] Are you doing okay?
character_words: I'm so sorry to hear that.  Are you doing okay?

full_text: I'm doing fine. Would everybody stop worrying about me?
character_words: I'm doing fine. Would everybody stop worrying about me?

full_text: Avatar Aang, you have to help us! Someone took all of our belongings; our passports, our tickets, everything's gone!
character_words: Avatar Aang, you have to help us! Someone took all of our belongings; our passports, our tickets, everything's gone!

full_text: I'll talk to the lady for you.
character_words: I'll talk to the lady for you.

full_text: Back at the desk.

full_text: No passports, no tickets! [Stamps a "denied" stamp on Aang's forehead.]

full_text: But she's pregnant and all of her stuff was stolen! You have to make an exception!
character_words: But she's pregnant and all of her stuff was stolen! You have to make an exception!

full_text: No exceptions! If I just gave away tickets willy-nilly to anyone, there would be no more order! You know what that means, no more civilization!
character_words: No exceptions! If I just gave away tickets willy-nilly to anyone, there would be no more order! You know what that means, no more civilization!

character_words: Next!

full_text: Don't worry, you'll get to the city safely. I'll lead you through the Serpent's Pass.
character_words: Don't worry, you'll get to the city safely. I'll lead you through the Serpent's Pass.

character_words: I can't believe we gave up our tickets and now we're going through the Serpent's Pass.

full_text: [In her normal Kyoshi Warrior attire.] I'm coming too!

full_text: Are you sure that's a good idea?
character_words: Are you sure that's a good idea?

full_text: Sokka, I thought you'd want me to come.

full_text: I do, it's just–

full_text: Outside, at the pass.
