full_text: Let's just stick with the professional version.
character_words: Let's just stick with the professional version.

full_text: Sokka angrily rips up his drawing.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Excitedly.] Come on, let's get busy! [Holds up some pamphlets.]
character_words: Come on, let's get busy!

full_text: Cut to Aang and Momo dropping dozens of posters all over Ba Sing Se. One poster falls in front of the camera, and the scene changes to tea shop where Zuko and Iroh are working. Iroh serves tea to two customers, who enjoy it. They approach him.
character_words: NA

full_text: So, you're the genius behind this incredible brew. The whole city is buzzing about you! I hope Pao pays you well.
character_words: So, you're the genius behind this incredible brew. The whole city is buzzing about you! I hope Pao pays you well.

full_text: Good tea is its own reward.
character_words: Good tea is its own reward.

full_text: But it doesn't have to be the only reward. How would you like to have your own tea shop?
character_words: But it doesn't have to be the only reward. How would you like to have your own tea shop?

full_text: [Frontal view. Pao looks around, concerned.] My own tea shop? This is a dream come true!
character_words: My own tea shop? This is a dream come true!

full_text: [Quickly moving to stand between the group.] What's going on here? Are you trying to poach my tea-maker?
character_words: What's going on here? Are you trying to poach my tea-maker?

full_text: Sorry Pao, but that's business for you, am I right?
character_words: Sorry Pao, but that's business for you, am I right?

full_text: Mushi, if you stay, I'll make you assistant manager. Wait, senior assistant manager!
character_words: Mushi, if you stay, I'll make you assistant manager. Wait, senior assistant manager!

full_text: I'll provide you with a new apartment in the Upper Ring. [Cut to Zuko, who was busy putting empty tea cups on a tray, but now looks up and glances over his shoulder to follow Quon's offer more closely; voice-over.] The tea shop is yours to do whatever you want, [Cut back to frontal shot of Quon.] complete creative freedom.
character_words: I'll provide you with a new apartment in the Upper Ring.  The tea shop is yours to do whatever you want,  complete creative freedom.

full_text: I even get to name the shop?
character_words: I even get to name the shop?

full_text: Of course!
character_words: Of course!

full_text: Uh, senior executive assistant manager?
character_words: Uh, senior executive assistant manager?

full_text: Iroh hands him the pot of tea and bows to the customer, agreeing to the terms. Zuko walks by, as Pao walks away sadly.
character_words: NA

full_text: Did you hear, nephew? This man wants to give us our own tea shop in the Upper Ring of the city!
character_words: Did you hear, nephew? This man wants to give us our own tea shop in the Upper Ring of the city!

full_text: That's right, young man, your life is about to change for the better!
character_words: That's right, young man, your life is about to change for the better!

full_text: [Sarcastically.] I'll try to contain my joy. [Walks outside, slams door shut.]
character_words: I'll try to contain my joy.

full_text:
As he walks outside, he grabs a falling Appa poster. He climbs to the top of a house and notices several of them falling. He searches the skies for any sign of the Avatar.
Back at the house. Sokka and Katara are playing a game. Toph is just relaxing as Aang re-enters.
character_words: NA

full_text: I just finished dropping all the leaflets. Has anyone come in with news about Appa?
character_words: I just finished dropping all the leaflets. Has anyone come in with news about Appa?

full_text: It's only been a day. Just be patient. [Aang sits.]
character_words: It's only been a day. Just be patient.

full_text: A knock at the door and Aang jumps up and runs to the door.
character_words: NA

full_text: Wow, you're right! Patience really pays off! [Opens the door.] Joo Dee?
character_words: Wow, you're right! Patience really pays off!  Joo Dee?

full_text: Hello, Aang, and Katara, and Sokka, and Toph.
character_words: Hello, Aang, and Katara, and Sokka, and Toph.

full_text: [They approach as Joo Dee enters.] What happened to you? Did the Dai Li throw you in jail?
character_words: What happened to you? Did the Dai Li throw you in jail?

full_text: What? Jail? Of course not. The Dai Li are the protectors of our cultural heritage.
character_words: What? Jail? Of course not. The Dai Li are the protectors of our cultural heritage.

full_text: But you disappeared at the Earth King's party.
character_words: But you disappeared at the Earth King's party.

full_text: Oh, I simply took a short vacation to Lake Laogai, out in the country. It was quite relaxing.
character_words: Oh, I simply took a short vacation to Lake Laogai, out in the country. It was quite relaxing.

full_text: But then they replaced you with some other woman who also said her name was Joo Dee.
character_words: But then they replaced you with some other woman who also said her name was Joo Dee.

full_text: [Surprised.] I'm Joo Dee.
character_words: I'm Joo Dee.

full_text: Why are you here?
character_words: Why are you here?

full_text: Dropping fliers and putting up posters isn't permitted within the city. Not without proper clearance.
character_words: Dropping fliers and putting up posters isn't permitted within the city. Not without proper clearance.

full_text: We can't wait around to get permission for everything.
character_words: We can't wait around to get permission for everything.

full_text: You are absolutely forbidden by the rules of the city to continue putting up posters.
character_words: You are absolutely forbidden by the rules of the city to continue putting up posters.

full_text: [Angrily yelling; during this brief argument, Aang is shown as a chibi.] We don't care about the rules and we're not asking permission! We're finding Appa on our own and you should just stay out of our way! [Slams the door as she exits.]
character_words: We don't care about the rules and we're not asking permission! We're finding Appa on our own and you should just stay out of our way!

full_text: That might come back to bite us in the blubber.
character_words: That might come back to bite us in the blubber.

full_text: [Calming down.] I don't care! From now on, we do whatever it takes to find Appa!
character_words: I don't care! From now on, we do whatever it takes to find Appa!

full_text: Yeah, let's break some rules! [Takes out a side of the house with earthbending.]
character_words: Yeah, let's break some rules!

full_text:
Momo flies out the broken side of the house and they all exit. Two Dai Li agents watch overhead from a house roof across the street. 
The scene changes to the Royal Palace, where Long Feng meets with that particular Joo Dee. Two Dai Li agents stand guard.
character_words: NA

full_text: I'm very disappointed in your work with the Avatar and his friends, Joo Dee. I had hoped that you would be able to control this situation.
character_words: I'm very disappointed in your work with the Avatar and his friends, Joo Dee. I had hoped that you would be able to control this situation.

full_text: I am so sorry, but they don't trust me anymore. [Starts getting upset.] I don't think I can keep working like this! [Begins to sob.]
character_words: I am so sorry, but they don't trust me anymore.  I don't think I can keep working like this!

full_text: Joo Dee, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.
character_words: Joo Dee, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.

full_text: [Camera zooms toward her eye as its iris dilates.] I am honored to accept his invitation.
character_words: I am honored to accept his invitation.

full_text: [Nods.] Good. Now go await further orders. [Joo Dee nods and begins to exit. Long Feng gets up and moves to the fireplace.] If the Avatar keeps searching for his bison, it could upset the delicate balance we've worked so hard to achieve in this city. It could even cost us control of the Earth King.
character_words: Good. Now go await further orders.  If the Avatar keeps searching for his bison, it could upset the delicate balance we've worked so hard to achieve in this city. It could even cost us control of the Earth King.

full_text: Should we take care of him?
character_words: Should we take care of him?

full_text: No. It's much too dangerous for us to confront him directly. Let's see if we can still handle this quietly.
character_words: No. It's much too dangerous for us to confront him directly. Let's see if we can still handle this quietly.

full_text: At Iroh and Zuko's place of stay, which is about to change. Zuko enters Iroh's room. Iroh is packing his clothes.
character_words: NA

full_text: So, I was thinking about names for my new tea shop. How about the Jasmine Dragon? It's dramatic, poetic, has a nice ring to it.
character_words: So, I was thinking about names for my new tea shop. How about the Jasmine Dragon? It's dramatic, poetic, has a nice ring to it.

full_text: [Shows Iroh the flyer.] The Avatar is here in Ba Sing Se and he's lost his bison.
character_words: The Avatar is here in Ba Sing Se and he's lost his bison.

full_text: [Grabs the flyer.] We have a chance for a new life here. [Cut to Zuko looking out a window.] If you start stirring up trouble, we could lose all the good things that are happening for us.
character_words: We have a chance for a new life here.  If you start stirring up trouble, we could lose all the good things that are happening for us.

full_text: [Turns to Iroh.] Good things that are happening for you! Have you ever thought that I want more from life than a nice apartment and a job serving tea?
character_words: Good things that are happening for you! Have you ever thought that I want more from life than a nice apartment and a job serving tea?

full_text: There is nothing wrong with a life of peace and prosperity. I suggest you think about what it is that you want from your life and why.
character_words: There is nothing wrong with a life of peace and prosperity. I suggest you think about what it is that you want from your life and why.

full_text: I want my destiny.
character_words: I want my destiny.

full_text: What that means is up to you. [Zuko walks away.] The Tea Weevil! No, that's stupid.
character_words: What that means is up to you.  The Tea Weevil! No, that's stupid.

full_text: Cut back to Team Avatar, who are working to put up more posters.
character_words: NA

full_text: We'll split up to cover more area. Toph, I guess you should just come with me.
character_words: We'll split up to cover more area. Toph, I guess you should just come with me.

full_text: [Peevishly.] Why? Because you think I can't put up posters on my own?! [Angrily takes the paintbrush of glue from Sokka and throws glue on the wall. She puts up a poster, but it is backward.] It's upside-down, isn't it? I'll just go with Sokka.
character_words: Why? Because you think I can't put up posters on my own?!  It's upside-down, isn't it? I'll just go with Sokka.

full_text: They all go their separate ways, with Toph following Sokka. Cut to an open square, where Katara is putting up a poster on a stone plinth near a flowing water stream. Suddenly, behind her, she hears a familiar voice call out.
character_words: NA

full_text: Katara?
character_words: Katara?

full_text: Jet is seen emerging from an alleyway at the edge of the square. Katara wheels around with a startled gasp.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Walks closer. Smiling confidently.] I think I can help you. [Katara's shocked blush transforms into a look of pure outrage. With a sweep of her arms, she bends up water from a lake directly at him while screaming in rage. Jet looks at the wave in fright.] Katara, I've changed!
character_words: I think I can help you.  Katara, I've changed!

full_text: The wave hits Jet, sending him back quite a distance.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Bending up remaining water from the wave.] Tell it to some other girl, Jet! [Turns the water to ice, which sends Jet back to a wall.]
character_words: Tell it to some other girl, Jet!

full_text: [Blocks the ice with his swords.] I don't want to fight you, I'm here to help!
character_words: I don't want to fight you, I'm here to help!

full_text: Throws his swords down, and reaches for something behind his back. Katara quickly fires more ice crystals, which pin him to the wall. The rest of the team approaches.
character_words: NA

full_text: Katara, what is it?
character_words: Katara, what is it?

full_text: Jet's back. [Close-up of Jet's face. Cut to aerial view before switching to a closer view of the group.] We can't trust anything Jet says.
character_words: Jet's back.  We can't trust anything Jet says.

full_text: But we don't even know why he's here!
character_words: But we don't even know why he's here!

full_text: I don't care why he's here, whatever the reason is, it can't be good!
character_words: I don't care why he's here, whatever the reason is, it can't be good!

full_text: I'm here to help you find Appa! [Opens his hand and reveals he is holding a missing Appa poster.]
character_words: I'm here to help you find Appa!

full_text: [Turning from the leaflet back to Katara.] Katara, we have to give him a chance.
character_words: Katara, we have to give him a chance.

full_text: I swear, I've changed! I was a troubled person and I let my anger get out of control, but I don't even have the gang now! I've put all that behind me!
character_words: I swear, I've changed! I was a troubled person and I let my anger get out of control, but I don't even have the gang now! I've put all that behind me!

full_text: You're lying!
character_words: You're lying!

full_text: [Walks up to Jet and feels the wall he is pinned to.] He's not lying.
character_words: He's not lying.

full_text: How can you tell?
character_words: How can you tell?

full_text: I can feel his breathing and heartbeat. When people lie, there's a physical reaction. He's telling the truth.
character_words: I can feel his breathing and heartbeat. When people lie, there's a physical reaction. He's telling the truth.

full_text: Katara, we don't have any leads. If Jet says he can take us to Appa, we have to check it out.
character_words: Katara, we don't have any leads. If Jet says he can take us to Appa, we have to check it out.

full_text: All right. [Points and looks angrily at Jet.] But we're not letting you out of our sight.
character_words: All right.  But we're not letting you out of our sight.

full_text: She stabs her finger at Jet once more for emphasis, eyes narrowed. Cut to Jet entering a dimly lit warehouse, which sits empty except for a few sacks and a pile of canvas and rope.
character_words: NA

full_text: This is the place I heard about.
character_words: This is the place I heard about.

full_text: There's nothing here.
character_words: There's nothing here.

full_text: [Preparing to waterbend in defense.] If this is a trap–
character_words: If this is a trap–

full_text: I told you, I work nearby! Two guys were talking about some giant furry creature they had, I figured it must be Appa!
character_words: I told you, I work nearby! Two guys were talking about some giant furry creature they had, I figured it must be Appa!

full_text: He was here! [She shows them a clump of Appa's fur.]
character_words: He was here!

full_text: [Sadly.] We missed him. [An old white haired man with a push-broom crosses behind the slumping Aang.]
character_words: We missed him.

full_text: They took that big thing yesterday. [Aang straightens with a shocked look.] Shipped him out to some island. About time, I've been cleaning up fur, and various, uhhh ... leavings all day.
character_words: They took that big thing yesterday.  Shipped him out to some island. About time, I've been cleaning up fur, and various, uhhh ... leavings all day.

full_text: [Aang swiftly moves closer to the man.] What island? Where's Appa?
character_words: What island? Where's Appa?

full_text: Foreman said some rich royal type on Whaletail Island bought him up. Guess for a zoo or such. Though, could be the meat that'd be good.
character_words: Foreman said some rich royal type on Whaletail Island bought him up. Guess for a zoo or such. Though, could be the meat that'd be good.

full_text: We've got to get to Whaletail Island! [Pauses.] Where's Whaletail Island? [Dejectedly.]
character_words: We've got to get to Whaletail Island!  Where's Whaletail Island?

full_text: [Looking at map.] Far, very far. [Puts the map on the ground as they all gather round.] Here it is. It's near the South Pole, almost all the way back home.
character_words: Far, very far.  Here it is. It's near the South Pole, almost all the way back home.

full_text: Aang, it will take us weeks just to get to the tip of the Earth Kingdom. And then we'll need to find a boat to get to the island.
character_words: Aang, it will take us weeks just to get to the tip of the Earth Kingdom. And then we'll need to find a boat to get to the island.

full_text: I don't care. We have a chance to find Appa! We have to try!
character_words: I don't care. We have a chance to find Appa! We have to try!

full_text: Must be nice to visit an island. I haven't had a vacation for years.
character_words: Must be nice to visit an island. I haven't had a vacation for years.

full_text: Don't you have some more hair to clean up?
character_words: Don't you have some more hair to clean up?

full_text: Shuffle on, I get you. No more need for Old Sweepy ...
character_words: Shuffle on, I get you. No more need for Old Sweepy ...

full_text: You're right Aang, right now our first concern has to be finding Appa. We can come back when we have him.
character_words: You're right Aang, right now our first concern has to be finding Appa. We can come back when we have him.

full_text: All right, let's get moving.
character_words: All right, let's get moving.

full_text: I'll come with you.
character_words: I'll come with you.

full_text: We don't need your help!
character_words: We don't need your help!

full_text: Why won't you trust me? [Walks after Sokka and Aang.]
character_words: Why won't you trust me?

full_text: Gee, I wonder.
character_words: Gee, I wonder.

full_text: [After Jet walks away.] Was this guy your boyfriend or something?
character_words: Was this guy your boyfriend or something?

full_text: What ... no!
character_words: What ... no!

full_text: [Smiles.] I can tell you're lying ... [Katara runs away from her.]
character_words: I can tell you're lying ...

full_text: Back within the city
character_words: NA

full_text: We can take the train out to the wall but then we'll have to walk.
character_words: We can take the train out to the wall but then we'll have to walk.

full_text: Don't worry, on the way back we'll be flying!
character_words: Don't worry, on the way back we'll be flying!

full_text: We're finally leaving Ba Sing Se. [Spreads her arms outward in celebration.] Worst ... city ... ever!
character_words: We're finally leaving Ba Sing Se.  Worst ... city ... ever!

full_text: Smellerbee and Longshot appear in the background and notice Jet.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Surprised.] Jet!
character_words: Jet!

full_text: [Looks at Jet angrily.] I thought you said you didn't have your "gang" anymore!
character_words: I thought you said you didn't have your "gang" anymore!

full_text: [Turns to look at Smellerbee, confused.] I don't!
character_words: I don't!

full_text: [Runs up to Jet and hugs him.] We were so worried. How did you get away from the Dai Li? [Camera quickly zooms in to Katara's shocked face.]
character_words: We were so worried. How did you get away from the Dai Li?

full_text: [Shocked.] The Dai Li?!
character_words: The Dai Li?!

full_text: I don't know what she's talking about!
character_words: I don't know what she's talking about!

full_text: He got arrested by the Dai Li a couple of weeks ago. We saw them drag him away!
character_words: He got arrested by the Dai Li a couple of weeks ago. We saw them drag him away!

full_text: Why would I be arrested? I've been living peacefully in the city!
character_words: Why would I be arrested? I've been living peacefully in the city!

full_text: [Feeling the ground between Jet and Smellerbee.] This doesn't make any sense. They're both telling the truth.
character_words: This doesn't make any sense. They're both telling the truth.

full_text: That's impossible.
character_words: That's impossible.

full_text: No it's not! Toph can't tell who's lying because they both think they're telling the truth. Jet's been brainwashed!
character_words: No it's not! Toph can't tell who's lying because they both think they're telling the truth. Jet's been brainwashed!

full_text: That's crazy! It can't be! [Glances to the sides.] Stay away from me!
character_words: That's crazy! It can't be!  Stay away from me!

full_text: They all surround him. Cut to the moon in the night sky. Cut to a Dai Li agent walking the streets. Zuko, disguised as the Blue Spirit, runs by.
character_words: NA

full_text: Out of my way, skinny!
character_words: Out of my way, skinny!

full_text: The agent prepares to use his rock glove, but pauses when the disguised man turns into an alley. The agent runs to the alley and sees a figure that appears to be him. He fires his rock gloves at the figure's chest and head, knocking off the stuffed figure's head and knocking it down.
character_words: NA

full_text: Huh?
character_words: Huh?

full_text: There is the whisper of a drawn blade behind him and Zuko, still disguised, captures him and places one of his swords to the agent's neck.
character_words: NA

full_text: If you don't want to end up like him, you'll do what I say.
character_words: If you don't want to end up like him, you'll do what I say.

full_text: Back in an unknown building, Team Avatar, Longshot, and Smellerbee all surrounding a seated Jet.
character_words: NA

full_text: The Dai Li must have sent Jet to mislead us, and that janitor was part of their plot, too!
character_words: The Dai Li must have sent Jet to mislead us, and that janitor was part of their plot, too!

full_text: I bet they have Appa here in the city. Maybe he's in the same place they took Jet! Where did they take you?
character_words: I bet they have Appa here in the city. Maybe he's in the same place they took Jet! Where did they take you?

full_text: Nowhere! I- I don't know what you're talking about!
character_words: Nowhere! I- I don't know what you're talking about!

full_text: We need to find a way to jog his real memories.
character_words: We need to find a way to jog his real memories.

full_text: [Teasingly.] Maybe Katara should kiss him. That should bring something back!
character_words: Maybe Katara should kiss him. That should bring something back!

full_text: Maybe you should kiss him, Sokka!
character_words: Maybe you should kiss him, Sokka!

full_text: Hey, just an idea!
character_words: Hey, just an idea!

full_text: A bad one.
character_words: A bad one.

full_text: Ooh, wait! I've got it!
character_words: Ooh, wait! I've got it!

full_text: Sokka plucks a straw from his mattress, pokes it into Jet's mouth in trademark fashion and regards him thoughtfully.
character_words: NA

full_text: I don't think it's working. [Spits it out.]
character_words: I don't think it's working.

full_text: Try to think of something from your past that triggers your emotions.
character_words: Try to think of something from your past that triggers your emotions.

full_text: The Fire Nation! Remember what they did to your family!
character_words: The Fire Nation! Remember what they did to your family!

full_text: Close your eyes. Picture it.
character_words: Close your eyes. Picture it.

full_text: Jet closes his eyes, while sweat beads start to form on his forehead. His eyes suddenly snap wide open and he sees images of himself at a younger age watching his town burning down and Mongke looking back at him.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Sweating.] No! It's too painful!
character_words: No! It's too painful!

full_text: Maybe this will help. [Takes water and puts it around his ears, using healing to clear his mind.]
character_words: Maybe this will help.

full_text: Jet looks up from the floor and sees an image of Long Feng standing above a lake. Long Feng stares at Jet, and Jet sinks down under the lake into an underground room. He sees an image of a Dai Li agent shining a spinning light in his face.
character_words: NA

full_text: They took me to a headquarters under the water. Like a lake!
character_words: They took me to a headquarters under the water. Like a lake!

full_text: Wait! Remember what Joo Dee said? She said she went on vacation to Lake Laogai!
character_words: Wait! Remember what Joo Dee said? She said she went on vacation to Lake Laogai!

full_text: [Stands up.] That's it! Lake Laogai.
character_words: That's it! Lake Laogai.

full_text: Fade to an aerial shot of Lake Laogai. The camera pans down to show Team Avatar, Jet, Longshot, and Smellerbee standing at the edge of the lake.
character_words: NA

full_text: So where's this secret headquarters?
character_words: So where's this secret headquarters?

full_text: Under the water, I think.
character_words: Under the water, I think.

full_text: There's a tunnel right there by the shore.
character_words: There's a tunnel right there by the shore.

full_text: Toph points to the side and whistles as she walks to the edge of the shore. She uses her earthbending to bring up a slab of rock with an entrance. She moves the rock out the way with the same technique. They all look down at the tunnel and Momo flies away. Cut to them inside the secret headquarters. Jet checks to make sure the coast is clear and they walk down a long hallway.
character_words: NA

full_text: It's all starting to come back to me!
character_words: It's all starting to come back to me!

full_text: Jet walks past a room where a member of the Dai Li brainwashes a group of women.
character_words: NA

full_text: I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.
character_words: We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.

full_text: We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.
character_words: We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.

full_text: I think there might be a cell big enough to hold Appa up ahead. I think it's through here! [Opens a door.]
character_words: I think there might be a cell big enough to hold Appa up ahead. I think it's through here!

full_text: Cut to Appa chained up as a door opens in his cell and Appa wakes up. Cut to Zuko standing at the door, disguised as the Blue Spirit.
character_words: NA

full_text: Expecting someone else?
character_words: Expecting someone else?

full_text: Jet opens the other door. An overhead shot reveals several Dai Li agents waiting on the ceiling. The door closes suddenly behind them. Lights turn on, revealing the agents.
character_words: NA

full_text: Now that's something different.
character_words: Now that's something different.

full_text: You have made yourselves enemies of the state. Take them into custody.
character_words: You have made yourselves enemies of the state. Take them into custody.

full_text:
The Dai Li agents jump off the ceiling and surround them. Two agents fire rock gloves, but Toph breaks them up and sends the two agents flying through the air with rock pillars. Jet runs toward the agents and breaks two other gloves fired by agents with his swords, and trips another. A full battle ensues. Aang deals with a pair of Dai Li agents. Sokka and Katara destroy two Dai Li gloves, but a second pair grabs them.
Toph saves them by creating a rock wall and she raises ground up. Toph knocks away the four Dai Li agents that attack her, but a glove captures her and Jet swings by to free her. The agent fires his other rock glove, and Longshot fires an arrow, which destroys the glove. Jet jumps in front of Longshot to hold off more of their rock attacks. Long Feng escapes.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Knocks away two agents with airbending.] Long Feng is escaping!
character_words: Long Feng is escaping!

full_text: Jet and Aang chase him. They head into another part of the headquarters with many pipes of all sizes sticking out of the walls, with some of them pouring out water, but are sealed in by Long Feng.
character_words: NA

full_text: All right, Avatar, you've caused me enough problems. This is your last chance ... if you want your bison back.
character_words: All right, Avatar, you've caused me enough problems. This is your last chance ... if you want your bison back.

full_text: You do have Appa! Tell me where he is!
character_words: You do have Appa! Tell me where he is!

full_text: Agree to exit the city now, and I'll waive all charges against you and allow you to leave with your lost pet.
character_words: Agree to exit the city now, and I'll waive all charges against you and allow you to leave with your lost pet.

full_text: [Gets in a fighting position.] You're in no position to bargain.
character_words: You're in no position to bargain.

full_text: Am I not?
character_words: Am I not?

full_text: [Gets into a fighting position.] You're definitely not!
character_words: You're definitely not!

full_text: Jet, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.
character_words: Jet, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.

full_text: [Close-up of his eye, his iris dilates.] I am honored to accept his invitation.
character_words: I am honored to accept his invitation.

full_text: Jet attacks Aang. Cut to Appa growling at the disguised Zuko. Appa tries to strike Zuko, but his chained feet hold him back.
character_words: NA

full_text: You're mine now.
character_words: You're mine now.

full_text: The door opens and Zuko gets into a fighting stance. Iroh enters.
character_words: NA

full_text: Uncle?
character_words: Uncle?

full_text: So, the Blue Spirit. I wonder who could be behind that mask ...
character_words: So, the Blue Spirit. I wonder who could be behind that mask ...

full_text: [Sighs and takes off the mask.] What are you doing here?
character_words: What are you doing here?

full_text: I was just about to ask you the same thing. What do you plan to do now that you've found the Avatar's bison? Keep him locked in our new apartment? Should I go put on a pot of tea for him?
character_words: I was just about to ask you the same thing. What do you plan to do now that you've found the Avatar's bison? Keep him locked in our new apartment? Should I go put on a pot of tea for him?

full_text: First I have to get it out of here.
character_words: First I have to get it out of here.

full_text: [Starts yelling.] And then what!? You never think these things through! [Points at him.] This is exactly what happened when you captured the Avatar at the North Pole! You had him, and then you had nowhere to go!
character_words: And then what!? You never think these things through!  This is exactly what happened when you captured the Avatar at the North Pole! You had him, and then you had nowhere to go!

full_text: I would have figured something out!
character_words: I would have figured something out!

full_text: No! If his friends hadn't found you, you would have frozen to death!
character_words: No! If his friends hadn't found you, you would have frozen to death!

full_text: I know my own destiny, Uncle!
character_words: I know my own destiny, Uncle!

full_text: Is it your own destiny, or is it a destiny someone else has tried to force on you?
character_words: Is it your own destiny, or is it a destiny someone else has tried to force on you?

full_text: Stop it, Uncle! I have to do this!
character_words: Stop it, Uncle! I have to do this!

full_text: I'm begging you, Prince Zuko! It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions. Who are you, and what do you want?
character_words: I'm begging you, Prince Zuko! It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions. Who are you, and what do you want?

full_text: Zuko screams loudly, throwing down his swords and Blue Spirit mask. Cut to the brainwashed Jet continuing to swing at Aang.
character_words: NA

full_text: Jet, it's me, Aang! [Runs back.] You don't have to do this!
character_words: Jet, it's me, Aang!  You don't have to do this!

full_text: I'm afraid he no longer has a choice.
character_words: I'm afraid he no longer has a choice.

full_text: Jet resumes his attempts at attacking Aang, who dodges them and uses airbending to knock him back. Jet uses his hook swords to stop himself and he pants heavily.
character_words: NA

full_text: Jet, I'm your friend! Look inside your heart!
character_words: Jet, I'm your friend! Look inside your heart!

full_text: Do your duty, Jet!
character_words: Do your duty, Jet!

full_text: He can't make you do this! [Cut to a close-up of Jet's face as he hangs his head, while panting and sweating.] You're a Freedom Fighter!
character_words: He can't make you do this!  You're a Freedom Fighter!

full_text: At these final words, Jet straightens in shock. Everything goes white and he has a rapid flashback of his past as a Freedom Fighter, seeing Longshot, Smellerbee, Pipsqueak and the Duke, and him with Katara. The Freedom Fighters cheer fades to him with Smellerbee and Longshot, before showing him sitting down with Iroh and Zuko. Fade to him giving the passengers food, and quickly to him being dragged away by the Dai Li. Fade more rapidly to Jet's brainwashing, and to Long Feng on Lake Laogai. Cut to his burning village, to Iroh, to him with Zuko, to him with Katara, to him watching his burning village crying. Cut to him in a Fire Nation camp, to him with Katara, and to him being brainwashed. Cut back to him crying while watching his village burn as Mongke watches. The flashback ends and Jet's irises return to normal.
character_words: NA

full_text: Do it! Do it now!
character_words: Do it! Do it now!

full_text: Jet fires a sword at Long Feng, which misses. Long Feng counters with an uplifted rock which strikes Jet down. Aang runs toward Jet as Long Feng escapes through a pipe in the wall.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Escaping upward to a pipe.] Foolish boy. You've chosen your own demise. [Exits.]
character_words: Foolish boy. You've chosen your own demise.

full_text: I'm sorry ... Aang.
character_words: I'm sorry ... Aang.

full_text: Don't be.
character_words: Don't be.

full_text: The rest of the group arrives, all struck with sorrow and shock as they gather around Jet. Katara stares open-mouthed at Jet, her hands hovering near her mouth in shock. Snapping out of it, she withdraws water from her water skin, with which she covers her hands, and it begins to glow as she kneels down next to him. Cut to a shot from over her shoulder, with Jet glancing at her while she rubs her hands over his chest in an attempt to heal him. After rubbing his chest three times, the glow fades, the water stains Jet's clothing, and Katara looks back over her shoulder toward the rest of the group.
character_words: NA

full_text: This isn't good.
character_words: This isn't good.

full_text: You guys go and find Appa. We'll take care of Jet.
character_words: You guys go and find Appa. We'll take care of Jet.

full_text: We're not going to leave you.
character_words: We're not going to leave you.

full_text: There's no time. Just go. We'll take care of him. He's our leader.
character_words: There's no time. Just go. We'll take care of him. He's our leader.

full_text: They stare at Longshot in surprise.
character_words: NA

full_text: Don't worry, Katara. I'll be fine. [Smiles a little.]
character_words: Don't worry, Katara. I'll be fine.

full_text: Katara closes her eyes in painful sadness and opens them again as she rises. Team Avatar begins to exit.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Whispering to Sokka.] He's lying ...
character_words: He's lying ...

full_text:
Cut to a close-up of Smellerbee crying. Longshot watches Team Avatar completely leave through a tunnel that is earthbent open before turning the other way to the other exit and standing guard, prepping an arrow. Smellerbee is seen kneeling next to Jet, rubbing her hands back and forth over him, with her right hand on his forehead.
Team Avatar reaches Appa's hold, only to discover that it is empty.
character_words: NA

full_text: Appa's gone! Long Feng beat us here.
character_words: Appa's gone! Long Feng beat us here.

full_text: If we keep moving, maybe we can catch up with them!
character_words: If we keep moving, maybe we can catch up with them!

full_text: They find an exit back to the beach. As they make their escape, several Dai Li agents jump out from behind them.
character_words: NA

full_text: You think we can outrun them?
character_words: You think we can outrun them?

full_text: I don't think it's gonna matter!
character_words: I don't think it's gonna matter!

full_text: Another group of Dai Li agents, plus Long Feng, stand in front of them. All the agents box them in, lifting up the ground on both sides. Dai Li agents stand on all three walls. Momo flies to Aang.
character_words: NA

full_text: What is it, Momo?
character_words: What is it, Momo?

full_text: Momo flies to the sky. Suddenly, Appa flies down.
character_words: NA

full_text: Appa!
character_words: Appa!

full_text: Appa smashes through the rock walls, scattering the Dai Li agents. Aang and Toph use earthbending to knock other nearby agents off a cliff and into the lake. Appa confronts Long Feng.
character_words: NA

full_text: I can handle you by myself.
character_words: I can handle you by myself.

full_text: Long Feng charges at Appa, but Appa grab his leg and throws him skipping into the lake. Appa spits out Long Feng's shoe. The team cheers and they run toward Appa.
character_words: NA

full_text: Yeah! Appa!
character_words: Yeah! Appa!

full_text: [Happily crying.] I missed you, buddy.
character_words: I missed you, buddy.

full_text: Appa closes his eyes. A teary-eyed Katara somberly looks over Lake Laogai as they fly over it on Appa. Aang places his hand on her shoulder. The team all gathers in a group hug. Zuko and Iroh emerge from the Dai Li headquarters.
character_words: NA

full_text: You did the right thing, nephew. [Zuko looks at his Blue Spirit mask as Iroh rests a hand on its shoulder.] Leave it behind.
character_words: You did the right thing, nephew.  Leave it behind.

full_text: Zuko walks to the edge and tosses the mask into the water, where it slowly sinks to the bottom of the lake. Fade to credits.
character_words: NA

full_text: The episode opens just outside the vast waters of Lake Laogai. Team Avatar has stopped on a tiny islet in the center of the lake. Aang is embracing Appa, happy upon reuniting with him.
character_words: NA

full_text: I missed you more than you'll ever know, buddy. [Momo flies into Appa to hug him too. Appa licks Aang, which causes Aang to laugh.]
character_words: I missed you more than you'll ever know, buddy.

full_text: Sokka approaches Katara and Toph.
character_words: NA

full_text: Look, we escaped from the Dai Li. We got Appa back. I'm telling you, we should go to the Earth King now and tell him our plan. We're on a roll.
character_words: Look, we escaped from the Dai Li. We got Appa back. I'm telling you, we should go to the Earth King now and tell him our plan. We're on a roll.

full_text: One good hour after weeks of trouble isn't much of a roll.
character_words: One good hour after weeks of trouble isn't much of a roll.

full_text: We can build on it. If we want to invade the Fire Nation when the eclipse happens, we'll need the Earth King's support.
character_words: We can build on it. If we want to invade the Fire Nation when the eclipse happens, we'll need the Earth King's support.

full_text: What makes you think we'll get it? I don't know if you've noticed, but things don't usually go that smoothly for our little gang.
character_words: What makes you think we'll get it? I don't know if you've noticed, but things don't usually go that smoothly for our little gang.

full_text: I know, but I've got a good feeling about this. This time will be different.
character_words: I know, but I've got a good feeling about this. This time will be different.

full_text: Sokka, Long Feng is in control of the city. His conspiracy with the Dai Li is too powerful. I think we should just keep flying and leave this horrible place behind us.
character_words: Sokka, Long Feng is in control of the city. His conspiracy with the Dai Li is too powerful. I think we should just keep flying and leave this horrible place behind us.

full_text: I'm with Sweetness. I've seen enough of Ba Sing Se. [Raises arms and opens eyes wide.] And I can't even see!
character_words: I'm with Sweetness. I've seen enough of Ba Sing Se.  And I can't even see!

full_text: Aang flies into the shot.
character_words: NA

full_text: But now that we have Appa back, there's nothing stopping us from telling the Earth King the truth. About the conspiracy and the War.
character_words: But now that we have Appa back, there's nothing stopping us from telling the Earth King the truth. About the conspiracy and the War.

full_text: See? Aang's with me. [Puts his arm around Aang and smiles.] It's the whole reason we came here in the first place. We have to try.
character_words: See? Aang's with me.  It's the whole reason we came here in the first place. We have to try.

full_text: [Thinks for a moment.] Well, I guess if the Earth King knew the truth, things could change. [Sokka and Aang smile.]
character_words: Well, I guess if the Earth King knew the truth, things could change.

full_text: [Stands up.] I don't trust the new positive Sokka. [Points at Sokka in an accusing manner.] Long Feng brainwashed you, didn't he!?
character_words: I don't trust the new positive Sokka.  Long Feng brainwashed you, didn't he!?

full_text: Aang notices a few ships in the lake.
character_words: NA

full_text: That's probably the Dai Li searching for us. [To Katara.] So?
character_words: That's probably the Dai Li searching for us.  So?

full_text: Katara thinks for a moment before looking at Sokka.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Determined.] Let's fly!
character_words: Let's fly!

full_text: They fly toward the Palace, now with no saddle, holding onto Appa's fur for dear life, especially Toph.
character_words: NA

full_text: Can we please buy a new saddle? Riding bareback is terrifying! [Buries face in Appa's back.]
character_words: Can we please buy a new saddle? Riding bareback is terrifying!

full_text: They get closer to the palace.
character_words: NA

full_text: There it is! That whole thing is the palace! The Earth King's chamber should be in the center!
character_words: There it is! That whole thing is the palace! The Earth King's chamber should be in the center!

full_text: We have to be careful. Long Feng's probably warned the king that we're coming.
character_words: We have to be careful. Long Feng's probably warned the king that we're coming.

full_text: Why would you assume that? If you ask me, I think we're just gonna sail right in and- [A giant rock almost hits them.] Aahh!
character_words: Why would you assume that? If you ask me, I think we're just gonna sail right in and-  Aahh!

full_text: What was that?
character_words: What was that?

full_text: Surface-to-air rocks! [Sees more being launched.] More incoming!
character_words: Surface-to-air rocks!  More incoming!

full_text: They dodge a few more rocks. One gets launched right at Aang, but he destroys it with his hand. Another is launched at them head on, but Aang slices it cleanly in two by swinging his staff at the rock to augment his earthbending. He launches himself from Appa to the front of the palace and slams his staff into the ground, generating a massive earthen wave to knock back the palace guards. Appa lands and roars at the captain's ostrich horse, which causes it to drop the captain and run off. As they continue toward the Earth King, more guards appear and launch earth cubes at the gang. Toph and Aang use earthbending to block the attacks, while Katara uses waterbending to subdue the guards.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Water whips two guards.] Sorry!
character_words: Sorry!

full_text: Katara turns around and strikes down more guards with her waterbending, though closes her right eye in a sympathetic flinch for a moment as she does so. As more guards rush toward them in an attempt to halt Team Avatar's progress, Toph uses her earthbending to flip the tiles of the walkway, trapping them between them and ensuring a clear passage for the team.
character_words: NA

full_text: Sorry! We just need to get through to see the Earth King!
character_words: Sorry! We just need to get through to see the Earth King!

full_text: More guards appear on the opposite end of a bridge and launch two giant statues at them. Toph and Aang create an earth igloo to block the statues. Katara creates an ice ramp to jump to the other side of the bridge and water-whips the guards into the water. Aang freezes them in the water as the rest all jump across. More surface-to-air rocks appear as guards are coming down a giant staircase. Toph uses earthbending to change the stairs into a ramp, causing them all to fall. She and Aang use earthbending to escalate themselves up the stairs.
character_words: NA

full_text: Seriously, we're actually on your guys' side! [Pauses for a moment.] Sorry.
character_words: Seriously, we're actually on your guys' side!  Sorry.

full_text: More guards come and Aang and Toph push them away with earthbending.
character_words: NA

full_text: In there! [They enter the palace.]
character_words: In there!

full_text: They come to an area with three doors. More guards appear and Toph easily defeats them all.
character_words: NA

full_text: Toph, which way to the Earth King?
character_words: Toph, which way to the Earth King?

full_text: How should I know? I'm still voting we leave Ba Sing Se.
character_words: How should I know? I'm still voting we leave Ba Sing Se.

full_text: Toph defeats more guards while Sokka opens the doors to find the Earth King. The first room is empty, as is the second; outside the second door, a royal guard goes flying to the right off-screen. Sokka bursts into a third room, startling a woman.
character_words: NA

full_text: Burglar! [Tries to run, trips, and falls flat on her face.]
character_words: Burglar!

full_text: [Shuts the door.] Sorry. Wrong door.
character_words: Sorry. Wrong door.

full_text: Meanwhile, Zuko and Iroh return from Lake Laogai. The former seems ill.
character_words: NA

full_text: You did the right thing. Letting the Avatar's bison go free.
character_words: You did the right thing. Letting the Avatar's bison go free.

full_text: I don't feel right. [Gets dizzy and passes out.]
character_words: I don't feel right.

full_text: Zuko! [Rushes to him.]
character_words: Zuko!

full_text: Back at the palace, the team arrives at a pile of rubble. Sokka climbs atop it and sees a gigantic door.
character_words: NA

full_text: Now that's an impressive door. It's gotta go somewhere. [Drops down from the rubble and attempts to kick the door open.] Yaaah! [The door does not move even slightly. Sokka starts trying to push it open, but to no avail. Toph and Aang jump in from behind and bust the door down, knocking Sokka forward in the process. He starts rubbing the back of his head.] A little warning next time?
character_words: Now that's an impressive door. It's gotta go somewhere.  Yaaah!  A little warning next time?

full_text: They arrive in the Earth King's chamber with Kuei sitting in his throne. Long Feng and his Dai Li agents stand in their way. The team takes fighting stances against them.
character_words: NA

full_text: We need to talk to you.
character_words: We need to talk to you.

full_text: [Turns to face the Earth King.] They're here to overthrow you.
character_words: They're here to overthrow you.

full_text: No, we're on your side. We're here to help.
character_words: No, we're on your side. We're here to help.

full_text: You have to trust us.
character_words: You have to trust us.

full_text: [Stands up with a rising aggravated tone.] You invade my palace, lay waste to all my guards, break down my fancy door, and you expect me to trust you?
character_words: You invade my palace, lay waste to all my guards, break down my fancy door, and you expect me to trust you?

full_text: He has a good point.
character_words: He has a good point.

full_text: If you are on my side, then drop your weapons and stand down!
character_words: If you are on my side, then drop your weapons and stand down!

full_text: They look at each other for a moment. Aang drops his staff, Katara puts her water whip back in her water skin, Sokka drops his machete, and Toph drops the boulder she is levitating.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Smiles.] See? We're friends, Your Earthiness. [Gives a slight nervous chuckle.]
character_words: See? We're friends, Your Earthiness.

full_text: The king says nothing and just continues to frown grimly. Long Feng signals the Dai Li to cuff their arms with rock gloves.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Smiles sinisterly.] Detain the assailants!
character_words: Detain the assailants!

full_text: The Dai Li rush behind Team Avatar.
character_words: NA

full_text: But we dropped our weapons. We're your allies.
character_words: But we dropped our weapons. We're your allies.

full_text: Make sure the Avatar and his friends never see daylight again. [The king looks at him shocked.]
character_words: Make sure the Avatar and his friends never see daylight again.

full_text: The Avatar? [Points at Sokka.] You're the Avatar?
character_words: The Avatar?  You're the Avatar?

full_text: Uh, no. Him. [Nudges his head at Aang.]
character_words: Uh, no. Him.

full_text: [Effortlessly breaks free of his earth cuffs and raises his arms.] Over here. [Re-attaches the cuffs.]
character_words: Over here.

full_text: What does it matter, Your Highness? They're enemies of the state.
character_words: What does it matter, Your Highness? They're enemies of the state.

full_text: Perhaps you're right. [Sees Bosco sniff and lick Aang, who laughs, and smiles at Long Feng.] Though Bosco seems to like him. [Looks back at the team.] I'll hear what he has to say. [Long Feng glares at Aang.]
character_words: Perhaps you're right.  Though Bosco seems to like him.  I'll hear what he has to say.

full_text: [Walks forward.] Well, sir, there's a war going on right now. For the past one hundred years in fact. The Dai Li's kept it secret from you. It's a conspiracy to control the city, and to control you.
character_words: Well, sir, there's a war going on right now. For the past one hundred years in fact. The Dai Li's kept it secret from you. It's a conspiracy to control the city, and to control you.

full_text: A secret war? That's crazy!
character_words: A secret war? That's crazy!

full_text: Completely!
character_words: Completely!

full_text: Long Feng didn't want us to tell you, so he stole our sky bison to blackmail us. And blackmail is the least of his crimes; he brainwashed our friend!
character_words: Long Feng didn't want us to tell you, so he stole our sky bison to blackmail us. And blackmail is the least of his crimes; he brainwashed our friend!

full_text: [Quickly turns to face the king.] All lies. I've never even seen a sky bison, Your Majesty. Frankly, I thought they were extinct.
character_words: All lies. I've never even seen a sky bison, Your Majesty. Frankly, I thought they were extinct.

full_text: [Sits down.] Your claim is difficult to believe. Even from an Avatar.
character_words: Your claim is difficult to believe. Even from an Avatar.

full_text: [Whispers in his ear.] These hooligans are part of an anarchist cell that my agents have been tracking for weeks. If you listen to them, you're playing right into your own destruction.
character_words: These hooligans are part of an anarchist cell that my agents have been tracking for weeks. If you listen to them, you're playing right into your own destruction.

full_text: [Thinks for a moment.] I have to trust my advisor.
character_words: I have to trust my advisor.

full_text: The agents start taking the team away, but Sokka stops for a moment.
character_words: NA

full_text: Wait! [Turns to face the king with a big smile.] I can prove he's lying. Long Feng said he's never seen a sky bison. Ask him to lift his robe.
character_words: Wait!  I can prove he's lying. Long Feng said he's never seen a sky bison. Ask him to lift his robe.

full_text: What? I am not disrobing! [The king looks thoughtful before looking at Sokka suspiciously.]
character_words: What? I am not disrobing!

full_text: Aang and Sokka smile slyly and nod at each other. Aang blows a large gust of air at Long Feng's legs, lifting his robe and revealing a bite mark left by Appa.
character_words: NA

full_text: Right there! Appa bit him!
character_words: Right there! Appa bit him!

full_text: Never met a sky bison, huh?
character_words: Never met a sky bison, huh?

full_text: [Lowers his robe.] That happens to be a large birth mark. [Sarcastically.] Thanks for showing everyone.
character_words: That happens to be a large birth mark.  Thanks for showing everyone.

full_text: Well I suppose there's no way to prove where those marks came from.
character_words: Well I suppose there's no way to prove where those marks came from.

full_text: Of course there is!
character_words: Of course there is!

full_text: The group gets Appa and brings him in. He opens his mouth. Aang points at the bison's teeth and at Long Feng's mark.
character_words: NA

full_text: Yup. That pretty much proves it. [Team Avatar cheers.] But it doesn't prove this crazy conspiracy theory. [Team Avatar becomes downcast.] Though, I suppose this matter's worth looking into. [Team Avatar look at each other approvingly, while Long Feng glares at the king before walking away with his agents.]
character_words: Yup. That pretty much proves it.  But it doesn't prove this crazy conspiracy theory.  Though, I suppose this matter's worth looking into.

full_text: Back in Iroh and Zuko's apartment, Zuko is asleep. He wakes up.
character_words: NA

full_text: You're burning up. [Dips a cloth in water.] You have an intense fever. [Places the cloth on Zuko's forehead.] This will help cool you down.
character_words: You're burning up.  You have an intense fever.  This will help cool you down.

full_text: So thirsty. [Sits up, but Iroh makes him lie back down.]
character_words: So thirsty.

full_text: [Grabs a bucket with a spoon in it; takes out the spoon.] Here's some clean water to drink. [Sits him up slightly.] Stay under the blankets and sweat this out.
character_words: Here's some clean water to drink.  Stay under the blankets and sweat this out.

full_text: Zuko grabs the spoon from Iroh and drinks the water. He tosses the spoon aside and grabs the bucket. He drinks from it, while spilling some out. He tosses the bucket aside and lies back down. Iroh pulls the covers more over him. Meanwhile, on a train, passengers are shocked to see the Earth King, who is standing in the middle of the cart surrounded by guards.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Feeling strange from exposition.] So this is what a train is like? I didn't realize it would be this ... public.
character_words: So this is what a train is like? I didn't realize it would be this ... public.

full_text: So you've never been outside the Upper Ring before?
character_words: So you've never been outside the Upper Ring before?

full_text: I've never been outside the palace. [Katara and Sokka look at each other; the Earth King looks outside and sees Aang flying on Appa.] Now that's the way to travel. [Looks at Katara and Sokka.] So, may I ask where we're going?
character_words: I've never been outside the palace.  Now that's the way to travel.  So, may I ask where we're going?

full_text: Underneath Lake Laogai, Your Kingliness. To the Dai Li's secret headquarters. You're about to see where all the brainwashing and conspiring took place.
character_words: Underneath Lake Laogai, Your Kingliness. To the Dai Li's secret headquarters. You're about to see where all the brainwashing and conspiring took place.

full_text: Cut to the shores of Lake Laogai. The team stand on the shore beside the Earth King and his guards. Toph steps to the edge of the water, and with a hop, reveals the the secret path to the hatch door entrance, though discovers it has been destroyed.
character_words: NA

full_text: It's gone!
character_words: It's gone!

full_text: Oh don't tell me- ! [Gives a thumbs up and a fake smile.] That's okay. Still got my positive attitude.
character_words: Oh don't tell me- !  That's okay. Still got my positive attitude.

full_text: The Dai Li must've known we were coming and destroyed the evidence!
character_words: The Dai Li must've known we were coming and destroyed the evidence!

full_text: [Looks suspicious.] Hm ... [Sarcastically.] That seems awfully convenient.
character_words: Hm ...  That seems awfully convenient.

full_text: Hey, if anything, this proves the conspiracy exists even more.
character_words: Hey, if anything, this proves the conspiracy exists even more.

full_text: Long Feng was right. This was a waste of time. [Turns to leave.] If you'll excuse me, I'm going back to the palace.
character_words: Long Feng was right. This was a waste of time.  If you'll excuse me, I'm going back to the palace.

full_text: [Smiles with realization.] The wall. They'll never be able to cover that up in time.
character_words: The wall. They'll never be able to cover that up in time.

full_text: Oh, yeah. [Hops to in front of the king.] If you come with us to the Outer Wall, we can prove to you that the secret war is real.
character_words: Oh, yeah.  If you come with us to the Outer Wall, we can prove to you that the secret war is real.

full_text: No Earth King has ever been to the Outer Wall. [Walks past Aang.] I don't have any more time for this nonsense. [Aang looks depressed.]
character_words: No Earth King has ever been to the Outer Wall.  I don't have any more time for this nonsense.

full_text: [Runs up to them.] If you come with us, this time you can ride on Appa. [The Earth King stops as Appa lows in the background. A pleased smile grows on his face.]
character_words: If you come with us, this time you can ride on Appa.

full_text: En route to the Outer Wall. The Earth King is riding on Appa, holding on for dear life and screaming at the top of his lungs in fear, his clothes flapping in the wind.
character_words: NA

full_text: First time flying?
character_words: First time flying?

full_text: It's both thrilling and terrifying!
character_words: It's both thrilling and terrifying!

full_text: Yeah. I hate it too.
character_words: Yeah. I hate it too.

full_text: I have to be honest with you: part of me really hopes that what you're telling me about this war isn't true.
character_words: I have to be honest with you: part of me really hopes that what you're telling me about this war isn't true.

full_text: I wish it wasn't.
character_words: I wish it wasn't.

full_text: Meanwhile at the apartment, Iroh again places the moist cloth over his feverish nephew's forehead. Zuko is having a dream that he is the Fire Lord, with no scar on his eye. One red and one blue dragon appear and start circling around the pillars on each side of him. The blue dragon starts circling around Zuko.
character_words: NA

full_text: [In Azula's voice.] It's getting late. Are you planning to retire soon, my lord?
character_words: It's getting late. Are you planning to retire soon, my lord?

full_text: I'm not tired.
character_words: I'm not tired.

full_text: [Into Zuko's ear.] Relax, Fire Lord Zuko. Just let go. Give in to it. Shut your eyes for a while.
character_words: Relax, Fire Lord Zuko. Just let go. Give in to it. Shut your eyes for a while.

full_text: Zuko slowly starts to shut his eyes but widely opens them upon hearing the other dragon.
character_words: NA

full_text: [In Iroh's voice.] No, Fire Lord Zuko! Do not listen to the blue dragon. You should get out of here right now. Go! Before it's too late! [Both dragons are poised to either side of Zuko.]
character_words: No, Fire Lord Zuko! Do not listen to the blue dragon. You should get out of here right now. Go! Before it's too late!

full_text: Sleep now, Fire Lord Zuko.
character_words: Sleep now, Fire Lord Zuko.

full_text: The dragons disappear, and the room they're in, as well as the guards watching Zuko, crumble to nothing. The blue dragon reappears in front of him. Two golden eyes appear, followed by the face of the blue dragon, which closes rapidly.
character_words: NA

full_text: Sleep. [Voice grows louder and more hostile as it continues talking.] Just like mother!
character_words: Sleep.  Just like mother!

full_text: Charges at Zuko and opens its mouth. Inside the dragon's mouth, Zuko sees his mother, Ursa. Within that darkness, the camera draws closer to Ursa, who drops her hood.
character_words: NA

full_text: Zuko! Help me! [A distraught Zuko is seen in her eyes.]
character_words: Zuko! Help me!

full_text: Zuko disappears through the floor. The sleeping Zuko starts sweating. Meanwhile, Team Avatar arrives at the Outer Wall and sees the drill.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Points at the drill.] It's still there!
character_words: It's still there!

full_text: [Shocked.] What is that?
character_words: What is that?

full_text: It's a drill. A giant drill [Cut to the drill.] made by the Fire Nation to break through your walls. [Cut to a close-up of the king who looks horrified.]
character_words: It's a drill. A giant drill  made by the Fire Nation to break through your walls.

full_text: On top of the wall, they're looking down at the drill.
character_words: NA

full_text: I can't believe I never knew. [He looks to his right as Kuei hears something.]
character_words: I can't believe I never knew.

full_text: [Appears on an earth elevator with two Dai Li agents.] I can explain this, Your Majesty. [Walks toward the king.] This is nothing more than ... a construction project. [Gestures his hand to the drill.]
character_words: I can explain this, Your Majesty.  This is nothing more than ... a construction project.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Really? Then perhaps you could explain why there's a [Points to the drill as Kuei follows to where she is pointing. Cut to the Fire Nation insignia clearly shown on the drill.] Fire Nation insignia on your "construction project".
character_words: Really? Then perhaps you could explain why there's a  Fire Nation insignia on your "construction project".

full_text: [The king looks at him suspiciously.] Well it's imported of course. You know you can't trust domestic machinery. [Looks at them worried.] Surely you don't believe these children instead of your most loyal attendant?
character_words: Well it's imported of course. You know you can't trust domestic machinery.  Surely you don't believe these children instead of your most loyal attendant?

full_text: [Looks at Team Avatar and Long Feng.] Dai Li! Arrest Long Feng! I want him to stand trial for crimes against the Earth Kingdom.
character_words: Dai Li! Arrest Long Feng! I want him to stand trial for crimes against the Earth Kingdom.

full_text: Long Feng and Team Avatar look shocked. The two agents behind Long Feng share glances, launch shackles onto his arms and pull him in.
character_words: NA

full_text: You can't arrest me! You all need me more than you know! [He is taken away.]
character_words: You can't arrest me! You all need me more than you know!

full_text: [Happily.] Looks like Long Feng is long gone! Ha! Ah, yeah, I've been waiting to use that one. [Katara gives him an unimpressed look.]
character_words: Looks like Long Feng is long gone! Ha! Ah, yeah, I've been waiting to use that one.

full_text: That night at the Palace, the Earth King is talking with Team Avatar.
character_words: NA

full_text: I want to thank you, young heroes, for opening my eyes. All this time, what I thought was a great metropolis was merely a city of fools. And that makes me the king fool. [Buries his face in one of his hands.] We're at war. With the Fire Nation.
character_words: I want to thank you, young heroes, for opening my eyes. All this time, what I thought was a great metropolis was merely a city of fools. And that makes me the king fool.  We're at war. With the Fire Nation.

full_text: That's why we came to Ba Sing Se, Your Highness: Because we think you can help us end the war.
character_words: That's why we came to Ba Sing Se, Your Highness: Because we think you can help us end the war.

full_text: [Momo climbs up Kuei's arm.] We don't have much time. There's a comet coming this summer. Its energy will give the firebenders unbelievable strength. They'll be unstoppable.
character_words: We don't have much time. There's a comet coming this summer. Its energy will give the firebenders unbelievable strength. They'll be unstoppable.

full_text: But there is hope. Before the comet comes, we have a window of opportunity: A solar eclipse is coming. The sun will be completely blocked out by the moon, and the firebenders will be helpless.
character_words: But there is hope. Before the comet comes, we have a window of opportunity: A solar eclipse is coming. The sun will be completely blocked out by the moon, and the firebenders will be helpless.

full_text: What are you suggesting, Sokka?
character_words: What are you suggesting, Sokka?

full_text: That's the day we need to invade the Fire Nation. [Cut to a close-up of the king. Cut back to Sokka.] The Day of Black Sun.
character_words: That's the day we need to invade the Fire Nation.  The Day of Black Sun.

full_text: I don't know. That would require moving troops out of Ba Sing Se. We'd be completely vulnerable.
character_words: I don't know. That would require moving troops out of Ba Sing Se. We'd be completely vulnerable.

full_text: You're already vulnerable. The Fire Nation won't stop until Ba Sing Se falls. You can either sit back and wait for that to happen, or take the offensive and give yourself a fighting chance.
character_words: You're already vulnerable. The Fire Nation won't stop until Ba Sing Se falls. You can either sit back and wait for that to happen, or take the offensive and give yourself a fighting chance.

full_text: [Thinks for a moment as everyone waits anxiously.] Very well. You have my support.
character_words: Very well. You have my support.

full_text: Team Avatar celebrates. Someone else arrives.

full_text: We searched Long Feng's office. I think we found something that will interest everybody. [Team Avatar look at each other.]

full_text: [Opens the scroll and reads it.] It's a letter from your mom. Your mom's here in the city. And she wants to see you. [Toph's eyes widen with shock.]

full_text: [Opens the scroll and reads it.] It's from the Eastern Air Temple.

character_words: Is there a letter for me and Sokka by any chance?

full_text: [Looks in the box.] I'm afraid not.
character_words: I'm afraid not.

full_text: [He and Katara become downcast.] Oh.

full_text: But there is an intelligence report that might interest you. [Hands a scroll to Katara.]
character_words: But there is an intelligence report that might interest you.

full_text: [Opens the scroll and reads it.] "A small fleet of Water Tribe ships."
character_words: "A small fleet of Water Tribe ships."

full_text: [Shocked. Appears on Katara's side.] What? That could be Dad!
character_words: What? That could be Dad!

full_text: [Reads the report with excitement.] "Protecting the mouth of Chameleon Bay. [Her and Sokka's eyes widen.] Led by Hakoda." [Katara and Sokka turn to each other in excitement.] It is Dad!

full_text: Meanwhile at the apartment, Iroh is pouring tea.
character_words: NA

full_text: You should know that this is not a natural sickness, but that shouldn't stop you from enjoying tea. [Feeds Zuko the tea.]
character_words: You should know that this is not a natural sickness, but that shouldn't stop you from enjoying tea.

full_text: What's happening?
character_words: What's happening?

full_text: Your critical decision. What you did beneath that lake. It was in such conflict with your image of yourself that you are now at war within your own mind and body. [Feeds Zuko more tea.]
character_words: Your critical decision. What you did beneath that lake. It was in such conflict with your image of yourself that you are now at war within your own mind and body.

full_text: What's that mean? [Coughs continuously and lies down.]
character_words: What's that mean?

full_text: You are going through a metamorphosis, my nephew. It will not be a pleasant experience, but when you come out of it, [Takes a cloth and wipes Zuko's head.] you will be the beautiful prince you were always meant to be.
character_words: You are going through a metamorphosis, my nephew. It will not be a pleasant experience, but when you come out of it,  you will be the beautiful prince you were always meant to be.

full_text: And I can't believe we know where our dad is now.

character_words: I know what you mean. My mom's in the city. And from her letter it sounds like she finally understands me.

character_words: Split up? We just found Appa and got the family back together! Now you want us to separate?

character_words: Well, if I'm going to the Eastern Air Temple, Appa and I can drop you off at Chameleon Bay to see your dad.

character_words: No, Sokka. I know how badly you wanna help Dad. You go to Chameleon Bay. I'll stay here with the king.

full_text: [Overjoyed with tears welling in his eyes. Stands up and dances happily.] You are the nicest ... sister ... ever! [Throws his arms around Katara and kisses her on the cheek.]

full_text: Easy there, big brother ... [Gives a slight chuckle.] Though you're right. I am.

full_text: What is it, Aang?

character_words: Katara, I-

full_text: Appa flies off. Back at the apartment, Iroh and Zuko are asleep. Zuko wakes up and walks into the bathroom. He washes his face with water. When he looks in the mirror, he sees himself with no scar, no hair and an arrow tattoo on his head, resembling Aang. He looks horrified. He screams himself awake and breathes heavily. He touches the scar on his face and closes his eyes. Meanwhile, Appa is flying Sokka and Aang. Sokka is resting across Appa's back.

full_text: You see, Aang? A little positive thinking works wonders. We got the king on our side, we got Long Feng arrested, and when we get back, Suki's waiting for me.
character_words: You see, Aang? A little positive thinking works wonders. We got the king on our side, we got Long Feng arrested, and when we get back, Suki's waiting for me.

full_text: I'm quite certain you're mistaken.
