full_text: Oh, I see. I guess we'll start with the basics. [As he explains he points to the water and the moss within.] The water flows through this creek, much like the energy flows through your body. As you see, there are several pools where the water swirls around before flowing on. These pools are like our chakras.
character_words: Oh, I see. I guess we'll start with the basics.  The water flows through this creek, much like the energy flows through your body. As you see, there are several pools where the water swirls around before flowing on. These pools are like our chakras.

full_text: So chakras are pools of spiraling energy in our bodies?
character_words: So chakras are pools of spiraling energy in our bodies?

full_text: Exactly. If nothing else were around, this creek would flow pure and clear. However, life is messy, and things tend to fall in the creek. And then what happens?
character_words: Exactly. If nothing else were around, this creek would flow pure and clear. However, life is messy, and things tend to fall in the creek. And then what happens?

full_text: The creek can't flow?
character_words: The creek can't flow?

full_text: Yes. But, if we open the ponds between the pools ... [He removes moss blocking the exit for the water.]
character_words: Yes. But, if we open the ponds between the pools ...

full_text: The energy flows!
character_words: The energy flows!

full_text: In another part of the temple, a cavern.
character_words: NA

full_text: There are seven chakras that go up the body. Each pool of energy has a purpose, and can be blocked by a specific kind of emotional muck. Be warned, opening the chakras is an intense experience, and once you begin the process, you cannot stop until all seven are open. Are you ready?
character_words: There are seven chakras that go up the body. Each pool of energy has a purpose, and can be blocked by a specific kind of emotional muck. Be warned, opening the chakras is an intense experience, and once you begin the process, you cannot stop until all seven are open. Are you ready?

full_text: [Momentarily looks down.] I'll do whatever it takes.
character_words: I'll do whatever it takes.

full_text: First we will open the Earth Chakra, located at the base of the spine. It deals with survival, and is blocked by fear. What are you most afraid of? Let your fears become clear to you.
character_words: First we will open the Earth Chakra, located at the base of the spine. It deals with survival, and is blocked by fear. What are you most afraid of? Let your fears become clear to you.

full_text: Aang sees images of things that cause him great fear, including the Blue Spirit attacking him, General Fong sinking Katara into the ground, himself merging with La at the North Pole, Fire Lord Ozai, and Sozin's Comet, which make him scream.
character_words: NA

full_text: Aang, your vision is not real. You are concerned for your survival, but you must surrender those fears. Let your fears flow down the creek. [Aang clears the image away.] You have opened your Earth Chakra! [Aang wipes sweat off his forehead.]
character_words: Aang, your vision is not real. You are concerned for your survival, but you must surrender those fears. Let your fears flow down the creek.  You have opened your Earth Chakra!

full_text: Later, behind a waterfall.
character_words: NA

full_text: Next is the ...
character_words: Next is the ...

full_text: Water Chakra?
character_words: Water Chakra?

full_text: Brilliant! Maybe one day you will be a guru too! This chakra deals with pleasure and is blocked by guilt. Now, look at all the guilt with burdens you so. What do you blame yourself for?
character_words: Brilliant! Maybe one day you will be a guru too! This chakra deals with pleasure and is blocked by guilt. Now, look at all the guilt with burdens you so. What do you blame yourself for?

full_text: [Sees the image of him leaving home.] I ran away. [Sees images of him in the Avatar State at General Fong's base.] I hurt all of those people.
character_words: I ran away.  I hurt all of those people.

full_text: Accept the reality that these things happened, but do not let them cloud and poison your energy. If you are to be a positive influence on the world, you need to forgive yourself.
character_words: Accept the reality that these things happened, but do not let them cloud and poison your energy. If you are to be a positive influence on the world, you need to forgive yourself.

full_text: Scene cuts to the next day at the Water Tribe camp.
character_words: NA

full_text: This bay leads directly to the outskirts of Ba Sing Se. We've been using these tangle mines to stop the Fire Nation ships from getting through.
character_words: This bay leads directly to the outskirts of Ba Sing Se. We've been using these tangle mines to stop the Fire Nation ships from getting through.

full_text: [Filling the mine with skunk fish and seaweed before moving away.] Your father invented tangle mines himself.
character_words: Your father invented tangle mines himself.

full_text: Destructive? Buoyant? And ... [Sniffs and immediately becomes disgusted.] Aggh, ehhh! Terrible smelling!
character_words: Destructive? Buoyant? And ...  Aggh, ehhh! Terrible smelling!

full_text: Very perceptive. The mines are filled with skunk fish and seaweed. When a ship detonates the mine, the seaweed tangles up the propeller and the foul smell forces people to abandon the ship. I call it the "stink and sink."
character_words: Very perceptive. The mines are filled with skunk fish and seaweed. When a ship detonates the mine, the seaweed tangles up the propeller and the foul smell forces people to abandon the ship. I call it the "stink and sink."

full_text: [Laughs.] Good one, Dad!
character_words: Good one, Dad!

full_text: [Nearby, unamused.] You're definitely your father's son.
character_words: You're definitely your father's son.

full_text: [Approaching.] Hakoda, our scouts have spotted four Fire Nation ships!
character_words: Hakoda, our scouts have spotted four Fire Nation ships!

full_text: Bato, get these mines loaded up! The rest of you men, prepare for battle!
character_words: Bato, get these mines loaded up! The rest of you men, prepare for battle!

full_text: The warriors run off to prepare as Sokka looks around before looking back to his father.
character_words: NA

full_text: Uhhh ... what should I do, Dad?
character_words: Uhhh ... what should I do, Dad?

full_text: Aren't you listening? I said, "The rest of you men, get ready for battle".
character_words: Aren't you listening? I said, "The rest of you men, get ready for battle".

full_text: Sokka smiles and departs. Back in Ba Sing Se, at the Jasmine Dragon. Zuko and Iroh observe the happenings standing at the back.
character_words: NA

full_text: Who thought when we came to this city as refugees, that I'd end up owning my own tea shop? Follow your passion, Zuko, and life will reward you.
character_words: Who thought when we came to this city as refugees, that I'd end up owning my own tea shop? Follow your passion, Zuko, and life will reward you.

full_text: Congratulations, Uncle.
character_words: Congratulations, Uncle.

full_text: I am very thankful.
character_words: I am very thankful.

full_text: You deserve it. The Jasmine Dragon will be the best tea shop in the city.
character_words: You deserve it. The Jasmine Dragon will be the best tea shop in the city.

full_text: No. I'm thankful because you decided to share this special day with me. It means more than you know. [The two embrace.]
character_words: No. I'm thankful because you decided to share this special day with me. It means more than you know.

full_text: Now let's make these people some tea! [Walks away to the back.]
character_words: Now let's make these people some tea!

full_text: Yes, let's make some tea!
character_words: Yes, let's make some tea!

full_text: Back to the Eastern Air Temple, Aang and Pathik sit on a ledge.
character_words: NA

full_text: Third is the Fire Chakra, located in the stomach.
character_words: Third is the Fire Chakra, located in the stomach.

full_text: [Holding his stomach.] My Fire Chakra would like to eat something other than onion-banana juice.
character_words: My Fire Chakra would like to eat something other than onion-banana juice.

full_text: [Chuckles.] Good one! Moving on. This chakra deals with willpower, and is blocked by shame. What are you ashamed of? [Cuts to Aang's vision of his first attempt at firebending, which resulted in him accidentally burning Katara's hands.] What are your biggest disappointments in yourself?
character_words: Good one! Moving on. This chakra deals with willpower, and is blocked by shame. What are you ashamed of?  What are your biggest disappointments in yourself?

full_text: I'm never going to firebend again. I can't.
character_words: I'm never going to firebend again. I can't.

full_text: You will never find balance if you deny this part of your life. You are the Avatar and therefore, you are a firebender. [Aang breathes deeply.] Hmmm ... that chakra opened less like a flowing creek, and more like a ... burping bison.
character_words: You will never find balance if you deny this part of your life. You are the Avatar and therefore, you are a firebender.  Hmmm ... that chakra opened less like a flowing creek, and more like a ... burping bison.

full_text: [Loud belch.] Tastes like onions and bananas, but strangely something else. Pickles? [Pathik shrugs.]
character_words: Tastes like onions and bananas, but strangely something else. Pickles?

full_text: Back at the palace, two Dai Li agents hide on two pillars and secretly spy on a conversation between Mai and Ty Lee. The former is sitting on the stairs and the latter is practicing chi blocking and acrobatics.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Sighs.] I'm tired of wearing this girly disguise. I don't know how anyone could fight in this.
character_words: I'm tired of wearing this girly disguise. I don't know how anyone could fight in this.

full_text: Maybe that's why it was so easy to beat the Kyoshi Warriors and take their clothes.
character_words: Maybe that's why it was so easy to beat the Kyoshi Warriors and take their clothes.

full_text: How much longer do we have to serve the Earth King? If I have to clean up one more pile of bear poop, I'm going to throw up.
character_words: How much longer do we have to serve the Earth King? If I have to clean up one more pile of bear poop, I'm going to throw up.

full_text: Princess Azula promised we would go back to the Fire Nation as soon as we captured the Avatar. We just have to be patient.
character_words: Princess Azula promised we would go back to the Fire Nation as soon as we captured the Avatar. We just have to be patient.

full_text: [Stands up.] Shush up! Do you want the whole palace to know we're Fire Nation?
character_words: Shush up! Do you want the whole palace to know we're Fire Nation?

full_text: Sorry!
character_words: Sorry!

full_text: The agents smile and climb away. Azula, who was hiding behind another pillar, walks up to them.
character_words: NA

full_text: Good work, girls. I'm sure the Dai Li will deliver the message.
character_words: Good work, girls. I'm sure the Dai Li will deliver the message.

full_text: Back at the Air Temple.
character_words: NA

full_text: The fourth chakra is located in the heart. It deals with love and is blocked by grief. [Aang smiles and looks at a Air Nomad statue nearby before looking sad.] Lay all your grief out in front of you.
character_words: The fourth chakra is located in the heart. It deals with love and is blocked by grief.  Lay all your grief out in front of you.

full_text: Aang sees images of many airbenders, including Gyatso and Yangchen. He smiles upon seeing them, but becomes saddened as they start to vanish into smoke.
character_words: NA

full_text: You have indeed felt a great loss. [The airbenders appear floating in the clouds.] But love is a form of energy, and it swirls all around us. [Aang is lifted into the air and sees the Air Nomads floating in the smoke.] The Air Nomads' love for you has not left this world. It is still inside of your heart, and is reborn in the form of new love.
character_words: You have indeed felt a great loss.  But love is a form of energy, and it swirls all around us.  The Air Nomads' love for you has not left this world. It is still inside of your heart, and is reborn in the form of new love.

full_text: The smoke in front of Aang forms a face and shows the first thing he saw upon waking up from his iceberg: Katara. Back in the real world, Aang is starting to cry tears of joy.
character_words: NA

full_text: Let the pain flow away. [Aang wipes away his tears.] Very good.
character_words: Let the pain flow away.  Very good.

full_text: Can I have some onion-banana juice, please?
character_words: Can I have some onion-banana juice, please?

full_text: Inside another part of the temple.
character_words: NA

full_text: The fifth in the chain is the Sound Chakra, located in the throat. It deals with truth and is blocked by lies. The ones we tell ourselves.
character_words: The fifth in the chain is the Sound Chakra, located in the throat. It deals with truth and is blocked by lies. The ones we tell ourselves.

full_text: Aang flashes back to when he, Katara, and Sokka first began their journey to the North Pole.
character_words: NA

full_text: Why didn't you tell us you were the Avatar?
character_words: Why didn't you tell us you were the Avatar?

full_text: Back to the real world, Aang finds himself answering the question.
character_words: NA

full_text: Because I never wanted to be.
character_words: Because I never wanted to be.

full_text: You cannot lie about your own nature. You must accept that you are the Avatar. [Aang inhales and, seeing an image of himself on a cliff looking down at the ground, exhales, and accepts his nature.] Very good, Aang. You have opened the chakra of truth.
character_words: You cannot lie about your own nature. You must accept that you are the Avatar.  Very good, Aang. You have opened the chakra of truth.

full_text: Outside the temple interior.
character_words: NA

full_text: The sixth pool of energy is the light chakra, located in the center of the forehead. It deals with insight and is blocked by illusion. The greatest illusion of this world is the illusion of separation. Things you think are separate and different are actually one in the same.
character_words: The sixth pool of energy is the light chakra, located in the center of the forehead. It deals with insight and is blocked by illusion. The greatest illusion of this world is the illusion of separation. Things you think are separate and different are actually one in the same.

full_text: [An image is shown of the world, with the four nations' territories marked.] Like the four nations.
character_words: Like the four nations.

full_text: [The image changes so the territories become the same color.] Yes. We are all one people, [The territories become separate again.] but we live as if divided.
character_words: Yes. We are all one people,  but we live as if divided.

full_text: We're all connected. Everything is connected.
character_words: We're all connected. Everything is connected.

full_text: That's right! Even the separation of the four elements is an illusion. If you open your mind, you will see that all the elements are one. Four parts of the same whole. Even metal is just a part of earth that has been purified and refined.
character_words: That's right! Even the separation of the four elements is an illusion. If you open your mind, you will see that all the elements are one. Four parts of the same whole. Even metal is just a part of earth that has been purified and refined.

full_text: As Pathik speaks, the camera fades to Xin Fu and Yu trying to take Toph home. She feels around the metal cage with seismic sense and feels tiny particles of earth in the metal. She smiles, exhales deeply and begins to push against the metal.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Struggling.] Come on, metal. Budge! [She punches a hole in the metal and shakes her hand in pain.] Wooo! Toph, you rule.
character_words: Come on, metal. Budge!  Wooo! Toph, you rule.

full_text: She takes another punch as we cut back to Ba Sing Se. Katara walks by the Jasmine Dragon.
character_words: NA

full_text: What do you say, Momo? A cup of tea before we get back to the king? [Arrives at the shop.] Table for two, please.
character_words: What do you say, Momo? A cup of tea before we get back to the king?  Table for two, please.

full_text: Uncle! I need two jasmine, one green, and one lychee!
character_words: Uncle! I need two jasmine, one green, and one lychee!

full_text: I'm brewing as fast as I can!
character_words: I'm brewing as fast as I can!

full_text: Katara notices Zuko and Iroh. Stunned, she runs away from the shop.
character_words: NA

full_text: The scene returns to Aang and Pathik, who sit at the top of the temple at night.
character_words: NA

full_text: This is the last chakra, isn't it?
character_words: This is the last chakra, isn't it?

full_text: Yes. Once you open this chakra, you will be able to go in and out of the Avatar State at will and when you are in the Avatar State, you will have complete control and awareness of all your actions.
character_words: Yes. Once you open this chakra, you will be able to go in and out of the Avatar State at will and when you are in the Avatar State, you will have complete control and awareness of all your actions.

full_text: Let's do this.
character_words: Let's do this.

full_text: The Thought Chakra is located at the crown of the head. It deals with pure cosmic energy, and is blocked by earthly attachment. Meditate on what attaches you to this world. [Images of Katara appear before Aang.] Now, let all of those attachments go. Let them flow down the river, forgotten.
character_words: The Thought Chakra is located at the crown of the head. It deals with pure cosmic energy, and is blocked by earthly attachment. Meditate on what attaches you to this world.  Now, let all of those attachments go. Let them flow down the river, forgotten.

full_text: [Coming out of his meditation.] What? Why would I let go of Katara? I ... I love her!
character_words: What? Why would I let go of Katara? I ... I love her!

full_text: Learn to let her go, or you cannot let the pure cosmic energy flow in from the universe.
character_words: Learn to let her go, or you cannot let the pure cosmic energy flow in from the universe.

full_text: Why would I choose cosmic energy over Katara? [Aang throws his hands up.] How could it be a bad thing that I feel an attachment to her? Three chakras ago that was a good thing!
character_words: Why would I choose cosmic energy over Katara?  How could it be a bad thing that I feel an attachment to her? Three chakras ago that was a good thing!

full_text: You must learn to let go.
character_words: You must learn to let go.

full_text: Back at the palace, Katara runs to inform the Earth King, only to encounter the "Kyoshi Warriors".
character_words: NA

full_text: Thank goodness you're here, Suki. Something terrible is going on. The Fire Nation has infiltrated the city, I just saw Prince Zuko and his uncle! [Azula widens her eyes in surprise and smiles slyly.] We have to tell the Earth King right away!
character_words: Thank goodness you're here, Suki. Something terrible is going on. The Fire Nation has infiltrated the city, I just saw Prince Zuko and his uncle!  We have to tell the Earth King right away!

full_text: Oh, don't worry, I'll be sure to let him know.
character_words: Oh, don't worry, I'll be sure to let him know.

full_text: Katara notices "Suki" has gold eyes and is shocked upon realization that the "Kyoshi Warriors" are actually Azula, Mai, and Ty Lee. She prepares to attack, but Ty Lee quickly jumps forward and blocks her chi.
character_words: NA

full_text: [While the three girls gather around the fallen Katara; pans to camera looking up to the three girls.] So, Zuzu's in the city, too? I think it's time for a family reunion. [Momo flies off.]
character_words: So, Zuzu's in the city, too? I think it's time for a family reunion.

full_text: Back at the temple.
character_words: NA

full_text: I'm sorry, but I can't let go of Katara.
character_words: I'm sorry, but I can't let go of Katara.

full_text: Aang, to master the Avatar State, you must open all the chakras. Surrender yourself.
character_words: Aang, to master the Avatar State, you must open all the chakras. Surrender yourself.

full_text: Okay, I'll try.
character_words: Okay, I'll try.

full_text: Now think of your attachments and let them go. Let the pure cosmic energy flow.
character_words: Now think of your attachments and let them go. Let the pure cosmic energy flow.

full_text: Aang sees an image of him letting Katara go, and a bridge that will lead him to Avatar State mastery. As he is being surrounded by energy, however, he hears a shriek from Katara and sees a vision of her in chains. He runs away from the end of the road. This cuts his connection to the Avatar State, which drops him back to reality.
character_words: NA

full_text: Katara's in danger! I have to go! [Prepares to exit.]
character_words: Katara's in danger! I have to go!

full_text: No, Aang! By choosing attachment, you have locked the chakra! If you leave now, you won't be able to go into the Avatar State at all!
character_words: No, Aang! By choosing attachment, you have locked the chakra! If you leave now, you won't be able to go into the Avatar State at all!

full_text: Aang hesitates but leaves anyway, leaving Pathik concerned. Meanwhile, the journey to take Toph back to her home is stopped when Xin Fu and Yu hear a loud noise. They go to investigate, and notice a hole in the cage and that Toph is gone.
character_words: NA

full_text: It's another one her tricks!
character_words: It's another one her tricks!

full_text: There's a giant hole in the box! How is that a trick!?
character_words: There's a giant hole in the box! How is that a trick!?

full_text: [From behind them.] It's not! It's the real deal!
character_words: It's not! It's the real deal!

full_text: She earthbends the two men together, throws them in the cage, and metalbends the cage shut.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Jumps on top of the box.] I am the greatest earthbender in the world! Don't you two dunderheads ever forget it! [Stomps on the box and exits using earth surfing.]
character_words: I am the greatest earthbender in the world! Don't you two dunderheads ever forget it!

full_text: [Inside the box.] I'm going to be stuck in here forever with you, aren't I?
character_words: I'm going to be stuck in here forever with you, aren't I?

full_text: I have to go the bathroom. [Xin Fu groans and slams his head against the box.]
character_words: I have to go the bathroom.

full_text: Back at the Water Tribe camp, Hakoda approaches Sokka.
character_words: NA

full_text: Ready to go knock some Fire Nation heads?
character_words: Ready to go knock some Fire Nation heads?

full_text: You don't know how much this means to me, Dad. I'll make you proud and I'll finally prove to you what a great warrior I am.
character_words: You don't know how much this means to me, Dad. I'll make you proud and I'll finally prove to you what a great warrior I am.

full_text: [Placing his hand on Sokka's shoulder.] Sokka, you don't have to prove anything to me. I'm already proud of you and I've always known you're a great warrior.
character_words: Sokka, you don't have to prove anything to me. I'm already proud of you and I've always known you're a great warrior.

full_text: Really?
character_words: Really?

full_text: Why do you think I trusted you to look after our tribe when I left?
character_words: Why do you think I trusted you to look after our tribe when I left?

full_text: Just as the two are boarding the ship, Aang and Appa appear. Aang shows a clear look of concern.
character_words: NA

full_text: This can't be good news.
character_words: This can't be good news.

full_text: Aang and Sokka depart. Just as they're leaving, Sokka looks back at Hakoda, who looks back and grins. Back in Ba Sing Se, Azula is led into a prison by two Dai Li agents. She is taken to Long Feng's cell.
character_words: NA

full_text: What is this about? Your agents show up in the middle of the night and drag me down here? You will not treat a Kyoshi Warrior this way!
character_words: What is this about? Your agents show up in the middle of the night and drag me down here? You will not treat a Kyoshi Warrior this way!

full_text: But you're not a Kyoshi Warrior, are you, [Standing.] Princess Azula of the Fire Nation?
character_words: But you're not a Kyoshi Warrior, are you,  Princess Azula of the Fire Nation?

full_text: What do you want?
character_words: What do you want?

full_text: I want to make a deal. It's time that I regain control of Ba Sing Se and you have something I need.
character_words: I want to make a deal. It's time that I regain control of Ba Sing Se and you have something I need.

full_text: Oh?
character_words: Oh?

full_text: The Earth King's trust.
character_words: The Earth King's trust.

full_text: Why should I help you?
character_words: Why should I help you?

full_text: Because I can get you the Avatar.
character_words: Because I can get you the Avatar.

full_text: [Smirks.] I'm listening ...
character_words: I'm listening ...

full_text: Long Feng smiles. Back at the Jasmine Dragon, a royal messenger enters.
character_words: NA

full_text: A message from the Royal Palace.
character_words: A message from the Royal Palace.

full_text: [Reads through, becomes shocked, and smiles.] I ... I can't believe it!
character_words: I ... I can't believe it!

full_text: What is it, Uncle?
character_words: What is it, Uncle?

full_text: [Excited.] Great news! We've been invited to serve tea to the Earth King! [Runs off.]
character_words: Great news! We've been invited to serve tea to the Earth King!

full_text: Zuko smiles as he continues sweeping. Back in the prison hold, the door to Long Feng's cell is closed. Azula leaves Long Feng's presence and gives a smirk. Fade to credits.
character_words: NA

full_text: Ostrich horses are drinking water from a river as Appa, Aang, and Sokka fly over them.
character_words: NA

full_text: So, what kind of trouble is Katara in?
character_words: So, what kind of trouble is Katara in?

full_text: I don't know. In my vision, I just knew she needed help.
character_words: I don't know. In my vision, I just knew she needed help.

full_text: It would be nice if your Avatar powers could be just a little more specific from time to time. [He looks down and notices a mound of earth passing nearby, heading to the wall.] What is that?
character_words: It would be nice if your Avatar powers could be just a little more specific from time to time.  What is that?

full_text: They fly down and follow the mound. Toph is seen still earth surfing. Aang and Sokka come down beside her.
character_words: NA

full_text: Need a ride?
character_words: Need a ride?

full_text: Toph becomes startled at the sound of Sokka's voice and falls backward off of the mound. Sokka and Aang cringe upon seeing her fall. Scene changes to Azula speaking to the Dai Li.
character_words: NA

full_text: [While pacing back and forth.] The Earth King and the Council of Five do not trust the Dai Li. They imprisoned your leader, Long Feng. Soon they will turn on all of you and eliminate you. Seizing power today is a matter of life and death. [As she talks, an agent with a mustache starts looking nervous and slightly lowers his head.] This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously. Long Feng has placed you in my command while we overthrow the government. [Walks over to her left, to another agent with a tiny, vertical scar on his right cheek. When she nears him, she stares sideways at the agent while still addressing all the agents.] If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all, [She stops right in front of the scarred agent.] I will snuff it out. [She continues walking, with the eyes of the now nervous scarred agent following her.] That is all.
character_words: The Earth King and the Council of Five do not trust the Dai Li. They imprisoned your leader, Long Feng. Soon they will turn on all of you and eliminate you. Seizing power today is a matter of life and death.  This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously. Long Feng has placed you in my command while we overthrow the government.  If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all,  I will snuff it out.  That is all.

full_text: The Dai Li leave, and Azula walks up to Ty Lee, who is pouring tea.
character_words: NA

full_text: Nice speech, Azula. It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way. [She hands the cup to Azula. Camera pans over to a close-up of Mai.]
character_words: Nice speech, Azula. It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way.

full_text: [Amused.] Yeah. I thought you were going to make that one guy pee his pants.
character_words: Yeah. I thought you were going to make that one guy pee his pants.

full_text: There are still a few loose ends. The Avatar, and my brother and uncle.
character_words: There are still a few loose ends. The Avatar, and my brother and uncle.

full_text: Scene fades to outside the Royal Palace, where Zuko and Iroh begin walking toward it.
character_words: NA

full_text: Many times I imagined myself here, at the threshold of the palace. [Camera pans to show the Earth Kingdom Emblem above the palace doors.] But I always thought I would be here as a conqueror. Instead, we are the Earth King's personal guests, here to serve him tea. Destiny is a funny thing.
character_words: Many times I imagined myself here, at the threshold of the palace.  But I always thought I would be here as a conqueror. Instead, we are the Earth King's personal guests, here to serve him tea. Destiny is a funny thing.

full_text: It sure is, Uncle.
character_words: It sure is, Uncle.

full_text: Scene changes back to Appa, Toph, Aang, and Sokka still flying back to the Palace. Toph is seen holding onto Sokka's arm so she does not fall.
character_words: NA

full_text: So how did it go with the guru? Did you master the Avatar State?
character_words: So how did it go with the guru? Did you master the Avatar State?

full_text: Uh ...
character_words: Uh ...

full_text: Aang looks down and thinks back to what Guru Pathik said before he left.
character_words: NA

full_text: If you leave now, you won't be able to go into the Avatar State at all!
character_words: If you leave now, you won't be able to go into the Avatar State at all!

full_text: Fades back to the present.
character_words: NA

full_text: Aang, are you okay?
character_words: Aang, are you okay?

full_text: I'm great! It went great with the guru. I completely mastered the Avatar State. [He laughs nervously and looks down.] Yeah.
character_words: I'm great! It went great with the guru. I completely mastered the Avatar State.  Yeah.

full_text: Scene changes back to the Royal Palace, where Zuko and Iroh are sitting at a table in a room, waiting for the Earth King. Iroh pours some tea into a cup.
character_words: NA

full_text: What's taking so long?
character_words: What's taking so long?

full_text: Maybe the Earth King overslept.
character_words: Maybe the Earth King overslept.

full_text: Dai Li agents begin to circle around the two.
character_words: NA

full_text: Something's not right.
character_words: Something's not right.

full_text: Azula walks past the Dai Li and comes in front of her brother outside the circle of Dai Li agents.
character_words: NA

full_text: It's tea time!
character_words: It's tea time!

full_text: [He quickly stands up.] Azula!
character_words: Azula!

full_text: Have you met the Dai Li? They're earthbenders, but they have a killer instinct that's so firebender. I just love it.
character_words: Have you met the Dai Li? They're earthbenders, but they have a killer instinct that's so firebender. I just love it.

full_text: Camera pans over to show Iroh picking up his cup of tea.
character_words: NA

full_text: Did I ever tell you how I got the nickname "the Dragon of the West"?
character_words: Did I ever tell you how I got the nickname "the Dragon of the West"?

full_text: I'm not interested in a lengthy anecdote, Uncle.
character_words: I'm not interested in a lengthy anecdote, Uncle.

full_text: It's more of a demonstration, really.
character_words: It's more of a demonstration, really.

full_text: Iroh begins drinking his tea. Zuko looks over at him and smiles before going behind him. Iroh begins breathing fire. Cut to a corridor outside the room as a fire blast makes a hole in the wall, allowing Iroh and Zuko to escape. The Dai Li agents begin shooting some rock gloves at them, but miss as Zuko and Iroh turn around the corner. Iroh generates lightning and destroys the wall in front before jumping down into a bush below. Zuko stops at the edge.
character_words: NA

full_text: Come on! You'll be fine!
character_words: Come on! You'll be fine!

full_text: No! I'm tired of running! It's time I faced Azula!
character_words: No! I'm tired of running! It's time I faced Azula!

full_text: Zuko turns around and walks back. Iroh smacks his head upon hearing this and runs away.
character_words: NA

full_text: You're so dramatic. What? Are you going to challenge me to an Agni Kai?
character_words: You're so dramatic. What? Are you going to challenge me to an Agni Kai?

full_text: Yes! I challenge you!
character_words: Yes! I challenge you!

full_text: No thanks.
character_words: No thanks.

full_text: Zuko shoots a fire blast toward her, but two Dai Li agents intervene and pull up a section of the floor, making a wall. They shoot some rock gloves at Zuko's feet, making him lose his balance. He puts his right hand down, but another rock glove traps that one. Azula turns around smiling and walks away as the agents capture him. Scene changes to inside the throne room, where Sokka, Toph, and Aang confront Kuei.
character_words: NA

full_text: Katara's fine. You have nothing to worry about.
character_words: Katara's fine. You have nothing to worry about.

full_text: But, in my vision, I felt so sure she was in trouble.
character_words: But, in my vision, I felt so sure she was in trouble.

full_text: Well, she met with the Council of Generals to plan the invasion, and since then, she been off with your friends, the Kyoshi Warriors.
character_words: Well, she met with the Council of Generals to plan the invasion, and since then, she been off with your friends, the Kyoshi Warriors.

full_text: See, Aang? She's with Suki. They're probably back at our apartment right now talking about make-up or something.
character_words: See, Aang? She's with Suki. They're probably back at our apartment right now talking about make-up or something.

full_text: Okay. Maybe you're right.
character_words: Okay. Maybe you're right.

full_text: Believe me, if there was any danger at all, Bosco's animal instincts would sense it.
character_words: Believe me, if there was any danger at all, Bosco's animal instincts would sense it.

full_text: Bosco lifts up his head from sleeping to look at the three. Scene changes to inside the Crystal Catacombs, where Katara is pacing back and forth. She stops pacing upon hearing a hole open up above.
character_words: NA

full_text: You've got company.
character_words: You've got company.

full_text: He throws Zuko in, who rolls down and lands in front of Katara.
character_words: NA

full_text: Zuko!
character_words: Zuko!

full_text: Katara's shocked face becomes an angry one as Zuko sits up and the hole closes behind him. The scene changes to Toph, Aang, and Sokka reaching their house on Appa. The three jump off and run inside to see if Katara was in there. Momo runs up to them.
character_words: NA

full_text: Momo!
character_words: Momo!

full_text: Momo climbs up Aang onto his shoulders. Toph looks around.
character_words: NA

full_text: There's no one else here.
character_words: There's no one else here.

full_text: Katara is in trouble! I knew it!
character_words: Katara is in trouble! I knew it!

full_text: Oh, no!
character_words: Oh, no!

full_text: Wait! Someone's at the door. [Someone knocks on the door a second later.] Actually, I know who it is. It's an old friend of mine. [She walks over to the door and opens it, showing Iroh behind the door.] Glad to see you're okay.
character_words: Wait! Someone's at the door.  Actually, I know who it is. It's an old friend of mine.  Glad to see you're okay.

full_text: I need your help.
character_words: I need your help.

full_text: Sokka and Aang become shocked and angry upon seeing him, and get into a fighting stance. Toph calmly smiles and waves at him. Momo flies away upon seeing him.
character_words: NA

full_text: You guys know each other?
character_words: You guys know each other?

full_text: I met him in the woods once and knocked him down. Then he gave me some tea and some very good advice.
character_words: I met him in the woods once and knocked him down. Then he gave me some tea and some very good advice.

full_text: May I come in? [Toph nods, and he walks in before turning to the group.] Princess Azula is here in Ba Sing Se.
character_words: May I come in?  Princess Azula is here in Ba Sing Se.

full_text: She must have Katara.
character_words: She must have Katara.

full_text: She has captured my nephew as well.
character_words: She has captured my nephew as well.

full_text: Then we'll work together to fight Azula, and save Katara and Zuko.
character_words: Then we'll work together to fight Azula, and save Katara and Zuko.

full_text: [Approaching Aang and pointing at him.] Whoa there! You lost me at "Zuko".
character_words: Whoa there! You lost me at "Zuko".

full_text: I know how you must feel about my nephew. [Moving forward to place his hands on Sokka's shoulders.] But believe me when I tell you that there is good inside him.
character_words: I know how you must feel about my nephew.  But believe me when I tell you that there is good inside him.

full_text: [Pushing Iroh away.] "Good inside him" isn't enough! Why don't you come back when it's outside him too, okay?
character_words: "Good inside him" isn't enough! Why don't you come back when it's outside him too, okay?

full_text: Katara's in trouble. All of Ba Sing Se is in trouble. Working together is our best chance.
character_words: Katara's in trouble. All of Ba Sing Se is in trouble. Working together is our best chance.

full_text: Sokka understands, and nods. Iroh begins walking back to the door.
character_words: NA

full_text: I brought someone along who might help us.
character_words: I brought someone along who might help us.

full_text: They all walk outside. Toph puts a couple earth pillars around the nervous Dai Li agent and makes him stand up. Iroh walks over to him and takes the gag off his mouth, revealing this to be the scarred agent.
character_words: NA

full_text: Azula and Long Feng are plotting a coup! They're going to overthrow the Earth King!
character_words: Azula and Long Feng are plotting a coup! They're going to overthrow the Earth King!

full_text: My sister! Where are they keeping Katara?
character_words: My sister! Where are they keeping Katara?

full_text: In the Crystal Catacombs of Old Ba Sing Se, deep beneath the palace.
character_words: In the Crystal Catacombs of Old Ba Sing Se, deep beneath the palace.

full_text: Iroh, Aang, Toph, and Sokka run away to help Katara and the Earth King. Scene fades to the jail where Long Feng is. He meditates in his cell while a Dai Li agent informs him of what is going on.
character_words: NA

full_text: The movements of the Earth King and all the generals have been plotted out step-by-step.
character_words: The movements of the Earth King and all the generals have been plotted out step-by-step.

full_text: Good. And the Fire Nation princess is cooperating?
character_words: Good. And the Fire Nation princess is cooperating?

full_text: Oh, yes. More than cooperating. She's really taken charge. She's terrifying and inspirational at the same time. It's hard to explain.
character_words: Oh, yes. More than cooperating. She's really taken charge. She's terrifying and inspirational at the same time. It's hard to explain.

full_text: The Dai Li agent walks away. Scene changes to inside the Crystal Catacombs, where Katara is yelling at Zuko, who sits with his back turned.
character_words: NA

full_text: Why did they throw you in here? [Zuko says nothing.] Oh, wait, let me guess. It's a trap. So that when Aang shows up to help me, you can finally have him in your little Fire Nation clutches!
character_words: Why did they throw you in here?  Oh, wait, let me guess. It's a trap. So that when Aang shows up to help me, you can finally have him in your little Fire Nation clutches!

full_text: Zuko turns his head to look at her, turns back, and looks at the ground again.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Continuing to lament.] You're a terrible person! You know that? Always following us! Hunting the Avatar! Trying to capture the world's last hope for peace! But what do you care? You're the Fire Lord's son. Spreading war and violence and hatred is in your blood!
character_words: You're a terrible person! You know that? Always following us! Hunting the Avatar! Trying to capture the world's last hope for peace! But what do you care? You're the Fire Lord's son. Spreading war and violence and hatred is in your blood!

full_text: You don't know what you're talking about!
character_words: You don't know what you're talking about!

full_text: [Angrily.] I don't? How dare you! You have no idea what this war has put me through! [Sits down.] Me personally! [She sits down and touches her necklace, begins to cry.] The Fire Nation took my mother away from me.
character_words: I don't? How dare you! You have no idea what this war has put me through!  Me personally!  The Fire Nation took my mother away from me.

full_text: [He turns around to face Katara.] I'm sorry. [Pauses.] That's something we have in common.
character_words: I'm sorry.  That's something we have in common.

full_text: Katara looks back, surprised, and wipes away the tears from her eyes. The scene changes to Toph feeling the ground below, finding the Crystal Catacombs.
character_words: NA

full_text: Well, what'd you know? There is an ancient city down there. But it's deep.
character_words: Well, what'd you know? There is an ancient city down there. But it's deep.

full_text: She makes a tunnel through the ground, beginning to lead to the catacombs. Sokka is seen thinking of a plan.
character_words: NA

full_text: We should split up. Aang, you go with Iroh to look for Katara and the angry jerk, [Remembers Iroh is there and places his left hand on Iroh's right shoulder.] no offense.
character_words: We should split up. Aang, you go with Iroh to look for Katara and the angry jerk,  no offense.

full_text: [Shrugging.] None taken.
character_words: None taken.

full_text: And I'll go with Toph to warn the Earth King of Azula's coup.
character_words: And I'll go with Toph to warn the Earth King of Azula's coup.

full_text: Aang and Iroh are seen walking through the tunnel down to the Catacombs. Iroh is bending a small fire for light, and Aang is earthbending the way down.
character_words: NA

full_text: So, Toph thinks you give pretty good advice, and great tea!
character_words: So, Toph thinks you give pretty good advice, and great tea!

full_text: The key to both is proper aging. What's on your mind?
character_words: The key to both is proper aging. What's on your mind?

full_text: Aang earthbends again before replying.
character_words: NA

full_text: Well, I met with this guru who was supposed to help me master the Avatar State and control this great power, but to do it, I had to let go of someone I love. [He and Iroh stop.] And I just couldn't.
character_words: Well, I met with this guru who was supposed to help me master the Avatar State and control this great power, but to do it, I had to let go of someone I love.  And I just couldn't.

full_text: Perfection and power are overrated. I think you were very wise to choose happiness and love.
character_words: Perfection and power are overrated. I think you were very wise to choose happiness and love.

full_text: [Earthbends again.] What happens if we can't save anyone and beat Azula? Without the Avatar State, what if I'm not powerful enough?
character_words: What happens if we can't save anyone and beat Azula? Without the Avatar State, what if I'm not powerful enough?

full_text: I don't know the answer. Sometimes, life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you just keep moving, [Aang earthbends the rocks away one last time. Iroh's fire blows out. He smiles.] you will come to a better place.
character_words: I don't know the answer. Sometimes, life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you just keep moving,  you will come to a better place.

full_text: Camera pans over a large area of the Catacombs. Scene changes to Toph and Sokka climbing the stairs, with Momo flying behind them.
character_words: NA

full_text: There's General How!
character_words: There's General How!

full_text: Sokka puts his arm out in front of Toph and pulls her behind a pillar. General How continues walking toward the stairs. The Dai Li agents can be seen hiding beside the pillars before putting cuffs on his wrists and pulling him down to his knees. Another agent drops in front of How.
character_words: NA

full_text: What's going on here?
character_words: What's going on here?

full_text: You're under house arrest.
character_words: You're under house arrest.

full_text: The coup is happening right now! We've gotta warn the Earth King!
character_words: The coup is happening right now! We've gotta warn the Earth King!

full_text: Sokka, Toph, and Momo run to head to the Earth King. One of the generals is seen walking when some chains fly up and trap him. General Sung is taken by some chains into a dark area. Two other generals are seen in their headquarters when the Dai Li toss some chains to circle around their legs and pull them up. Scene changes to the throne room, where Toph, Sokka, and Momo have just reached the Earth King.
character_words: NA

full_text: Thank goodness we're in time!
character_words: Thank goodness we're in time!

full_text: In time for what?
character_words: In time for what?

full_text: Yeah. What are you in time for, [Cartwheels to Sokka.] cutie?
character_words: Yeah. What are you in time for,  cutie?

full_text: Uh, I'm kinda involved with Suki.
character_words: Uh, I'm kinda involved with Suki.

full_text: Who?
character_words: Who?

full_text: Toph knocks her away from Sokka with earthbending, in which she flips up above them.
character_words: NA

full_text: They're not the real Kyoshi Warriors!
character_words: They're not the real Kyoshi Warriors!

full_text: Kuei gasps, surprised.
character_words: NA

full_text: Sorry to disappoint you.
character_words: Sorry to disappoint you.

full_text: She shoots some of her daggers at Toph, who uses an earth shield to stop them, and kicks the shield to Mai, who jumps over it. Toph brings up another pillar, knocking her. Ty Lee comes up in front of Sokka, laughing. She starts trying to jab him, but he evades all of them.
character_words: NA

full_text: Oooh, it's like we're dancing together!
character_words: Oooh, it's like we're dancing together!

full_text: Azula is seen holding Kuei at flame-point.
character_words: NA

full_text: This fight is over.
character_words: This fight is over.

full_text: Toph and Sokka surrender, and Ty Lee chi blocks them. Momo tries flying away, but a Dai Li agent traps him with a rock glove. Azula shoves Kuei down.
character_words: NA

full_text: Get them all out of my sight.
character_words: Get them all out of my sight.

full_text: Toph, Sokka, Kuei, and Bosco are all taken to prison. Long Feng walks into the room with some Dai Li agents behind him.
character_words: NA

full_text: Now comes the part where I double cross you. Dai Li, arrest the Fire Nation princess! [None of the Dai Li agents move, to Long Feng's disappointment.] I said arrest her! What is wrong with you?!
character_words: Now comes the part where I double cross you. Dai Li, arrest the Fire Nation princess!  I said arrest her! What is wrong with you?!

full_text: It's because they haven't made up their minds. They're waiting to see how this is going to end.
character_words: It's because they haven't made up their minds. They're waiting to see how this is going to end.

full_text: What are you talking about?
character_words: What are you talking about?

full_text: I can see your whole history in your eyes. You were born with nothing, so you've had to struggle, and connive, and claw your way to power. But true power, the divine right to rule, is something you're born with. The fact is, they don't know which one of us is going to be sitting on that throne, and which one is going to be bowing down. [Long Feng looks worried.] But I know, and you know. [She sits down on the throne and crosses her legs.] Well?
character_words: I can see your whole history in your eyes. You were born with nothing, so you've had to struggle, and connive, and claw your way to power. But true power, the divine right to rule, is something you're born with. The fact is, they don't know which one of us is going to be sitting on that throne, and which one is going to be bowing down.  But I know, and you know.  Well?

full_text: [Walks up and bows to her.] You've beaten me at my own game.
character_words: You've beaten me at my own game.

full_text: Don't flatter yourself! You were never even a player.
character_words: Don't flatter yourself! You were never even a player.

full_text: The scene changes to Zuko and Katara in the Crystal Catacombs.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Apologetic.] I'm sorry I yelled at you before.
character_words: I'm sorry I yelled at you before.

full_text: It doesn't matter.
character_words: It doesn't matter.

full_text: It's just that for so long now, whenever I would imagine the face of the enemy, it was your face.
character_words: It's just that for so long now, whenever I would imagine the face of the enemy, it was your face.

full_text: My face? I see. [He touches his scar.]
character_words: My face? I see.

full_text: No, no, that's-that's not what I mean. [Approaches Zuko.]
character_words: No, no, that's-that's not what I mean.

full_text: It's okay. I used to think this scar marked me. The mark of the banished prince, cursed to chase the Avatar forever. But lately, I've realized I'm free to determine my own destiny, even if I'll never be free of my mark.
character_words: It's okay. I used to think this scar marked me. The mark of the banished prince, cursed to chase the Avatar forever. But lately, I've realized I'm free to determine my own destiny, even if I'll never be free of my mark.

full_text: Maybe you could be free of it.
character_words: Maybe you could be free of it.

full_text: What?
character_words: What?

full_text: I have healing abilities.
character_words: I have healing abilities.

full_text: It's a scar, it can't be healed.
character_words: It's a scar, it can't be healed.

full_text: [Holds up a vial.] This is water from the Spirit Oasis at the North Pole. It has special properties, so I've been saving it for something important. [Moves in front of Zuko.] I don't know if it would work, but ...
character_words: This is water from the Spirit Oasis at the North Pole. It has special properties, so I've been saving it for something important.  I don't know if it would work, but ...

full_text: Katara puts one hand on Zuko's scar, only to be interrupted by Aang and Iroh.
character_words: NA

full_text: Aang!
character_words: Aang!

full_text: Aang looks surprised as Katara hugs him, but Aang looks over Katara's shoulder to glare at Zuko. Cut to Zuko, who gets a hug from Iroh, and glares back.
character_words: NA

full_text: Aang, I knew you would come. [She hugs Aang again.]
character_words: Aang, I knew you would come.

full_text: Uncle, I don't understand. What are you doing with the Avatar? [Points to Aang.]
character_words: Uncle, I don't understand. What are you doing with the Avatar?

full_text: Saving you, that's what.
character_words: Saving you, that's what.

full_text: Zuko takes one step in Aang's direction, but Iroh stops him.
character_words: NA

full_text: Zuko, it's time we talked. [To Aang and Katara.] Go help you other friends. We'll catch up with you. [They walk away, Katara looks back at Zuko before moving on.]
character_words: Zuko, it's time we talked.  Go help you other friends. We'll catch up with you.

full_text: Why, Uncle?
character_words: Why, Uncle?

full_text: You're not the man you used to be, Zuko. You are stronger and wiser and freer than you have ever been. And now you have come to the crossroads of your destiny. It's time for you to choose. It's time for you to choose good.
character_words: You're not the man you used to be, Zuko. You are stronger and wiser and freer than you have ever been. And now you have come to the crossroads of your destiny. It's time for you to choose. It's time for you to choose good.

full_text: Zuko yells as crystals grow to encase Iroh. He assumes a fighting position to prepare for the intruders. A different shot shows Azula along with two Dai Li agents sliding down from the sides of the chamber.
character_words: NA

full_text: I expected this kind of treachery from Uncle. [Cut to Iroh, still trapped in crystals. Cut to a side shot, where Zuko protects his uncle.] But Zuko, Prince Zuko, you're a lot of things, but you're not a traitor, are you?
character_words: I expected this kind of treachery from Uncle.  But Zuko, Prince Zuko, you're a lot of things, but you're not a traitor, are you?

full_text: Release him immediately.
character_words: Release him immediately.

full_text: It's not too late for you, Zuko. You can still redeem yourself.
character_words: It's not too late for you, Zuko. You can still redeem yourself.

full_text: [To Zuko.] The kind of redemption she offers is not for you.
character_words: The kind of redemption she offers is not for you.

full_text: Why don't you let him decide, Uncle? [To Zuko.] I need you, Zuko. I've plotted every move of this day, [Makes a fist.] this glorious day in Fire Nation history, and the only way we win is together. At the end of this day, you will have your honor back. You will have Father's love. You will have everything you want.
character_words: Why don't you let him decide, Uncle?  I need you, Zuko. I've plotted every move of this day,  this glorious day in Fire Nation history, and the only way we win is together. At the end of this day, you will have your honor back. You will have Father's love. You will have everything you want.

full_text: Zuko, I am begging you. Look into your heart and see what it is that you truly want.
character_words: Zuko, I am begging you. Look into your heart and see what it is that you truly want.

full_text: You are free to choose.
character_words: You are free to choose.

full_text: She gestures at the two Dai Li agents to leave, who earthbend themselves out. The camera cuts to Zuko multiple times as he contemplates his choice as Azula leaves to follow Aang and Katara. Cut to Aang and Katara running through the Crystal Catacombs.
character_words: NA

full_text: We've got to find Sokka and Toph.
character_words: We've got to find Sokka and Toph.

full_text:
A bolt of blue lightning attacks them from behind. Aang stops it using earthbending. The camera zooms back toward Azula, the source of the lightning. Katara uses waterbending to stop another lightning attack. The mist from the vaporized water allows Azula to jump onto a crystal and firebend two blasts of blue fire. Together, Aang and Katara use waterbending to stop the blasts. Azula finishes her jump by landing on a rock pillar. Aang uses earthbending on the pillar, and Azula gasps once she notices the pillar crumbling. She jumps off and lands between Katara and Aang. She points at both of them, preparing to attack.
A fire blast stops her from attacking, and they look to see the source of the fire blast to be Zuko. Zuko looks from Azula to Katara and Aang, choosing who to attack. Aang gasps once he realizes Zuko will attack him and Aang uses airbending to jump away from the blast. Azula starts dueling with Katara, and Zuko throws multiple fire blasts at Aang. The scene changes to Kuei, Sokka, and Toph in a prison cell. Sokka looks out the door's barred window.
character_words: NA

full_text: See any Dai Li agents nearby?
character_words: See any Dai Li agents nearby?

full_text: Nope, all clear.
character_words: Nope, all clear.

full_text: Toph cracks her knuckles and places her hands against the cell door, preparing to metalbend it. Cut to outside the prison cell in the where the door crumples and gets thrown away from the doorway.
character_words: NA

full_text: Let's go.
character_words: Let's go.

full_text: I'm not leaving without Bosco!
character_words: I'm not leaving without Bosco!

full_text:
Sokka grabs the Earth King's hand and follows the rest of the group. Cut back to Zuko and Aang fighting. Aang airbends the air currents around him to make a human-shaped gust of air at Zuko, knocking him down. Aang attacks Zuko with more airbending, but Zuko maneuvers around the attacks and gets back up on his feet. He fires more blasts at Aang who is clinging on to a rock pillar. Aang jumps onto a clump of crystals to avoid the attack. Furious, Zuko summons a greater blast of fire. Aang earthbends some crystals to protect him, but the crystals shatter, sending Aang flying to another clump of crystals. Zuko uses fire whips to attack Aang once again, but Aang jumps to another patch of crystals and Zuko keeps attacking.
Cut to Azula running away from Katara, who sends a wave of water that cuts her hair. Cut back to Zuko, who is still using his fire whips to attack Aang, who is now jumping along the cave's ceiling. Aang kicks down a stalactite and follows it, using earthbending to increase its impact and sending Zuko flying. The scene focuses on Azula and Katara. Katara encases herself in water and uses it to stop Azula's firebending attacks. One water tentacle captures Azula's hand and another one captures her foot. Zuko frees his sister using firebending to break the tentacles. Azula looks toward the crater Aang had created with the stalactite. Aang crawls out, exhausted. Azula runs toward Aang. Cut to Zuko and Katara fighting. Katara still has water whips on her hands and Zuko starts using his fire whips.
character_words: NA

full_text: I thought you had changed. [She grunts.]
character_words: I thought you had changed.

full_text: I have changed.
character_words: I have changed.

full_text: Zuko fires another blast. Cut to Azula and Aang standing opposite each other. A closer shot of Azula and Aang as they prepare to fight. Azula uses firebending to charge at Aang. Aang earthbends crystals around him into a crystal encased armor and charges at Azula. Azula stops, and uses her firebending to break Aang's crystal armor and send him flying back into an old building. Cut to Mai, Ty Lee, and Bosco in the Earth King's throne room.
character_words: NA

full_text: [To Bosco.] Come on, it's easy. You just walk on your front paws instead of your rear ones. [She demonstrates.] Like this.
character_words: Come on, it's easy. You just walk on your front paws instead of your rear ones.  Like this.

full_text: Suddenly, the floor traps Ty Lee's hands and her feet when they touch the ground. Bosco starts clapping. The view changes to reveal Kuei, Toph, and Sokka.
character_words: NA

full_text: The scene changes back to Zuko and Azula both fighting Katara. Hopelessly outnumbered, Katara gets knocked down. Aang jumps from the old building and earth surfs toward Zuko and Azula to stop them from attacking Katara. A Dai Li agent breaks Aang's surf, knocking him down. More Dai Li agents gather behind Zuko and Azula. Katara starts regaining her focus and Dai Li agents surround her. Katara uses the octopus form to defend herself. Aang stands up and surveys the scene.

full_text: There's too many. [He looks a Katara.]

full_text: [From Aang's memory.] The only way is to let her go.
character_words: The only way is to let her go.

full_text: I'm sorry, Katara.
character_words: I'm sorry, Katara.

full_text: Closing his eyes, he turns away from Azula and Zuko and earthbends a crystal shelter tent. Aang starts meditating. Inside Aang's mind, a giant version of himself in the Avatar State, the Avatar Spirit, holds an airbending sphere with a normal-sized version of himself in the Avatar State. Back in the crystal shelter, Aang enters the Avatar State and the crystal shelter starts glowing, alerting those outside. Inside the shelter, Aang opens his glowing eyes and breaks the crystal above him. The camera shows Katara looking up to Aang, now rising in to the air, with hope. But before Aang can let Katara go and control the Avatar State, a bolt of lightning strikes him in the back. Cut to Azula's eyeball watching Aang getting struck, before it zooms out to show her in a lightning summoning position with her fingers smoking. The Avatar Spirit lets go of Aang and falls out of the plane of existence. As Aang falls down, Katara, tears now falling down her face, creates a wave to catch Aang. The wave knocks down the Dai Li agents. She looks down at Aang and back up with tears in her eyes. Zuko and Azula prepare to attack Aang and Katara, but a blast of fire stops them. Iroh jumps down from the wall of the cave and shields Aang and Katara from Zuko and Azula.
character_words: NA

full_text: You've got to get out of here! I'll hold them off as long as I can! [Fires some blasts at Zuko and Azula.]
character_words: You've got to get out of here! I'll hold them off as long as I can!

full_text: Katara walks away slowly with Aang's body to a waterfall, and she uses waterbending to lift her and Aang up its path. Iroh holds off the Dai Li agents until after Aang and Katara leave. He submits to the Dai Li, who use earthbending to encase him in crystals. Zuko looks at Iroh and Iroh closes his eyes and turns away. Cut to Bosco, Kuei, Toph, Sokka, Aang, and Katara riding on Appa. Appa moans sadly. Cut to a closer shot of Katara placing Aang's body on Appa. Katara opens the vial around her neck and uses water healing on Aang's wounded back. The glowing from the spirit water stops, and Katara starts crying. Aang's tattoos glow for a second and Aang gasps. Katara looks at Aang, who smiles a little, and she holds him closer. Cut to the Earth King's throne room with Azula sitting down at the throne with Zuko at her left.

full_text: We've done it, Zuko. It's taken a hundred years, but the Fire Nation has conquered Ba Sing Se.

full_text: I betrayed Uncle.

full_text: No, he betrayed you. [She stands up from the throne.] Zuko, when you return home, Father will welcome you as a war hero.

Using his glider as a crutch, Aang stumbles across the hall, occasionally leaning on the wall for support due to being weak. He stops at a turn in the hallway upon hearing two guards, who are actually Pipsqueak and The Duke, talking to each other.

full_text: You hear something? [Aang retreats behind the wall, where he dons a determined look and quickly steps out to send a weak air blast at them, which only ruffles their clothes, and moves past the hallway.] He's awake! [The two begin chasing Aang, who struggles to escape.] Stop! Wait!

full_text: Aren't you cold?

character_words: I've got a lot on my mind. It's been so long, over three years since I was home. I wonder what's changed. I wonder how I've changed.

full_text: [Yawns.] I just asked if you were cold, I didn't ask for your whole life story. [Giggles and holds his face in her hands.] Stop worrying.

character_words: You need to take it easy, okay? You got hurt pretty bad.  I like your hair.

full_text: After what happened at Ba Sing Se, we had to get you to safety. We flew back to Chameleon Bay where we found my father and the other Water Tribe men. [Flashback preparing to leave by taking off his Earth King robes revealing traveling robes beneath.] The Earth King decided he wanted to travel the world in disguise, so he set off alone. [Bosco is shown taking off his own attire and hat before Kuei jumps on Bosco and they set off.] Well, not completely alone. [Cut back to Sokka continuing the story.] Soon, the bay was overrun by Fire Nation ships. Rather than fight them all, we captured a single ship and made it our disguise. Since then we've been traveling west. We crossed through the Serpent's Pass a few days ago. We've seen a few Fire Nation ships, but none have bothered us.
character_words: After what happened at Ba Sing Se, we had to get you to safety. We flew back to Chameleon Bay where we found my father and the other Water Tribe men.  The Earth King decided he wanted to travel the world in disguise, so he set off alone.  Well, not completely alone.  Soon, the bay was overrun by Fire Nation ships. Rather than fight them all, we captured a single ship and made it our disguise. Since then we've been traveling west. We crossed through the Serpent's Pass a few days ago. We've seen a few Fire Nation ships, but none have bothered us.

full_text: So what now?
character_words: So what now?

full_text: We've been working on a modified version of the invasion plan.
character_words: We've been working on a modified version of the invasion plan.

full_text: It's Sokka's invasion plan.
character_words: It's Sokka's invasion plan.

full_text: Yes, Sokka's plan. We won't be able to mount a massive invasion without the Earth King's armies, but the solar eclipse will still leave the Fire Nation vulnerable.
character_words: Yes, Sokka's plan. We won't be able to mount a massive invasion without the Earth King's armies, but the solar eclipse will still leave the Fire Nation vulnerable.

full_text: So we're planning a smaller invasion. Just a ragtag team of our friends and allies from around the Earth Kingdom. We already ran into Pipsqueak and The Duke.
character_words: So we're planning a smaller invasion. Just a ragtag team of our friends and allies from around the Earth Kingdom. We already ran into Pipsqueak and The Duke.

full_text: [Eating noodles with The Duke on his shoulder.] Good to see you again, Aang!
character_words: Good to see you again, Aang!

full_text: And the best part is, the eclipse isn't even our biggest advantage! [Whispers.] We have a secret ... you!
character_words: And the best part is, the eclipse isn't even our biggest advantage!  We have a secret ... you!

full_text: Me?
character_words: Me?

full_text: Yep, the whole world thinks you're dead! Isn't that great?
character_words: Yep, the whole world thinks you're dead! Isn't that great?

character_words: No, it's great! It means the Fire Nation won't be hunting us anymore! And even better, they won't be expecting you on the Day of Black Sun!

full_text: No, no, no, no, no. You have no idea. This is so messed up!

full_text: Actually, we're from the Eastern Fleet. We have orders to deliver some cargo.
character_words: Actually, we're from the Eastern Fleet. We have orders to deliver some cargo.

full_text: Ahhh ... Eastern Fleet. Well, nice of Admiral Chan to let us know he was sending one of his ships our way.
character_words: Ahhh ... Eastern Fleet. Well, nice of Admiral Chan to let us know he was sending one of his ships our way.

full_text: I'm sure Admiral Chan meant no disrespect, sir.

full_text: I mean, how hard is it to write a quick note and send a hawk our way?
character_words: I mean, how hard is it to write a quick note and send a hawk our way?

full_text: Next time, we'll send [Bato and Hakoda glance at each other.] two hawks to make sure you get the message.
character_words: Next time, we'll send  two hawks to make sure you get the message.

character_words: Sir ... Admiral Chan has been on leave for two months at Ember Island.

full_text: What? Why doesn't anyone ever tell me anything? Something's not right; they should have known that. I think this is a captured ship. [Whispering.] Just stay quiet until we're safely across the ramp. Then we'll sink this ship.
character_words: What? Why doesn't anyone ever tell me anything? Something's not right; they should have known that. I think this is a captured ship.  Just stay quiet until we're safely across the ramp. Then we'll sink this ship.

Meanwhile, back at the Fire Nation Capital, Zuko feeds turtle ducks in a lake with some bread. Azula joins him.

In frustration he bangs his head against his staff. The other ship fires a harpoon, piercing a hole in Team Avatar's ship's bottom. character_words: Well, I am pretty hungry. Maybe dinner's a good idea.

full_text: Here, [Offering a Fire Nation bandana.] tie this around your head. It will cover your arrow.
character_words: Here,  tie this around your head. It will cover your arrow.

character_words: I'm not going out if I can't wear my arrow proudly!

character_words: Aang, come on. Be practical.

full_text: [Placing a hand on Sokka's shoulder.] You guys go ahead without us. We'll catch up to you. [Toph and Sokka exit. Katara sits on Aang's bed, placing a hand on his shoulder.] I think I understand why being a secret bothers you so much. You don't want people to think you failed.
character_words: You guys go ahead without us. We'll catch up to you.  I think I understand why being a secret bothers you so much. You don't want people to think you failed.

full_text: You're right, I don't. But the problem is, I did fail!
character_words: You're right, I don't. But the problem is, I did fail!

full_text: Aang, that's not true.
character_words: Aang, that's not true.

full_text: [Getting up.] It is true. I was in Ba Sing Se. I was there! But I lost. And now the Earth Kingdom is fallen for good.
character_words: It is true. I was in Ba Sing Se. I was there! But I lost. And now the Earth Kingdom is fallen for good.

full_text: It's not for good. [Getting up too.] Remember, there's still a plan. The invasion!
character_words: It's not for good.  Remember, there's still a plan. The invasion!

full_text: And I hate the invasion plan, too! [Rips down the Fire Nation flag covering his staff.] I don't want you or anyone else risking your lives to fix my mistakes! I've always known that I would have to face the Fire Lord. But now I know I need to do it alone.
character_words: And I hate the invasion plan, too!  I don't want you or anyone else risking your lives to fix my mistakes! I've always known that I would have to face the Fire Lord. But now I know I need to do it alone.

full_text: [Exiting.] Is there anything you need?
