full_text: The camera cuts again to show Zuko kneeling at a painting of his mother.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: I know I've made some bad choices, but today, I'm gonna set things right. [He rises, picks up his sword, covers his head with the hood of his robe, turns his back to the camera and leaves.]
character_words: I know I've made some bad choices, but today, I'm gonna set things right.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: The scene cuts to show Appa landing on the edge of the battlefield. Sokka and Katara help Hakoda onto the ground, and Katara starts trying to heal him.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: How does that feel, dad?
character_words: How does that feel, dad?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: Ah, a little, better. I need, to get back to the troops. [Attempts to stand but is too weak to.] Ahh!
character_words: Ah, a little, better. I need, to get back to the troops.  Ahh!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: You're hurt, badly. You can't fight anymore.
character_words: You're hurt, badly. You can't fight anymore.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: Everyone's counting on me to lead this mission Katara, I won't let them down. [Attempts to stand again but can't.] Ahh!
character_words: Everyone's counting on me to lead this mission Katara, I won't let them down.  Ahh!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: Can't you heal him any faster?
character_words: Can't you heal him any faster?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: I'm doing everything I can.
character_words: I'm doing everything I can.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: [Looks around before looking confidant.] I'll do it.
character_words: I'll do it.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: No offense Sokka, but you're not exactly Mr. Healing Hands.
character_words: No offense Sokka, but you're not exactly Mr. Healing Hands.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: No. [Stands confidently.] I'll lead the invasion force.
character_words: No.  I'll lead the invasion force.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: Don't be crazy Sokka.
character_words: Don't be crazy Sokka.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: Maybe I am a little crazy, but the eclipse is about to start and we need to be up that volcano by the time it does.
character_words: Maybe I am a little crazy, but the eclipse is about to start and we need to be up that volcano by the time it does.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: You can do this. [Cuts to a close-up of him.] I'm proud of you son.
character_words: You can do this.  I'm proud of you son.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: I still think you're crazy, but I'm proud of you too.
character_words: I still think you're crazy, but I'm proud of you too.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: [Nods, puts his helmet on and boards Appa.] Yip yip.
character_words: Yip yip.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: Appa flies away as the scene cuts to show the battlefield, a mess of Fire Nation tanks destroyed everywhere. Several raised battlements fire on the army below. Appa lands and takes out an enemy tank as Sokka makes his way to the back of the saddle to rally the soldiers.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: Listen up, everyone. I want the tanks in wedge formation. Warriors and benders in the middle. We're taking that tower, and heading for the royal palace. [All the tanks come together in wedge formation behind Appa, soldiers protected in the middle. Cut to Sokka, on Appa, who draws his sword and thrusts it forward.] Charge!
character_words: Listen up, everyone. I want the tanks in wedge formation. Warriors and benders in the middle. We're taking that tower, and heading for the royal palace.  Charge!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: The scene cuts to show Aang standing on the edge of the volcano. He glides down to a building attempting to hide. He rises, confused, as there is nobody there.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: [Looking around.] That's strange. [He continues onto the Royal Palace, breaks open the door, and takes a fighting stance.] The Avatar is back! [Realizing no one is around he relaxes, looking confused.] Hello? Anyone home?
character_words: That's strange.  The Avatar is back!  Hello? Anyone home?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: The scene cuts to the tanks, which are making their way up the volcano, unaffected by fire blasts from firebenders in front. Cut to Sokka steering a vehicle full of explosives into a wall before jumping off. Cut to an aerial view showing two explosions at the inner walls. Cut to Sokka, soldiers behind him, as they charge forward. Firebenders attempt to stop them but are pushed back. Cut to Tyro running in with the other troops as Bato appears behind him.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: The Fire Nation is falling back!
character_words: The Fire Nation is falling back!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: Sokka, we're on our way to victory!
character_words: Sokka, we're on our way to victory!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: Sokka looks ahead as the camera cuts to show Aang airbending his way into an empty, darkened throne room.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: No. [Kneels down on the ground; frustrated.] No, no, no! Fire Lord Ozai, where are you!?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
full_text: Scene fades to credits.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text:
The episode opens to the invasion of the Fire Nation where the moon can be seen gradually moving in front of the sun. Cuts to a shot of the submarines remaining stationery at the shores of the plaza. The camera pans upward, revealing the plaza empty except for Huu, disguised as the swamp monster, and several Foggy Swamp Tribe members.
Cuts to overhead shot of the plaza where the invasion carries on. The Fire Nation armies try to shoot the Earth Kingdom tanks, but they are too powerful. Earth Kingdom soldiers run about and fire boulders to counterattack the Fire Nation. A few earthbenders emerge briefly from within the Earth Kingdom tanks and hurl boulders toward the enemy. Cuts to shot of one soldier commanding catapults to launch smoldering boulders. Several fireballs are launched into the air. One lands forcefully near Sokka and a few troops who are huddled together behind a stationery Earth Kingdom tank, studying a map lying on the ground. Cuts to Sokka cringing at the sound of the explosion. Cuts to shot of Katara coming back with Hakoda, Sokka smiles at this sight.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Brightening.] Dad! [Rising and approaching the two.] You're on your feet again.
character_words: Dad!  You're on your feet again.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Sitting down; somewhat weakly.] Thanks to your sister. I'm in no shape to fight, but maybe there's some way I can help.
character_words: Thanks to your sister. I'm in no shape to fight, but maybe there's some way I can help.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Everything's going smoothly and the eclipse hasn't even kicked in yet.
character_words: Everything's going smoothly and the eclipse hasn't even kicked in yet.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Katara moves away, sensing something in the distance.] Let's hope our luck holds out. [Noticing her move away.] Katara, you seem distracted. Is something wrong?
character_words: Let's hope our luck holds out.  Katara, you seem distracted. Is something wrong?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Quizzically.] Yeah. Is that ... is that Aang?
character_words: Yeah. Is that ... is that Aang?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Shocked.] What? [Cuts to shot of Aang riding in on his glider, dodging several fireballs. He lands in front of the group.] Please tell me you're here because the Fire Lord turned out to be a big wimp and you didn't even need the eclipse to take him down.
character_words: What?  Please tell me you're here because the Fire Lord turned out to be a big wimp and you didn't even need the eclipse to take him down.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Katara and Aang kneel with Sokka.] He wasn't home. No one was. The entire palace city is abandoned.
character_words: He wasn't home. No one was. The entire palace city is abandoned.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [With epiphany; the camera shifts from a side-view of his face to a frontal view.] They knew.
character_words: They knew.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Cuts to overhead shot of the group sitting together in a circle. Aang rubs his fingers along the ground idly.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Dismayed.] It's over. The Fire Lord is probably long-gone; far away on some remote island where he'll be safe during the eclipse.
character_words: It's over. The Fire Lord is probably long-gone; far away on some remote island where he'll be safe during the eclipse.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Thoughtfully.] No. My instincts tell me he wouldn't go too far. He would have a secret bunker; somewhere he could go and be safe during the siege but still be close enough to lead his nation.
character_words: No. My instincts tell me he wouldn't go too far. He would have a secret bunker; somewhere he could go and be safe during the siege but still be close enough to lead his nation.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: If it's an underground secret bunker we're looking for, [Points to herself.] I'm just the girl to find it.
character_words: If it's an underground secret bunker we're looking for,  I'm just the girl to find it.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Pulling out mechanism.] The mechanist gave me this timing device. It looks like we've got about ten minutes until the full eclipse. Ten minutes to find the Fire Lord.
character_words: The mechanist gave me this timing device. It looks like we've got about ten minutes until the full eclipse. Ten minutes to find the Fire Lord.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: We can still do this. We can still win the day.
character_words: We can still do this. We can still win the day.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Worried.] Wait! If they knew we were coming it could all be a trap. [Looks at the others; the camera pans to the right.] Maybe we should use the time we have left to make sure we all get out of here safely.
character_words: Wait! If they knew we were coming it could all be a trap.  Maybe we should use the time we have left to make sure we all get out of here safely.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Everyone who's here today came prepared to risk everything for this mission. They know what's at stake. If there's still a chance and there's still hope, I think they would want Aang to go for it.
character_words: Everyone who's here today came prepared to risk everything for this mission. They know what's at stake. If there's still a chance and there's still hope, I think they would want Aang to go for it.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [To Aang.] What do you think? You're the one that has to face the Fire Lord. Whatever you decide, I'm with you.
character_words: What do you think? You're the one that has to face the Fire Lord. Whatever you decide, I'm with you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Rising, turning his back to the group, determined.] I've gotta try.
character_words: I've gotta try.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The scene changes to where Aang, Toph, and Sokka are flying on Appa to the Caldera Volcano in the Fire Nation. Appa lands on the side as the others jump off.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Do you feel anything down there?
character_words: Do you feel anything down there?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Placing her hand on the ground to feel vibrations.] Yep. There are natural tunnels criss-crossing through the inside of the volcano.
character_words: Yep. There are natural tunnels criss-crossing through the inside of the volcano.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Anything else? Is there a structure somewhere?
character_words: Anything else? Is there a structure somewhere?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Taking her hands and digging her fingers into the surface.] There is something big, dense and made of metal deep in the heart of the volcano.
character_words: There is something big, dense and made of metal deep in the heart of the volcano.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Raises arms up in the background.] Sounds like a secret bunker to me.
character_words: Sounds like a secret bunker to me.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Toph earthbends a hole in the volcano, blowing up a cloud of dust. Sokka follows her into the tunnel.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [To Appa and Momo.] Stay safe. We'll be back soon.
character_words: Stay safe. We'll be back soon.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: He enters the tunnel into a dark cavern, with Toph leaning over and surveying the area using seismic sense.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Pointing.] This way! That one's a dead end!
character_words: This way! That one's a dead end!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Following her.] What would we do without you?
character_words: What would we do without you?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Camera view changes to show the group walking past magma channels.] Perish in burning hot magma.
character_words: Perish in burning hot magma.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Observing the magma channels; blushing.] Yeah, pretty much.
character_words: Yeah, pretty much.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: They arrive at a chamber where magma erupts from several spouts in the ground.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The tunnel continues on the other side and It leads right to the bunker.
character_words: The tunnel continues on the other side and It leads right to the bunker.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: We'll have to be fast, but careful.
character_words: We'll have to be fast, but careful.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: He begins walking past only for a geyser of magma to erupt, nearly striking him. Aang uses airbending to cool and solidify the gush.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: How is that careful?
character_words: How is that careful?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: I was wrong. We need to be fast, careful and lucky.
character_words: I was wrong. We need to be fast, careful and lucky.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The three leap and run their way through the chamber, narrowly avoiding magma spouts. They arrive to a rock ledge, completely surrounded by molten lava.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: There's no floor. It's just a river of lava.
character_words: There's no floor. It's just a river of lava.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Spinning his staff open.] Climb aboard and hold on tight.
character_words: Climb aboard and hold on tight.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Scene changes to where Sokka and Toph, screaming in fear, are clinging to Aang's glider for their life as they ride swiftly over the river of lava. They reach the other side safely and approach a large metal, dome-like structure with a huge door.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Impressed.] That's some door!
character_words: That's some door!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Walks over to the door and bangs the metal with her fist.] Not a problem.
character_words: Not a problem.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: She uses metalbending, jamming into the door with her elbows, creating cracks in the metal. She steps back several feet, kisses her fingertips and splits the door wide open. Stepping inside the interior, she points in a direction.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Entering the bunker while making some hand movements.] I am so glad we added you to the group!
character_words: I am so glad we added you to the group!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Back at the invasion, the Fire Nation is beginning to fall back, unsuccessfully trying to deflect the attacks of the invasion force. The Boulder and The Hippo use earthbending to create landslides that collapse several battlements.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Witnessing the sun as the moon begins to overshadow it.] Retreat! Everyone move to the secondary defensive position! Retreat!
character_words: Retreat! Everyone move to the secondary defensive position! Retreat!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The Fire Nation soldiers halt their attacks and begin escaping the scene.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Standing from the side of an Earth Kingdom tank.] The eclipse is only minutes away. We should be able to make it up to hill by the time it starts and secure the entire palace by the time it's finished.
character_words: The eclipse is only minutes away. We should be able to make it up to hill by the time it starts and secure the entire palace by the time it's finished.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The troops cheer gruffly and continue on their way to the capital.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Stopping with her father.] We can wait here if you want.
character_words: We can wait here if you want.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Determined.] No. I wanna press forward with the others.
character_words: No. I wanna press forward with the others.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The two resume walking. The scene changes to Aang, Toph and Sokka running down the tunnels. Qin is coming down the same hallway, whistling. The team, upon seeing him, immediately corners him, prepared to attack.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Out of fear.] The Fire Lord's chamber is that way, down the hall, to the left, [Makes climbing motions with his fingers.] and up the stairs, you can't miss it!
character_words: The Fire Lord's chamber is that way, down the hall, to the left,  and up the stairs, you can't miss it!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Suspicious look suddenly becomes friendly.] Thanks!
character_words: Thanks!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The trio continues on their way to find the Fire Lord. Qin relaxes himself, does a few double takes, and continues whistling as if nothing happened before walking away. The group continues running; Sokka pulls out his timing device.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Only thirty seconds until the total eclipse.
character_words: Only thirty seconds until the total eclipse.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The approach a set of large doors. The camera focuses on a determined Aang.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: I'm ready. I'm ready to face the Fire Lord.
character_words: I'm ready. I'm ready to face the Fire Lord.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: He blasts the doors down with airbending. They step inside where Azula is heard speaking.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: So, you are alive after all. [Aang stares at her in shock.] I had a hunch that you survived. But it doesn't matter. [Proudly.] I've known about the invasion for months.
character_words: So, you are alive after all.  I had a hunch that you survived. But it doesn't matter.  I've known about the invasion for months.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The entire group looks at the princess in surprise and horror. Meanwhile, Zuko stands before a small metal door, a burning torch surrounding either side of it.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [To himself.] I'm ready to face you.
character_words: I'm ready to face you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: He opens the door, revealing Fire Lord Ozai sitting on the far side of the room, drinking tea. The Fire Lord is surrounded by several Royal Procession guards. He sets his teacup down upon seeing the prince.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Prince Zuko? What are you doing here?
character_words: Prince Zuko? What are you doing here?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The scene switches to outside, showing the moon nearly blocking out the entire sun. Cut to aerial view of the inside of the volcano. Cut to the army marching onward as the eclipse is beginning. The mechanist appears near the troops and addresses the troops.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The eclipse is starting! [Pulls out specialized eyewear and puts it on.] Put on your eclipse glasses!
character_words: The eclipse is starting!  Put on your eclipse glasses!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The warriors stop, prop their weapons into the ground and put on their eclipse glasses. Katara and Hakoda, wearing eclipse glasses, turn to watch the eclipse. The camera zooms out, the eclipse having officially begun. The scene changes to where Zuko is confronting Ozai.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Why are you here?
character_words: Why are you here?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: I'm here to tell the truth.
character_words: I'm here to tell the truth.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Off-camera.] Telling the truth during the middle of an eclipse. [Cuts to shot of him.] This should be interesting.
character_words: Telling the truth during the middle of an eclipse.  This should be interesting.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: He sends the guards out of the room. One by one the guards file out, closing the doors behind them.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: First of all, in Ba Sing Se, it was Azula who took down the Avatar, not me.
character_words: First of all, in Ba Sing Se, it was Azula who took down the Avatar, not me.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Why would she lie to me about that?
character_words: Why would she lie to me about that?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Because the Avatar's not dead. He survived.
character_words: Because the Avatar's not dead. He survived.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Shocked and horrified.] What?
character_words: What?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: In fact, he's probably leading this invasion. He could be on his way here right now.
character_words: In fact, he's probably leading this invasion. He could be on his way here right now.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Rises from his seat and points toward the door.] Get out! Get out of my sight right now if you know what's good for you!
character_words: Get out! Get out of my sight right now if you know what's good for you!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: That's another thing. I'm not taking orders from you anymore.
character_words: That's another thing. I'm not taking orders from you anymore.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Angrily.] You will obey me, or this defiant breath will be your last!
character_words: You will obey me, or this defiant breath will be your last!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Pulls out his swords.] Think again. I am going to speak my mind, and you are going to listen.
character_words: Think again. I am going to speak my mind, and you are going to listen.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Ozai sits down, dismayed at the turn of events. The scene switches to Aang, Sokka and Toph confronting Azula.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Where is he? Where's the Fire Lord?
character_words: Where is he? Where's the Fire Lord?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Rises from throne.] You mean I'm not good enough for you? [Acts hurt.] You're hurting my feelings.
character_words: You mean I'm not good enough for you?  You're hurting my feelings.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Stop wasting our time and give us the information. [Points sword at her.] You're powerless right now, so you're in no position to refuse.
character_words: Stop wasting our time and give us the information.  You're powerless right now, so you're in no position to refuse.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Appears on scene and clenches fist.] And stick to the truth. I'll be able to tell if you're lying.
character_words: And stick to the truth. I'll be able to tell if you're lying.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Walking a few steps forward.] Are you sure? I'm a pretty good liar. [Pauses slightly.] I am a four-hundred foot tall purple platypus bear with pink horns and silver wings.
character_words: Are you sure? I'm a pretty good liar.  I am a four-hundred foot tall purple platypus bear with pink horns and silver wings.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Cuts to Toph; short pause.] Okay, you're good, I admit it. [Traps Azula using earthbending.] But you ought to consider telling the truth anyway!
character_words: Okay, you're good, I admit it.  But you ought to consider telling the truth anyway!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Without warning, the earth trap crumbles and breaks, leaving the trio surprised.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Brushing off dust.] When I left Ba Sing Se I brought home some souvenirs: Dai Li agents!
character_words: When I left Ba Sing Se I brought home some souvenirs: Dai Li agents!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Two Dai Li agents descend into the room. Aang sends an air swipe at them with his glider; however, the agents quickly conjure up an earth wall that blocks the attack. Cut to a view of the inside of the volcano. Cuts to Bato reaching the rim of the volcano, followed by the rest of the army.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Surround the periphery! [Raises spear.] We have to secure the palace by the time the eclipse is over! Otherwise, we'll be in for the fight of our lives.
character_words: Surround the periphery!  We have to secure the palace by the time the eclipse is over! Otherwise, we'll be in for the fight of our lives.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Troops from the invasion force incur several Fire Nation soldiers.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Stop! Surrender peacefully and we won't harm you.
character_words: Stop! Surrender peacefully and we won't harm you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: We'll never surrender! [Makes frenzied motions and tries to firebend, but cannot.] Okay, we surrender. [Fire Nation soldiers back down.]
character_words: We'll never surrender!  Okay, we surrender.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Hakoda approaches the rim of the volcano, leaning on his daughter's shoulders.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Happily.] There it is: the Fire Nation Royal Palace. We've come so far.
character_words: There it is: the Fire Nation Royal Palace. We've come so far.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Doubtful.] It's not over yet.
character_words: It's not over yet.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The scene changes to where Zuko is confronting Ozai.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: For so long, all I wanted was for you to love me, to accept me. I thought it was my honor I wanted, but really, I was just trying to please you. You, my father, who banished me just for talking out of turn. [Points a broadsword at his father.] My father, who challenged me, a thirteen-year-old boy, to an Agni Kai. [Cuts to shot of Ozai, looking angered.] How could you possibly justify a duel with a child?
character_words: For so long, all I wanted was for you to love me, to accept me. I thought it was my honor I wanted, but really, I was just trying to please you. You, my father, who banished me just for talking out of turn.  My father, who challenged me, a thirteen-year-old boy, to an Agni Kai.  How could you possibly justify a duel with a child?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Scornful.] It was to teach you respect!
character_words: It was to teach you respect!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: It was cruel! And it was wrong.
character_words: It was cruel! And it was wrong.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Angrily.] Then you have learned nothing!
character_words: Then you have learned nothing!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: No, I've learned everything! And I've had to learn it on my own! Growing up, we were taught that the Fire Nation was the greatest civilization in history. And somehow, the War was our way of sharing our greatness with the rest of the world. What an amazing lie that was. The people of the world are terrified by the Fire Nation. They don't see our greatness. They hate us! And we deserve it! [Camera view shows top profile of Zuko and Ozai through an overhead grate.] We've created an era of fear in the world. And if we don't want the world to destroy itself [Cuts to shot of Zuko.], we need to replace it with an era of peace and kindness.
character_words: No, I've learned everything! And I've had to learn it on my own! Growing up, we were taught that the Fire Nation was the greatest civilization in history. And somehow, the War was our way of sharing our greatness with the rest of the world. What an amazing lie that was. The people of the world are terrified by the Fire Nation. They don't see our greatness. They hate us! And we deserve it!  We've created an era of fear in the world. And if we don't want the world to destroy itself , we need to replace it with an era of peace and kindness.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Laughs.] Your uncle has gotten to you, hasn't he?
character_words: Your uncle has gotten to you, hasn't he?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Yes. [Smiles proudly.] He has.
character_words: Yes.  He has.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text:
Ozai only grows more furious. The scene changes to where Team Avatar is fighting Azula and her Dai Li agents. Aang bursts through the stone wall the agents had created and the team runs toward the Fire Nation princess. A stone column erupts from the surface, which Aang manages to dodge. Toph bends two stone slabs sending the agents toward the two sidewalls of the room. The agents each land on one sidewall and send two earth pillars straight at Toph, who conjures two earth walls to block their attacks. She proceeds to send a stream of earth at Azula, who nimbly back-flips onto the throne after being pushed back by the stream. She smirks as she lands.
Aang races toward her, an agent following close behind. He looks up to catch sight of the agent rocketing along a wall. The agent lands before him and builds up an earth wall which Aang breaks through. He sends an air blast at Azula, who manages to slip away as the blast destroys the throne. Aang attempts the knock her down by sending an air swipe, however, Azula avoids his attack, acutely leaping and flipping between two metal beams. She lands on the ground deftly and continues running away.
The camera focuses on the princess as she leaps from one metal beam to the other. Aang sends another air swipe at her only to miss her yet again. Azula slides down a stone pillar created earlier by a Dai Li agent. She flips onto one of the stone walls Toph conjured up to protect herself before and jumps onto the other one before landing on the ground again. She begins running toward a stone wall. A Dai Li agent slides down a stone column to the floor where he launches Azula into the air by bending an earth pillar below her feet. The camera cuts to Sokka, as he climbs his way through the hole in the stone wall. Played out in slow-motion, Azula is seen leaping through the wall, hovering mere inches over Sokka's face, smiling evilly at him as she passes. She lands onto the ground and begins running again.
Cuts to Sokka, who dodges again to avoid a Dai Li agent, Aang and Toph who each leap through the hole, one after the other. Sokka lands to the ground and follows the group. Cuts to where Aang and Toph are running side by side.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [While running.] I can't pin her down! She's too quick!
character_words: I can't pin her down! She's too quick!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Azula races through a door, entering a tunnel. A Dai Li agent follows close behind, earthbending a stone wall to block the entranceway. He proceeds to run after the princess. Aang bursts the wall and chases them. The Dai Li agent is suddenly pushed over by a stone column that jutted out from the side of tunnel's wall. A hole appears and Toph emerges from it. The agent lands into a crevice of a nearby metal beam and prepares to attack Toph only for the blind earthbender to destroy his rock gloves and metalbend the grooves of the beam together, trapping him. She and Aang continue chasing Azula. Sokka quickly runs up to them.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Stops running.] Wait! Aang! Toph! Stop attacking! Don't you see what she's doing? She's just playing with us. She's not even trying to win this fight!
character_words: Wait! Aang! Toph! Stop attacking! Don't you see what she's doing? She's just playing with us. She's not even trying to win this fight!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Calmly.] Not true. I'm giving it my all.
character_words: Not true. I'm giving it my all.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Angrily.] You're trying to keep us here and waste all our time!
character_words: You're trying to keep us here and waste all our time!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Sarcastically.] Um, right, I think your friend just said that, genius. And since you can't see, I should tell you I'm rolling my eyes. [Rolls her eyes in disgust.]
character_words: Um, right, I think your friend just said that, genius. And since you can't see, I should tell you I'm rolling my eyes.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Angrily.] I'll roll your whole head!
character_words: I'll roll your whole head!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: She's just baiting you again.
character_words: She's just baiting you again.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Okay, so what do we do, just ignore her?
character_words: Okay, so what do we do, just ignore her?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: We don't have a choice. We just have to get out of here and find the Fire Lord on our own somehow.
character_words: We don't have a choice. We just have to get out of here and find the Fire Lord on our own somehow.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The trio turns to leave, walking toward the opposite end of the tunnel.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Coolly.] It's a trap. Don't say I didn't warn you.
character_words: It's a trap. Don't say I didn't warn you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Aang and Toph stop walking and turn to look at the princess, both appearing hesitant. Sokka continues to walk forward.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Waves hand up in gesture.] Ignore!
character_words: Ignore!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Craftily.] So, Sokka's your name, right? My favorite prisoner used to mention you all the time. [Sokka stops walking and casts Azula a suspicious glance.] She was convinced you were going to come rescue her. Of course you never came, and she gave up on you.
character_words: So, Sokka's your name, right? My favorite prisoner used to mention you all the time.  She was convinced you were going to come rescue her. Of course you never came, and she gave up on you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Sokka sheds a few tears before charging at Azula in blind rage. The princess stands perfectly still.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Evilly to herself.] Come and get it.
character_words: Come and get it.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: With a quick motion of her left hand, she reveals a hidden dagger, prepared to strike Sokka when he comes within range. Toph senses the weapon and pins Azula's hand to the tunnel wall by sending a rock aimed at her wrist. Sokka grabs her by the shoulder, coming face-to-face with her.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Where. Is. Suki?!
character_words: Where. Is. Suki?!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The scene changes to Zuko and Ozai.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: After I leave here today, I'm gonna free Uncle Iroh from his prison and I'm gonna beg for his forgiveness. [Cuts to shot of Ozai.] He's the one who's been a real father to me.
character_words: After I leave here today, I'm gonna free Uncle Iroh from his prison and I'm gonna beg for his forgiveness.  He's the one who's been a real father to me.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Laughs.] Oh, that's just beautiful. And maybe he can pass down to you the ways of tea and failure.
character_words: Oh, that's just beautiful. And maybe he can pass down to you the ways of tea and failure.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: But I've come to an even more important decision. [Closes eyes and momentarily pauses.] I'm going to join the Avatar and I'm going to help him defeat you.
character_words: But I've come to an even more important decision.  I'm going to join the Avatar and I'm going to help him defeat you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Smugly.] Really? Since you're a full-blown traitor now and you want me gone, why wait? I'm powerless. You've got your swords. Why don't you just do it now?
character_words: Really? Since you're a full-blown traitor now and you want me gone, why wait? I'm powerless. You've got your swords. Why don't you just do it now?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Because I know my own destiny. Taking you down is the Avatar's destiny. [Puts his swords away.] Goodbye.
character_words: Because I know my own destiny. Taking you down is the Avatar's destiny.  Goodbye.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Camera focuses on Zuko walking away, the Fire Lord in the background, now on his feet.] Coward! You think you're brave enough to face me, but you'll only do it during the eclipse. If you have any real courage, you'll stick around until the sun comes out. Don't you want to know what happened to your mother?
character_words: Coward! You think you're brave enough to face me, but you'll only do it during the eclipse. If you have any real courage, you'll stick around until the sun comes out. Don't you want to know what happened to your mother?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Zuko abruptly stops and turns to face his father. Ozai smiles. The camera cuts to a shot of outside where the solar eclipse continues. Cut back to Zuko confronting Ozai.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: What happened that night?
character_words: What happened that night?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: My father, Fire Lord Azulon, had commanded me to do the unthinkable to you, my own son, and I was going to do it. [Cuts to side-view of Zuko.] Your mother found out and swore she would protect you at any cost. [Camera focuses on Ozai.] She knew I wanted the throne and she proposed a plan, a plan in which I would become Fire Lord and your life would be spared.
character_words: My father, Fire Lord Azulon, had commanded me to do the unthinkable to you, my own son, and I was going to do it.  Your mother found out and swore she would protect you at any cost.  She knew I wanted the throne and she proposed a plan, a plan in which I would become Fire Lord and your life would be spared.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Cuts to a close-up shot of Sokka, who narrows his eyes, angrily interrogating Azula.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Where's Suki? Answer me!
character_words: Where's Suki? Answer me!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Grabs Sokka's shoulder as camera pans slightly to the right.] Sokka, she won't talk.
character_words: Sokka, she won't talk.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Ignores him.] Where are you keeping her?
character_words: Where are you keeping her?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The camera focuses on Azula, who grins smugly, keeping her lips sealed. The shot fades to Ozai who continues his account of the night Ursa disappeared.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Your mother did vicious, treasonous things that night. She knew the consequences and accepted them. For her treason, she was banished.
character_words: Your mother did vicious, treasonous things that night. She knew the consequences and accepted them. For her treason, she was banished.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Grows teary-eyed.] So she's alive?
character_words: So she's alive?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Calmly.] Perhaps. Now I realize that banishment is far too merciful a penalty for treason. [Ozai closes his eyes. Shot fades to outside where the solar eclipse begins to end.] Your penalty will be far steeper.
character_words: Perhaps. Now I realize that banishment is far too merciful a penalty for treason.  Your penalty will be far steeper.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Fade briefly to show the eclipse ending. Fade to Ozai as he opens his eyes and, in split seconds, generates lightning, firing the bolt at Zuko. Zuko slides back several feet from the impact of the bolt, yet manages to redirect it, sending it back to right in front of his father. The resulting explosion causes the Fire Lord to slam into the back wall, where he falls over and raises his head, his face distorted in rage as flames from the lightning attack surround him. The flag behind him falls and the camera cuts to a shot of the room, revealing that Zuko had made his escape. The scene changes to Team Avatar.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Oh, sounds like the firebending's back on.
character_words: Oh, sounds like the firebending's back on.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: She kicks her leg in a wide arc, sending a fire blast that nearly strikes Sokka. Sokka takes several steps back as he narrowly avoids Azula's attacks. She back-flips onto the tunnel wall and uses firebending to break free from Toph's earth cuffs. She flips forward, extending her leg forward, nearly striking Aang, who manages to dodge the incoming danger.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Rises and smirks.] Dad's all the way at the end of the hall then down a secret stairway on the left. I'm sure he'd be more than happy to see you now.
character_words: Dad's all the way at the end of the hall then down a secret stairway on the left. I'm sure he'd be more than happy to see you now.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: She runs away, leaving the trio dismayed.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Ashamed.] I fell for it! I used up all our time.
character_words: I fell for it! I used up all our time.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: It's not your fault, Sokka. Azula was ready for us. She had every move planned out.
character_words: It's not your fault, Sokka. Azula was ready for us. She had every move planned out.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Sorrowfully.] And now it's too late.
character_words: And now it's too late.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Maybe it's not too late. The eclipse is over. But I can face the Fire Lord anyway.
character_words: Maybe it's not too late. The eclipse is over. But I can face the Fire Lord anyway.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Matter-of-factly.] No. I don't think that's a good idea.
character_words: No. I don't think that's a good idea.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: But I'm ready! I came here with a job to do and everyone's counting on me.
character_words: But I'm ready! I came here with a job to do and everyone's counting on me.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The Fire Lord knew we were coming this time. We thought we had surprise on our side but we didn't. It just wasn't our day. What we need to do now is go and help our friends.
character_words: The Fire Lord knew we were coming this time. We thought we had surprise on our side but we didn't. It just wasn't our day. What we need to do now is go and help our friends.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Disappointed.] I guess you guys are right.
character_words: I guess you guys are right.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Placing a hand on Aang's shoulder.] You'll have another chance. I know you will.
character_words: You'll have another chance. I know you will.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The scene changes to outside where the Invasion force has ceased their attacks. Katara leans Hakoda against an Earth Kingdom tank.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: What should we do, Hakoda? Shouldn't something have happened by now?
character_words: What should we do, Hakoda? Shouldn't something have happened by now?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: I don't know. [Katara crosses her arms in scorn.] But now that the eclipse is over, I expect we're going to see some firebenders any minute.
character_words: I don't know.  But now that the eclipse is over, I expect we're going to see some firebenders any minute.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Bato looks up and suddenly becomes alarmed. The camera zooms out to Katara, who looks behind her in the same direction. Cuts to the top of the Royal Palace, where several war balloons rise into the air. Cuts to view of the entire palace, the battlefield where dozens of soldiers stand and where the war balloons continue to rise. Cuts to close-up of the balloons, Fire Nation soldiers fueling them with firebending.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Off-camera.] My own invention. [Cuts to shot of him.] Oh, this is terrible!
character_words: My own invention.  Oh, this is terrible!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Teo lays a hand on his father's shoulder to comfort him. Cuts to front shot of a war balloon, a much larger contraption rising behind it. Cuts to shot of the entire battlefield, showing the balloons and five airships rising into the air. Katara turns and points to the sky.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: They're back!
character_words: They're back!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Cut to Appa groaning as he flies in, Toph, Aang, Sokka, and Momo with him. Cuts to Aang looking at the airships. Shows shot of him and Sokka looking very dismayed at the turn of events. Cuts to an airship; camera pans to the right to reveal it entirely. Cuts to Katara running up to Appa who lands. Aang looks at her with a saddened look on his face as the camera pans to Sokka and Toph in the saddle.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Getting off Appa.] It was all a trap! Azula knew we were coming and she's plotted out every move! [Toph gets off, too.] We've just got to get to the beach as fast as we can. [Hakoda approaches.] If we can make it to the submarines, maybe we can get away safely.
character_words: It was all a trap! Azula knew we were coming and she's plotted out every move!  We've just got to get to the beach as fast as we can.  If we can make it to the submarines, maybe we can get away safely.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: They've got air power, but so do I! [Cut to Aang as he opens his glider.] I'm gonna do what I can to slow them down. [He tosses his glider into the air and takes off, Momo following close behind.]
character_words: They've got air power, but so do I!  I'm gonna do what I can to slow them down.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Appa, you and I can help too. [Mounts Appa and follows Aang.]
character_words: Appa, you and I can help too.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Shows front view of the airship fleet, Aang flying straight toward it, Katara coming up close behind. Cuts back to Sokka and the invasion force.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Everyone, let's get back to the subs! [Begins running.]
character_words: Everyone, let's get back to the subs!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Cuts back to Aang flying on his glider and Katara flying on Appa. Aang approaches a war balloon. One of the soldiers operating it sees him and fires at him. Aang twists around, dodging several fireballs. Cuts to side-view of him; he closes his glider and soars straight through the balloon, cutting through it. The balloon begins falling as it loses air. Katara approaches another balloon, swiveling around once and slicing it clean through with waterbending. The top portion of the balloon drifts upward while the rest falls downward. Cuts to where the team keeps heading toward the fleet, avoiding fireballs at every turn. Appa's armor is struck with fireballs several times; he grunts. Katara uses water shields to deflect the blasts.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: We can't keep them all back! There's too many of them!
character_words: We can't keep them all back! There's too many of them!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Let's join the others! [Dodges another fireball.]
character_words: Let's join the others!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Cuts to shot of the capital as they fly away. The scene changes to the capital city prison; camera pans downward to the ground where Zuko is seen running toward the building. Inside, he runs down a hallway past a guard, who crouches in fear as he passes. He arrives at the entrance to his uncle's prison cell.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Uncle! [Zuko sees a big hole in Iroh's cell and sees Warden Poon on the ground; grabs a dazed Poon by the collar.] Where is my uncle?
character_words: Uncle!  Where is my uncle?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Bewildered and terrified.] He's gone. He busted himself out. I've never seen anything like it, he was like a one-man army!
character_words: He's gone. He busted himself out. I've never seen anything like it, he was like a one-man army!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Zuko lets go of Poon and leaves. At the invasion, the team is navigating their way down the sides of the volcano. Cuts to view of the underside of an airship; a hatch at the bottom opens.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Try and find cover! I think we're about to see some bombs!
character_words: Try and find cover! I think we're about to see some bombs!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Aang, Katara, and Appa are seen approaching in the distance. Toph bends a ceiling of earth overhead. Cuts to undersides of the airships as they release bombs. Cuts to overhead view of the invasion force as the bombs rain down and detonate. One bomb lands very near the earth ceiling, causing it to start crumbling. Toph props it up by bending two earth columns to support it. Cuts to view of the earthbending tanks, the soldiers being shaken about by the activity. The airships pass over. The team runs out from under the ceiling. Cuts to view of the Royal Plaza, the airships flying past.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Why aren't they turning around to attack us again?
character_words: Why aren't they turning around to attack us again?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Thoughtfully.] They're heading for the beach ... [Alarmed.] They're gonna destroy the submarines!
character_words: They're heading for the beach ...  They're gonna destroy the submarines!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Hopelessly.] How are we all going to escape?
character_words: How are we all going to escape?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Approaching, helped by Bato.] We're not.
character_words: We're not.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Looks determined.] Then our only choice is to stand and fight. We have the Avatar, we could still win.
character_words: Then our only choice is to stand and fight. We have the Avatar, we could still win.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Yes, with the Avatar we could still win. On another day. You kids have to leave. You have to escape on Appa together.
character_words: Yes, with the Avatar we could still win. On another day. You kids have to leave. You have to escape on Appa together.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Surprised.] What? [Grabs Hakoda.] We can't leave you behind! [Looks at the rest of the invasion force.] We won't leave anyone behind!
character_words: What?  We can't leave you behind!  We won't leave anyone behind!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: You're our only chance in the long run. You and Sokka have to go with Aang somewhere safe. [Katara looks back at Aang and Sokka sorrowfully.] It's the only way to keep hope alive.
character_words: You're our only chance in the long run. You and Sokka have to go with Aang somewhere safe.  It's the only way to keep hope alive.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The youngest of our group should go with you. The adults will stay behind and surrender. We'll be prisoners, but we'll all survive this battle.
character_words: The youngest of our group should go with you. The adults will stay behind and surrender. We'll be prisoners, but we'll all survive this battle.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Approaching the two.] I've got some experience with the Fire Nation prisons. It's not going to be easy, but we'll get by.
character_words: I've got some experience with the Fire Nation prisons. It's not going to be easy, but we'll get by.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Turning, alarmed.] They're at the beach already!
character_words: They're at the beach already!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Cuts to the Royal Plaza, the shadows of the airships seen moving along the ground. Camera pans upward to the shore. Cuts to view of the swamp monster, airships flying directly overhead. Tho and Due attempt to deflect the bombs with waterbending; they manage to destroy some. The swamp monster grabs several more and tosses them away. One bomb, however, lands inside the seaweed figure and detonates. Steaming piles of seaweed land onto the ground. Huu, along with Tho and Due, emerge from the mess, defeated. Five bombs are released onto each of the submarines, destroying all five of them. The team looks on in disappointment. Sokka closes his eyes resentfully.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Rising on an earth column along with Toph and helps son mount Appa.] Bye, son. [Hugs Teo.]
character_words: Bye, son.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Bye, Dad. I'm really proud of you.
character_words: Bye, Dad. I'm really proud of you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The mechanist looks up at Teo as the earth column is lowered by Toph.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Struggling to mount Appa.] I'll miss you, Pipsqueak.
character_words: I'll miss you, Pipsqueak.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Propping The Duke onto the saddle.] Take care, The Duke.
character_words: Take care, The Duke.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Hugs his father.] We'll be back for you, Dad.
character_words: We'll be back for you, Dad.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: If we don't escape on our own first.
character_words: If we don't escape on our own first.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Haru bows respectfully to Tyro.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Hands on both Sokka and Katara's shoulders.] We lost today, but we've never been this close. [Kneels down to face his two children.] We tasted victory, and that counts for something.
character_words: We lost today, but we've never been this close.  We tasted victory, and that counts for something.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: We'll miss you, Dad. [The two hug him.]
character_words: We'll miss you, Dad.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Bye, Dad. We won't be apart for too long this time. I promise.
character_words: Bye, Dad. We won't be apart for too long this time. I promise.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Cuts to shot of Hakoda embracing his children; he closes his eyes. Cuts to shot of Aang, sitting on Appa's head, tears streaming down his face. Katara approaches him, puts a hand around his shoulders and smiles at him proudly. Aang wipes away his tears and rises to face the invasion force.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Thank you all for being so brave and so strong. I'm gonna make this up to you.
character_words: Thank you all for being so brave and so strong. I'm gonna make this up to you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: The team turns to leave on Appa. Appa moans and takes off as the team looks back sadly at those remaining. Cut to a view of those remaining watching them leave. Meanwhile, on a Fire Nation airship.
character_words: NA

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Should we follow them, princess?
character_words: Should we follow them, princess?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: No, they're too fast. It doesn't matter. They'll be back. [Smiles evilly.]
character_words: No, they're too fast. It doesn't matter. They'll be back.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: [Looking at the airship in the distance then looks ahead.] I know just the place for us to go where we'll be safe for a while. The Western Air Temple!
character_words: I know just the place for us to go where we'll be safe for a while. The Western Air Temple!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
full_text: Appa flies away in the distance. A war balloon approaches from behind. Cuts to Zuko, a determined look on his face as he follows them. Fades to credits.
character_words: NA

full_text: The episode begins with an aerial shot of Appa, still in his armor, and the rest of the gang, now including Haru, The Duke, and Teo, searching for the Western Air Temple on foot. Cut to Toph leading with Haru and Sokka behind. Cut to Aang, Momo on his head, walking next to Appa. Cut to Teo and The Duke. Cut to Katara, Sokka next to her.
character_words: NA

full_text: This is humiliating.
character_words: This is humiliating.

full_text: [Looking up at her.] You mean getting thoroughly spanked by the Fire Nation or having to walk all the way to the Western Air Temple?
character_words: You mean getting thoroughly spanked by the Fire Nation or having to walk all the way to the Western Air Temple?

full_text: [Looking at him momentarily before answering.] Both.
character_words: Both.

full_text: Cut to Aang.
character_words: NA

full_text: [He pets Appa, smiling slightly.] Sorry guys, but Appa gets tired carrying all these people.
character_words: Sorry guys, but Appa gets tired carrying all these people.

full_text: Cut to a view of the whole team, Toph leading the way.
character_words: NA

full_text: I wonder how the rest of the troops are.
character_words: I wonder how the rest of the troops are.

full_text: [Frontal view.] They're probably on their way to a prison. Seems like my dad just got out and now he's going back in.
character_words: They're probably on their way to a prison. Seems like my dad just got out and now he's going back in.

full_text: Cut to view of The Duke walking next to Sokka.
character_words: NA

full_text: I miss Pipsqueak.
character_words: I miss Pipsqueak.

full_text: I miss not having blisters on my feet.
character_words: I miss not having blisters on my feet.

full_text: Brief view of the team from behind before we see Toph's foot stamp down. Cut to Toph looking up, smiling.
character_words: NA

full_text: Hey, we're here! I can feel it!
character_words: Hey, we're here! I can feel it!

full_text: Cut to a wide panning shot of the surrounding area. A cliff edge in front of the gang.
character_words: NA

full_text: Uhhh ... I think your feet need their eyes checked.
character_words: Uhhh ... I think your feet need their eyes checked.

full_text: Cut to Aang with Sokka behind.
character_words: NA

full_text: No, she's right. We are here!
character_words: No, she's right. We are here!

full_text: Sokka looks around before shrugging. Cut to the front of the gang as the camera pans down, revealing the temple, hidden under the cliff.
character_words: NA

full_text: Wow ... it's amazing!
character_words: Wow ... it's amazing!

full_text: At another part of the temple, Zuko descends down a rope and swings back and forth twice before jumping down. When he lands on the ground, he has a flashback to three years ago, just after his banishment. Cut to a frontal shot of the cliff similar to the one Toph and the group were on earlier. Camera pans down to show the various natural structures through the mist of the temple.
character_words: NA

full_text: What a stunning view.
character_words: What a stunning view.

full_text: Cut to Zuko with covering over his fresh scar. Iroh stands behind him.
character_words: NA

full_text: The only view I'm interested in seeing is the Avatar in chains.
character_words: The only view I'm interested in seeing is the Avatar in chains.

full_text: You know, the Avatar hasn't been seen for one hundred years. The chances of finding him here are very slim. [Cut to a shot of Zuko's bandaged side.]
character_words: You know, the Avatar hasn't been seen for one hundred years. The chances of finding him here are very slim.

full_text: [Determined.] First we'll check each of the air temples, then we'll scour the world, searching even the most remote locations until we find him.
character_words: First we'll check each of the air temples, then we'll scour the world, searching even the most remote locations until we find him.

full_text: Prince Zuko, it's only been a week since your banishment. You should take some time to heal and rest.
character_words: Prince Zuko, it's only been a week since your banishment. You should take some time to heal and rest.

full_text: What else would I expect to hear from the laziest man in the Fire Nation? [Iroh sighs.] The only way to regain my honor is to find the Avatar, so I will.
character_words: What else would I expect to hear from the laziest man in the Fire Nation?  The only way to regain my honor is to find the Avatar, so I will.

full_text: Iroh walks away as the flashback ends, fading to Zuko who looks disappointed in himself. Zuko notices Appa flying nearby and hides quickly. He subsequently runs off. Cut back to Team Avatar.
character_words: NA

full_text: It's so different from the Northern Air Temple. I wonder if there are any secret rooms.
character_words: It's so different from the Northern Air Temple. I wonder if there are any secret rooms.

full_text: [Running off to explore.] Let's go check it out!
character_words: Let's go check it out!

full_text: Teo and The Duke follow Haru. Aang tries to, but is cut off by Katara.
character_words: NA

full_text: You guys go. I think we need to talk about some things.
character_words: You guys go. I think we need to talk about some things.

full_text: I'll race you, Duke.
character_words: I'll race you, Duke.

full_text: I told you, it's The Duke!
character_words: I told you, it's The Duke!

full_text: The three head off. Cut to Katara and Aang.
character_words: NA

full_text: Why can't I go?
character_words: Why can't I go?

full_text: We need to decide what we're gonna do now, and since you're the Avatar, maybe you should be a part of this.
character_words: We need to decide what we're gonna do now, and since you're the Avatar, maybe you should be a part of this.

full_text: [Sitting down.] Fair enough. So, what's the new plan?
character_words: Fair enough. So, what's the new plan?

full_text: Well, if you ask me, the new plan is the old plan! You just need to master all four elements and confront the Fire Lord before the comet comes.
character_words: Well, if you ask me, the new plan is the old plan! You just need to master all four elements and confront the Fire Lord before the comet comes.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Oh, yeah. That's great, no problem. I'll just do that.
character_words: Oh, yeah. That's great, no problem. I'll just do that.

full_text: Aang, no one said it's going to be easy.
character_words: Aang, no one said it's going to be easy.

full_text: Well, it's not even gonna be possible! Where am I supposed to get a firebending teacher?
character_words: Well, it's not even gonna be possible! Where am I supposed to get a firebending teacher?

full_text: We could look for Jeong Jeong!
character_words: We could look for Jeong Jeong!

full_text: [Shooting her idea down.] Yeah ... right. [He lays down on the bench without a care.] Like we'll ever run into Jeong Jeong again.
character_words: Yeah ... right.  Like we'll ever run into Jeong Jeong again.

full_text: [Curiously.] Who's ... oh, [She folds her arms irritably.] never mind. If it's important I'll find out.
character_words: Who's ... oh,  never mind. If it's important I'll find out.

full_text: Oh well, guess we can't come up with anybody. Why don't we just take a nice tour around the temple? [He and Momo fly off.]
character_words: Oh well, guess we can't come up with anybody. Why don't we just take a nice tour around the temple?

full_text: What's up with him?
character_words: What's up with him?

full_text: There's gotta be someone who can teach him firebending.
character_words: There's gotta be someone who can teach him firebending.

full_text: Katara and Toph look down dejectedly as the camera slowly pans up and fades to a smiling Zuko in a forested area with his tent.
character_words: NA

full_text: Hello ... [Raises an arm in greeting.] Zuko here, but I guess [Rubs his hand against the back of his head nervously.] you probably already know me, sort of. Uhhh ... so, the thing is I have a lot of firebending experience, and I'm [Places an arm on his chest with pride.] considered to be pretty good at it. [He continues smiling.] Well, you've seen it, you know, when I was attacking you. [His eyes widen.] Uhhh ... yeah, I guess [Places his fingers against his forehead in embarrassment.] I should apologize for that. But anyway, [Waves an arm to the side dismissively.] I'm good now. [Clenches both fists and places one on his chest while the other arm is raised.] I mean, I thought I was good before, but I realize I was bad, [He gets visibly uncomfortable and drops his arms into a slouch.] but anyway, I think it's time I joined your group and taught [Straightens up with a sincere expression on his face.] the Avatar firebending. [A badgerfrog croaks at him. Angrily.] Well, what's your answer? [The badgerfrog hops on his head before hopping away.] Yeah ... that's what I'd say, too. How am I supposed to convince these people that I'm on their side? What would Uncle do? [Imitating Iroh.] Zuko, you have to look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self, reveal itself. [Normal voice.] Even when I'm talking for him I can't figure out what he means. What would Azula do? [Imitating Azula.] Listen, Avatar, I can join your group, or I can do something unspeakably horrible to you and your friends. Your choice. [Normal voice. Stops and sits down.] I guess I'm just not that good at impersonations.

full_text: A badgerfrog jumps in front of him as he sits and croaks. Meanwhile, Aang is flying on his glider. Sokka, Katara, and Toph follow him on Appa.
character_words: NA

full_text: Aang, can we talk about you learning firebending now?
character_words: Aang, can we talk about you learning firebending now?

full_text: What? The wind is too loud in my ears! Check out this loop!
character_words: What? The wind is too loud in my ears! Check out this loop!

full_text: Aang proceeds to do a loop.
character_words: NA

full_text: Aang, I think we should be making some plans about our future!
character_words: Aang, I think we should be making some plans about our future!

full_text: Okay, we can do that while I show you the giant Pai Sho table! Oh, you're gonna love the all-day echo chamber!
character_words: Okay, we can do that while I show you the giant Pai Sho table! Oh, you're gonna love the all-day echo chamber!

full_text: [Cut to a close up of Toph as she turns serious.] I think that'll have to wait.
character_words: I think that'll have to wait.

full_text: Toph points behind herself, and the camera zooms out to show Team Avatar looking at her quizzically. Appa moves out of the way to reveal a shadow, and as the camera pans up, it is revealed to belong to Zuko. Cut to a close-up of the team as they look at him with shocked expressions, which subsequently turn into anger.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Cut to a close up of Zuko's face.] Hello ... [Raises his arm up in greeting and waves.] Zuko here.
character_words: Hello ...  Zuko here.

full_text: The gang prepares to attack.
character_words: NA

full_text: Hey, I heard you guys flying around down there, so, I just thought I'd wait for you here. [Appa growls at him and licks him twice. Cut to a surprised Momo and Aang as he lowers his staff slightly.] I know you must be surprised to see me here.
character_words: Hey, I heard you guys flying around down there, so, I just thought I'd wait for you here.  I know you must be surprised to see me here.

full_text: Not really, since you've followed us all over the world.
character_words: Not really, since you've followed us all over the world.

full_text: Right. Well, uhhh ... anyway ... what I wanted to tell you about is that I've changed, and I, uhhh, I'm good now, and well I think I should join your group, oh, and I can teach firebending to you. [The gang expresses shock.] See, I, uhhh ...
character_words: Right. Well, uhhh ... anyway ... what I wanted to tell you about is that I've changed, and I, uhhh, I'm good now, and well I think I should join your group, oh, and I can teach firebending to you.  See, I, uhhh ...

full_text: You want to what now?
character_words: You want to what now?

full_text: You can't possibly think that any of us would trust you, can you? I mean, how stupid do you think we are?!
character_words: You can't possibly think that any of us would trust you, can you? I mean, how stupid do you think we are?!

full_text: Yeah, all you've ever done is hunt us down and try to capture Aang!
character_words: Yeah, all you've ever done is hunt us down and try to capture Aang!

full_text: I've done some good things! I mean, I could have stolen your bison in Ba Sing Se, but I set him free. That's something! [Appa licks him again, much to his surprise.]
character_words: I've done some good things! I mean, I could have stolen your bison in Ba Sing Se, but I set him free. That's something!

full_text: Appa [The siblings turn toward her.] does seem to like him.
character_words: Appa  does seem to like him.

full_text: He probably just covered himself in honey or something so that Appa would lick him. I'm not buying it.
character_words: He probably just covered himself in honey or something so that Appa would lick him. I'm not buying it.

full_text: I can understand why you wouldn't trust me, and I know I've made some mistakes in the past.
character_words: I can understand why you wouldn't trust me, and I know I've made some mistakes in the past.

full_text: Like when you attacked our village?
character_words: Like when you attacked our village?

full_text: Or when you stole my mother's necklace and used it to track us down and capture us?
character_words: Or when you stole my mother's necklace and used it to track us down and capture us?

full_text: Look, I admit I've some awful things. I was wrong to try to capture you, and I'm sorry that I attacked the Water Tribe. And I never should have sent that Fire Nation assassin after you. [Toph and Sokka's eyes widen with shock.] I'm going to try and stop-
character_words: Look, I admit I've some awful things. I was wrong to try to capture you, and I'm sorry that I attacked the Water Tribe. And I never should have sent that Fire Nation assassin after you.  I'm going to try and stop-

full_text: [Pulls out his boomerang; angrily.] Wait, you sent Combustion Man after us?
character_words: Wait, you sent Combustion Man after us?

full_text: Well, that's not his name, but-
character_words: Well, that's not his name, but-

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Ohhh, sorry. I didn't mean to insult your friend!
character_words: Ohhh, sorry. I didn't mean to insult your friend!

full_text: [Angrily.] He's not my friend!
character_words: He's not my friend!

full_text: That guy locked me and Katara in jail and tried to blow us all up!
character_words: That guy locked me and Katara in jail and tried to blow us all up!

full_text: [To Aang.] Why aren't you saying anything? You once said you thought we could be friends. You know I have good in me.
character_words: Why aren't you saying anything? You once said you thought we could be friends. You know I have good in me.

full_text: Aang turns to look at his friends, and Sokka shakes his head at Aang.
character_words: NA

full_text: There's no way we can trust you after everything you've done. We'll never let you join us.
character_words: There's no way we can trust you after everything you've done. We'll never let you join us.

full_text: You need to get out of here. Now.
character_words: You need to get out of here. Now.

full_text: I'm trying to explain that I'm not that person anymore!
character_words: I'm trying to explain that I'm not that person anymore!

full_text: Either you leave, or we attack.
character_words: Either you leave, or we attack.

full_text: If you won't accept me as a friend, then maybe you'll take me as a prisoner. [Zuko kneels down, bends his head, and raises his arms in surrender.]
character_words: If you won't accept me as a friend, then maybe you'll take me as a prisoner.

full_text: No, we won't! [Blasts water at him.] Get out of here, and don't come back! And if we ever see you again, well, we'd better not see you again!
character_words: No, we won't!  Get out of here, and don't come back! And if we ever see you again, well, we'd better not see you again!

full_text: Zuko walks away. Cut back to Zuko's campsite.
