character_words: NA

full_text: Uggh! I can't believe how stupid I am! I mean, what was I thinking? Telling them I sent an assassin after them? Why didn't I just say Azula did that? They would have believed that! Stupid! [A badgerfrog croaks at him.] Uggh!
character_words: Uggh! I can't believe how stupid I am! I mean, what was I thinking? Telling them I sent an assassin after them? Why didn't I just say Azula did that? They would have believed that! Stupid!  Uggh!

full_text: Back at the air temple.
character_words: NA

full_text: Why would he try to fool us like that?
character_words: Why would he try to fool us like that?

full_text: Obviously he wants to lead us into some kind of trap.
character_words: Obviously he wants to lead us into some kind of trap.

full_text: This is just like when we were in prison together at Ba Sing Se. He starts talking about his mother and making it seem like he's an actual human being with feelings.
character_words: This is just like when we were in prison together at Ba Sing Se. He starts talking about his mother and making it seem like he's an actual human being with feelings.

full_text: He wants you to trust and feel sorry for him so you let your guard down, then he strikes.
character_words: He wants you to trust and feel sorry for him so you let your guard down, then he strikes.

full_text: The thing is, it worked. I did feel sorry for him. I felt like he was really confused and hurt, but obviously, when the time came, he made his choice, and we paid the price. We can't trust him.
character_words: The thing is, it worked. I did feel sorry for him. I felt like he was really confused and hurt, but obviously, when the time came, he made his choice, and we paid the price. We can't trust him.

full_text: I kind of have a confession to make. Remember when you two were sick and I got captured by Zhao?
character_words: I kind of have a confession to make. Remember when you two were sick and I got captured by Zhao?

full_text: And you made us suck on frozen frogs? How could I forget? I had a wart on the flap that hangs down from the back of my throat for a month!
character_words: And you made us suck on frozen frogs? How could I forget? I had a wart on the flap that hangs down from the back of my throat for a month!

full_text: Sokka, I looked at it, and I told you, there was nothing there!
character_words: Sokka, I looked at it, and I told you, there was nothing there!

full_text: I could feel it! It's my throatal flap!
character_words: I could feel it! It's my throatal flap!

full_text: Anyway, when Zhao had me chained up, it was Zuko who came in and got me out. He risked his life to save me.
character_words: Anyway, when Zhao had me chained up, it was Zuko who came in and got me out. He risked his life to save me.

full_text: No way! I'm sure he only did it so he could capture you himself!
character_words: No way! I'm sure he only did it so he could capture you himself!

full_text: Yeah, face it Aang, you're nothing but a big prize to him.
character_words: Yeah, face it Aang, you're nothing but a big prize to him.

full_text: You're probably right.
character_words: You're probably right.

full_text: And what was all that crazy stuff about setting Appa free? What a liar!
character_words: And what was all that crazy stuff about setting Appa free? What a liar!

full_text: Actually, he wasn't lying.
character_words: Actually, he wasn't lying.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Oh, hooray! In a lifetime of evil, at least he didn't add animal cruelty to the list.
character_words: Oh, hooray! In a lifetime of evil, at least he didn't add animal cruelty to the list.

full_text: I'm just saying that, considering his messed-up family and how he was raised, he could have turned out a lot worse.
character_words: I'm just saying that, considering his messed-up family and how he was raised, he could have turned out a lot worse.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] You're right, Toph! Let's go find him and give him a medal. The "not as much of a jerk as you could have been" award!
character_words: You're right, Toph! Let's go find him and give him a medal. The "not as much of a jerk as you could have been" award!

full_text: All I know is that while he was talking to us, he was sincere. Maybe you're all just letting your hurt feelings keep you from thinking clearly.
character_words: All I know is that while he was talking to us, he was sincere. Maybe you're all just letting your hurt feelings keep you from thinking clearly.

full_text: Easy for you to say! You weren't there when he had us attacked by pirates!
character_words: Easy for you to say! You weren't there when he had us attacked by pirates!

full_text: Or when he burned down Kyoshi Island!
character_words: Or when he burned down Kyoshi Island!

full_text: Or when he tried to capture me at the Fire Temple!
character_words: Or when he tried to capture me at the Fire Temple!

full_text: Why would you even try to defend him?
character_words: Why would you even try to defend him?

full_text: [Angrily.] Because Katara, you're all ignoring one crucial fact: [Pokes Aang in the chest.] Aang needs a firebending teacher! We can't think of a single person in the world to do the job! Now one shows up on a silver platter, and you won't even think about it? [Stamps her feet on the ground to a point where the ground shakes slightly.]
character_words: Because Katara, you're all ignoring one crucial fact:  Aang needs a firebending teacher! We can't think of a single person in the world to do the job! Now one shows up on a silver platter, and you won't even think about it?

full_text: I'm not having Zuko as my teacher!
character_words: I'm not having Zuko as my teacher!

full_text: You're darn right you're not, buddy.
character_words: You're darn right you're not, buddy.

full_text: Well, I guess that settles that.
character_words: Well, I guess that settles that.

full_text: Ergh! I'm beginning to wonder who's really the blind one around here! [Walks away.]
character_words: Ergh! I'm beginning to wonder who's really the blind one around here!

full_text: Nightfall. Zuko's campsite. Zuko is asleep when he hears something.
character_words: NA

full_text: Who's there? Stay back! [Whips fire.]
character_words: Who's there? Stay back!

full_text: It's me! [Throws up an earth shield, but steps back into Zuko's fire blast.] Ow! You burned my feet!
character_words: It's me!  Ow! You burned my feet!

full_text: I'm sorry, it was a mistake! [Comes toward her, but she begins to crawl away.]
character_words: I'm sorry, it was a mistake!

full_text: Get away from me! [As Toph crawls away, she grabs the earth under her and throws it backward at Zuko.]
character_words: Get away from me!

full_text: Let me help you! [Dodges another rock.] I'm sorry! [Tries to grab her.]
character_words: Let me help you!  I'm sorry!

full_text: Get off me, get off me! [Brings up some earth which sends Zuko flying back.]
character_words: Get off me, get off me!

full_text: I didn't know it was you! Uggh, come back! [Toph leaves.] Uggh! Why am I so bad at being good?
character_words: I didn't know it was you! Uggh, come back!  Uggh! Why am I so bad at being good?

full_text: The next morning, Western Air Temple. Katara is serving everyone breakfast.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Handing a bowl to The Duke.] Has anyone seen Toph?
character_words: Has anyone seen Toph?

full_text: I haven't seen her since she stormed off yesterday.
character_words: I haven't seen her since she stormed off yesterday.

full_text: Maybe she's just exploring the air temple. There are some pretty fun spots to practice earthbending.
character_words: Maybe she's just exploring the air temple. There are some pretty fun spots to practice earthbending.

full_text: I think we should go look for her.
character_words: I think we should go look for her.

full_text: [Sitting.] Let her have fun with her rocks. I'm in no rush to have her yelling at us again.
character_words: Let her have fun with her rocks. I'm in no rush to have her yelling at us again.

full_text: We can go check for her!
character_words: We can go check for her!

full_text: [Has a bandage around his forehead.] Yeah! I want to ride that tunnel down to the Hall of Statues again. It will work a lot better now that I fixed my brakes.
character_words: Yeah! I want to ride that tunnel down to the Hall of Statues again. It will work a lot better now that I fixed my brakes.

full_text: Haru, The Duke, and Teo exit.
character_words: NA

full_text: A large rumble occurs. Toph falls down the pile of rock that she created from a wall.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Approaching, with Sokka and Aang. Worried.] Toph! What happened?
character_words: Toph! What happened?

full_text: My feet got burned!
character_words: My feet got burned!

full_text: Oh no, what happened?
character_words: Oh no, what happened?

full_text: I just told you, my feet got burned!
character_words: I just told you, my feet got burned!

full_text: I meant, how.
character_words: I meant, how.

full_text: Well, I kind of went to see Zuko last night. [Everyone is shocked.]
character_words: Well, I kind of went to see Zuko last night.

full_text: You what?
character_words: You what?

full_text: Zuko?
character_words: Zuko?

full_text: Uhhh ...!
character_words: Uhhh ...!

full_text: I thought he could be helpful to us. [Katara begins to try and heal her feet.] And if I talked to him, maybe we could work something out.
character_words: I thought he could be helpful to us.  And if I talked to him, maybe we could work something out.

full_text: So he attacked you?
character_words: So he attacked you?

full_text: Well, he did, and he didn't. It was sort of an accident.
character_words: Well, he did, and he didn't. It was sort of an accident.

full_text: But he did firebend at you?
character_words: But he did firebend at you?

full_text: [Sighs.] Yes.
character_words: Yes.

full_text: See? You trusted Zuko, and you got burned. Literally!
character_words: See? You trusted Zuko, and you got burned. Literally!

full_text: It's gonna take a while for your feet to get better. [Stops healing.] I wish I could have worked on them sooner.
character_words: It's gonna take a while for your feet to get better.  I wish I could have worked on them sooner.

full_text: Yeah, me too.
character_words: Yeah, me too.

full_text: Zuko's clearly too dangerous to be left alone. We're gonna have to go after him.
character_words: Zuko's clearly too dangerous to be left alone. We're gonna have to go after him.

full_text: I hate to go looking for a fight, but you're right. After what he did to Toph, I don't think we have a choice.
character_words: I hate to go looking for a fight, but you're right. After what he did to Toph, I don't think we have a choice.

full_text: He's crafty, but we'll find a way to capture him.
character_words: He's crafty, but we'll find a way to capture him.

full_text: Maybe just invite him back here. [Aang and Sokka go to pick her up.] He's already offered himself up as a prisoner once.
character_words: Maybe just invite him back here.  He's already offered himself up as a prisoner once.

full_text: Yeah, get him to come back and say he'll be our prisoner, then we'll jump him and really make him our prisoner. He'll never suspect it! [Aang and Sokka carry Toph away.]
character_words: Yeah, get him to come back and say he'll be our prisoner, then we'll jump him and really make him our prisoner. He'll never suspect it!

full_text: [Following. Sarcastically.] You are a master of surprise, Sokka ...
character_words: You are a master of surprise, Sokka ...

full_text: Cut to Toph's feet as they are dipped into a fountain.
character_words: NA

full_text: Ahhh, that's the stuff. Now I know how the rest of you guys feel. Not being able to see with your feet stinks. [Katara sits next to her putting a hand on her shoulder.]
character_words: Ahhh, that's the stuff. Now I know how the rest of you guys feel. Not being able to see with your feet stinks.

full_text: Meanwhile, Combustion Man eyes the gang from a higher elevation. He sets his sights on Aang. As he prepares to fire, however, Zuko jumps in and knocks him off-balance, causing his shot to be wild. Team Avatar make to run away before hearing Zuko.
character_words: NA

full_text: Stop! [Team Avatar turns their head up to the sound.] I don't want you hunting the Avatar anymore! [Cut to a quick close up of Aang looking up with shock as he is helping Sokka carry Toph. Cut back to Zuko as he stands in front of Combustion Man, arms spread out to block him.] The mission is off. I'm ordering you to stop.
character_words: Stop!  I don't want you hunting the Avatar anymore!  The mission is off. I'm ordering you to stop.

full_text: Combustion Man shoves him away and attacks again.
character_words: NA

full_text: If you keep attacking, I won't pay you! [Attempts to firebend at him, but Combustion Man grabs him.] All right, I'll pay you double to stop!
character_words: If you keep attacking, I won't pay you!  All right, I'll pay you double to stop!

full_text: Zuko kicks Combustion Man as he fires, causing him to miss again. He subsequently takes aim at Zuko. Zuko creates a firewall to stop the attack but is pushed off the ledge. Cut to a shot of Team Avatar looking over the edge of the fountain shocked. Cut to a shot from behind Combustion Man as he faces a small crater in the floor and the smoke that is dissipating. Cut to a shot of the edge of the ledge and strafe right, revealing climbing a vine hanging underneath it and Zuko survived by grabbing the plant's root. Cut to Combustion Man as he turns back. Cut to a close up of Aang as he stands up from behind the fountain pool and runs to the side. Cut to a shot of Aang doing a spinning back kick, airbending and kicking up the dust around him, and leaping straight up just as a blast from Combustion Man explodes beneath him. The camera turns up to Aang spinning in mid air, airbending a tornado and kicking it at Combustion Man. Combustion Man leaps over the tornado and fires another blast as he descends. Aang lands and quickly back flips away from the blast, landing next to Katara and Sokka. Cut to a shot of Combustion Man falling before switching to a shot of his metal, clawed hand as it catches on a small ledge and breaks it, slowing his fall. He lands on a new ledge and rolls, firing a blast just as he stops. Cut to a shot of Katara and Aang shielding themselves as the blast hits the fountain water. The camera follows Katara as she runs forward and bends the water from the pool. Cut to a far shot from the side as Katara bends a huge wave up between them and Combustion Man. Cut to a shot in front of the camera as she descends from jumping, bringing her arms down and crossing them and giving a battle cry. The wave matches her arm movements and icicles in both directions. Cut to a shot of Combustion Man as the icicles speed toward him. He brings his metal arm over his face and lifts his metal leg to shield him from the attack. The icicles break against him. Combustion Man flings his arms down to shake off the ice shards and steps forward, an angry frown on his face. Cut to his perspective as he scans the area. The group is nowhere to be seen. Aang fires a tornado, which the assassin jumps over and fires again. Aang narrowly avoids the blast by jumping back. Combustion man falls and lands on a ledge as he fires and misses again. Katara bends water from the fountain and turns it into ice spikes, but Combustion Man appears unaffected. The assassin looks up and realizes they have disappeared but continues firing. Cut to shot of the team hiding behind a wall, out of sight.
character_words: NA

full_text: He's going to blast this whole place right off the cliff side!
character_words: He's going to blast this whole place right off the cliff side!

full_text: Katara looks out from behind the wall only to see another incoming blast.
character_words: NA

full_text: I can't step out to waterbend at him without being blown up and I can't get a good enough angle on him from down here.
character_words: I can't step out to waterbend at him without being blown up and I can't get a good enough angle on him from down here.

full_text: [Pausing for a moment to think before having an idea.] I know how to get an angle on him! [Takes out his boomerang. After another blast, he sneaks his head out, but has to hide from another shot. He projects Combustion Man's angle with his boomerang.] All right buddy, don't fail me now! [Throws his boomerang.]
character_words: I know how to get an angle on him!  All right buddy, don't fail me now!

full_text: The boomerang hits the assassin in the head where his third eye tattoo is, causing him to hit the ground, before it returns back.
character_words: NA

full_text: Yeah, boomerang! [Jumps up and grabs it, but Combustion Man gets up, albeit clearly shaken.] Awww, boomerang ...
character_words: Yeah, boomerang!  Awww, boomerang ...

full_text: As the team runs back to their hiding spot, Combustion Man gears up again, but is dizzy and cannot aim properly. His next shot fails to escape, causing an explosion around him resulting in the building he stands on getting destroyed. Cut to his metal arm as it flies away from the explosion, followed by the falling building. The gang looks on, shocked. Haru, Teo, and The Duke all appear from behind a pillar also shocked.
character_words: NA

full_text: Zuko climbs a plant root, having survived the ordeal. Later, Zuko again approaches the gang.
character_words: NA

full_text: I can't believe I'm saying this, but ... thanks, Zuko.
character_words: I can't believe I'm saying this, but ... thanks, Zuko.

full_text: Hey, what about me? I did the boomerang thing.
character_words: Hey, what about me? I did the boomerang thing.

full_text: Listen, I know I didn't explain myself very well yesterday, I've been through a lot in the last few years, and it's been hard. But I'm realizing that I had to go through all those things to learn the truth. I thought I had lost my honor, and that somehow my father could return it to me. But I know now that no one can give you your honor. It's something you earn for yourself, by choosing to do what's right. All I want to do now is play my part in ending this war, and I know my destiny is to help you restore balance to the world. [To Toph.] I'm sorry for what I did to you. [Bows to her.] It was an accident. Fire can be dangerous and wild, so as a firebender, I need to be more careful and control my bending, so I don't hurt people unintentionally.
character_words: Listen, I know I didn't explain myself very well yesterday, I've been through a lot in the last few years, and it's been hard. But I'm realizing that I had to go through all those things to learn the truth. I thought I had lost my honor, and that somehow my father could return it to me. But I know now that no one can give you your honor. It's something you earn for yourself, by choosing to do what's right. All I want to do now is play my part in ending this war, and I know my destiny is to help you restore balance to the world.  I'm sorry for what I did to you.  It was an accident. Fire can be dangerous and wild, so as a firebender, I need to be more careful and control my bending, so I don't hurt people unintentionally.

full_text: [Looks at Zuko shocked, hearing these words, and thinks for a moment.] I think you are supposed to be my firebending teacher. When I first tried to learn firebending, I burned Katara, and after that, I never wanted to firebend again. But now I know you understand how easy it is to hurt the people you love. I'd like you to teach me. [Bows before Zuko.]
character_words: I think you are supposed to be my firebending teacher. When I first tried to learn firebending, I burned Katara, and after that, I never wanted to firebend again. But now I know you understand how easy it is to hurt the people you love. I'd like you to teach me.

full_text: [Bows.] Thank you. I'm so happy you've accepted me into your group.
character_words: Thank you. I'm so happy you've accepted me into your group.

full_text: Not so fast. I still have to ask my friends if it's okay with them. [To Toph.] Toph, you're the one that Zuko burned. What do you think?
character_words: Not so fast. I still have to ask my friends if it's okay with them.  Toph, you're the one that Zuko burned. What do you think?

full_text: Go ahead and let him join. [Pounds her fist into her palm jokingly.] It'll give me plenty of time to get back at him for burning my feet.
character_words: Go ahead and let him join.  It'll give me plenty of time to get back at him for burning my feet.

full_text: [Turning to Sokka.] Sokka?
character_words: Sokka?

full_text: [Shrugging.] Hey, all I want is to defeat the Fire Lord. If you think this is the way to do it, then, I'm all for it.
character_words: Hey, all I want is to defeat the Fire Lord. If you think this is the way to do it, then, I'm all for it.

full_text: [Approaching Katara.] Katara?
character_words: Katara?

full_text: [Glares at Zuko for a moment and Zuko starts to sweat; reluctantly.] I'll go along with whatever you think is right. [Aang smiles.]
character_words: I'll go along with whatever you think is right.

full_text: [Excitedly approaching the group.] I won't let you down! I promise!
character_words: I won't let you down! I promise!

full_text: Aang, Katara, and Sokka exit, the latter carrying Toph. Later, Sokka shows Zuko to his room.
character_words: NA

full_text: So, here you go, home sweet home, I guess, you know, for now. Unpack? Lunch, soon? Uhhh ... welcome aboard? [Zuko glances back and smiles at him.] Yeah. [Walks out of the room and meets Aang in the hallway; to Aang.] Okay, this is really, really weird.
character_words: So, here you go, home sweet home, I guess, you know, for now. Unpack? Lunch, soon? Uhhh ... welcome aboard?  Yeah.  Okay, this is really, really weird.

full_text: The two exit. Cut to Zuko as he pulls out a painting of Iroh. He subsequently has another flashback to three years ago.
character_words: NA

full_text: If I have to, I will spend every day of the rest of my life hunting the Avatar. I know it's my destiny to capture him.
character_words: If I have to, I will spend every day of the rest of my life hunting the Avatar. I know it's my destiny to capture him.

full_text: [Placing a hand on his shoulder.] You know Prince Zuko, destiny is a funny thing. You never know how things are going to work out. But if you keep an open mind, and an open heart, I promise you will find your own destiny someday.
character_words: You know Prince Zuko, destiny is a funny thing. You never know how things are going to work out. But if you keep an open mind, and an open heart, I promise you will find your own destiny someday.

full_text: Fade to Zuko in the present, smiling at the memory. Zuko suddenly notices a clearly disgruntled Katara at the door.
character_words: NA

full_text: You might have everyone else here buying your ... transformation, but you and I both know you've struggled with doing the right thing in the past. [Approaches him; threateningly.] So let me tell you something, right now. You make one step backward, [Close-up of Zuko.] one slip-up, give me one reason to think you might hurt Aang, and you won't have to worry about your destiny anymore. [Close-up of Katara's angry face.] Because I'll make sure your destiny ends ... right then and there. Permanently.
character_words: You might have everyone else here buying your ... transformation, but you and I both know you've struggled with doing the right thing in the past.  So let me tell you something, right now. You make one step backward,  one slip-up, give me one reason to think you might hurt Aang, and you won't have to worry about your destiny anymore.  Because I'll make sure your destiny ends ... right then and there. Permanently.

full_text: She walks away and slams the door shut. Zuko slumps his shoulders.
character_words: NA

full_text: Fade to credits.
character_words: NA

full_text: The episode opens with a shot of the sky from the Western Air Temple, and the camera pans below to Zuko and Aang standing on the balcony of an upside down pagoda in the temple.
character_words: NA

full_text: I know you're nervous, but remember, firebending in it of itself is not something to fear.
character_words: I know you're nervous, but remember, firebending in it of itself is not something to fear.

full_text: [Cut to Aang, as he sighs heavily.] Okay. Not something to fear.
character_words: Okay. Not something to fear.

full_text: [Cut to Zuko from behind Aang.] But if you don't respect it, [He raises his voice, as the camera zooms to a close-up of his face.] it'll chew you up and spit you out like an angry komodo rhino!
character_words: But if you don't respect it,  it'll chew you up and spit you out like an angry komodo rhino!

full_text: Cut to Aang's face, as he yelps in fear, before cutting back to Zuko.
character_words: NA

full_text: Now show me what you've got. Any amount of fire you can make.
character_words: Now show me what you've got. Any amount of fire you can make.

full_text: Cut to Aang, as he inhales nervously and tries to firebend. Cut to a close-up of his palm, as a small cloud of smoke appears, and is dissipated. Camera pans left to Aang.
character_words: NA

full_text: Maybe I need a little more instruction. Perhaps a demonstration?
character_words: Maybe I need a little more instruction. Perhaps a demonstration?

full_text: [Cut to an aerial shot of the both.] Good idea. You might wanna take a couple steps back.
character_words: Good idea. You might wanna take a couple steps back.

full_text: Aang walks back, and shot cuts to a close-up of Zuko's face, as he inhales deeply. Screen zooms back to show Zuko grunting, and cuts to his fist, which lets out a very small flame. Aang applauds at this display.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Takes a step back.] What was that? That was the worst firebending I've ever seen!
character_words: What was that? That was the worst firebending I've ever seen!

full_text: [Cut to Aang.] I thought it was ... nice. [Smiles slightly and shrugs.]
character_words: I thought it was ... nice.

full_text: Zuko grunts again and tries firebending again, with all three attempts resulting in very small flames similar to the first. He grunts and looks at his palms.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Frustrated.] Why is this happening?
character_words: Why is this happening?

full_text: [Rubbing his head, confused.] Maybe it's the altitude.
character_words: Maybe it's the altitude.

full_text: [Turning back.] Yeah, could be.
character_words: Yeah, could be.

full_text: Scene changes to some pagodas and pans below to Aang sitting on a broken pillar and Zuko standing. Zuko attempts firebending, which results in a similar small flame again. He grunts and delivers another similar blast, as Aang yawns and lies down on the pillar.
character_words: NA

full_text: Just breathe, and ... [He delivers another blast with no improvement.]
character_words: Just breathe, and ...

full_text: [Gets up.] That one kind of felt hot.
character_words: That one kind of felt hot.

full_text: [Very angry.] Don't patronize me! You know what it's supposed to look like!
character_words: Don't patronize me! You know what it's supposed to look like!

full_text: Sorry, Sifu Hotman.
character_words: Sorry, Sifu Hotman.

full_text: [Raises his arms to his head, and throws them down back, and shouts in frustration, as Aang cringes.] And stop calling me that!
character_words: And stop calling me that!

full_text: Shot cuts to Sokka walking toward the teacher and his pupil, eating an apple. Sokka sits down near the two, as they turn their heads toward him.
character_words: NA

full_text: Hey, jerks! Mind if I watch you two jerks do your jerkbending?
character_words: Hey, jerks! Mind if I watch you two jerks do your jerkbending?

full_text: [Frustrated.] Get out of here! [He lashes his arm and points to a side.]
character_words: Get out of here!

full_text: Okay, take it easy. [He drops his half-eaten apple.] I was just kiddin' around. [He gets up and turns around, laughing as he adjusts his shirt.] Jerkbending, still got it. [Zuko drops his head, dejected, and moans.]
character_words: Okay, take it easy.  I was just kiddin' around.  Jerkbending, still got it.

full_text: Scene changes to an aerial shot of Appa resting near a fountain at night, and zooms to show him eating a small bale of hay. Screen pans to the right to show Zuko leaning on a column with his arms crossed, looking below and thinking deeply. He turns his head to the campfire where everyone is settled for dinner, and walks toward them.
character_words: NA

full_text: Listen everybody, I've got some pretty bad news. I've lost my stuff. [He looks below dejectedly.]
character_words: Listen everybody, I've got some pretty bad news. I've lost my stuff.

full_text: [Raises both hands to her head.] Don't look at me, [She folds her arms.] I didn't touch your stuff.
character_words: Don't look at me,  I didn't touch your stuff.

full_text: I'm talking about my firebending. It's gone. [He looks below again.]
character_words: I'm talking about my firebending. It's gone.

full_text: Cut to Sokka, Haru, The Duke, and Teo looking at him, as the former Freedom Fighter sits up. Camera pans left, as Katara laughs, and everyone's attention is focused on her. Zuko looks at the waterbender with an annoyed expression.
character_words: NA

full_text: I'm sorry. I'm just laughing at the irony. You know, how it would've been nice for us if you lost your firebending a long time ago.
character_words: I'm sorry. I'm just laughing at the irony. You know, how it would've been nice for us if you lost your firebending a long time ago.

full_text: [Camera zooms back to show everyone sitting around the campfire and Zuko standing.] Well, it's not lost. It's just ... weaker for some reason.
character_words: Well, it's not lost. It's just ... weaker for some reason.

full_text: [Holding up her bowl and glaring at Zuko.] Maybe you're not as good as you think you are.
character_words: Maybe you're not as good as you think you are.

full_text: [Screen pans left to Toph.] Ouch. [She smiles sarcastically.]
character_words: Ouch.

full_text: [With an idea.] I bet it's because I changed sides.
character_words: I bet it's because I changed sides.

full_text: [Still holding her bowl.] That's ridiculous. [She drinks from the bowl.]
character_words: That's ridiculous.

full_text: I don't know. Maybe it isn't. Maybe your firebending comes from rage and you just don't have enough anger to fuel it the way you used to.
character_words: I don't know. Maybe it isn't. Maybe your firebending comes from rage and you just don't have enough anger to fuel it the way you used to.

full_text: [Leans toward Zuko and points a finger above.] Sooo, all we need to do is make Zuko angry. Easy enough.
character_words: Sooo, all we need to do is make Zuko angry. Easy enough.

full_text: Sokka pokes Zuko with his sword's hilt in the head and waist several times, laughing.
character_words: NA

full_text: Okay, cut it out! [Sokka stops poking, as his sword slips from his hands and is thrown above, before falling on his head. Zuko rubs his nose.] Look, even if you're right, I don't want to rely on hate and anger anymore. There has to be another way.
character_words: Okay, cut it out!  Look, even if you're right, I don't want to rely on hate and anger anymore. There has to be another way.

full_text: [Cut to Toph, as Sokka sits near her, and rubs his head.] You're gonna need to learn to draw your firebending from a different source. I recommend the original source. [Eats the food from her bowl.]
character_words: You're gonna need to learn to draw your firebending from a different source. I recommend the original source.

full_text: [Excited.] How's he supposed to do that‌? By jumping into a volcano‌?
character_words: How's he supposed to do that‌? By jumping into a volcano‌?

full_text: No. Zuko needs to go back to whatever the original source of firebending is.
character_words: No. Zuko needs to go back to whatever the original source of firebending is.

full_text: [Seriously.​] So, is it jumping into a volcano?
character_words: So, is it jumping into a volcano?

full_text: I don't know. [Places her bowl down as the shot cuts to a close-up of her face.] For earthbending, the original benders were badgermoles.
character_words: I don't know.  For earthbending, the original benders were badgermoles.

full_text: Scene changes to a cave in a flashback as a younger Toph wearing a gown is kneeling down, and crying, as screen zooms out.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Voice-over.] One day, when I was little, I ran away and hid in a cave.
character_words: One day, when I was little, I ran away and hid in a cave.

full_text: Cut to the younger Toph's face, as she is startled by a rumbling noise, and part of the cave's wall breaks. Shot cuts to behind Toph to show one of a badgermole's legs.
character_words: NA

full_text: That's where I met them.
character_words: That's where I met them.

full_text: Toph cringes in fear, and the badgermole comes into the screen near Toph and sniffs her. Toph sniffs back and the badgermole licks her cheek, causing her to giggle in delight. She touches the badgermole's snout with both hands before licking it, and giggles again.
character_words: NA

full_text: They were blind, just like me. [The badgermole walks away as Toph attempts to crawls after it.] So we understood each other. I was able to learn earthbending, [Cut to an overhead shot of the badgermole, which moves its paws in a sweeping motion.] not just as a martial art, but as an extension of my senses. [Screen fades to an overhead shot of Toph mimicking the creature's actions.] For them, the original earthbenders, [The badgermole comes across a pile of rocks and earthbends them to the side.] it wasn't just about fighting. It was their way of interacting with the world. [She stops crawling and stands up. She earthbends a stone and smiles at her success.]
character_words: They were blind, just like me.  So we understood each other. I was able to learn earthbending,  not just as a martial art, but as an extension of my senses.  For them, the original earthbenders,  it wasn't just about fighting. It was their way of interacting with the world.

full_text: Screen fades from the younger Toph's face back to the present Toph's smiling face.
character_words: NA

full_text: That's amazing, Toph!
character_words: That's amazing, Toph!

full_text: [Cut to an aerial shot of the group.] I learned from the monks, but the original airbenders were the sky bison. [Camera pans above to show a mural of three sky bison. Aang leans back to look at Appa.] Maybe you can give me a lesson sometime, buddy.
character_words: I learned from the monks, but the original airbenders were the sky bison.  Maybe you can give me a lesson sometime, buddy.

full_text: Appa growls from the shed.
character_words: NA

full_text: Well, this doesn't help me. The original firebenders were the dragons, and they're extinct.
character_words: Well, this doesn't help me. The original firebenders were the dragons, and they're extinct.

full_text: [Shot cuts to behind Zuko as he looks at the group.] What do you mean‌? Roku had a dragon, and there were plenty of dragons when I was a kid.
character_words: What do you mean‌? Roku had a dragon, and there were plenty of dragons when I was a kid.

full_text: [Cut to Zuko's face, as he yells.] Well, they aren't around anymore, okay?
character_words: Well, they aren't around anymore, okay?

full_text: Okay, okay. [Moves his arms in an appeasing manner.] I'm sorry.
character_words: Okay, okay.  I'm sorry.

full_text: But maybe there's another way. [He walks toward a fountain.] The first people to learn from the dragons were the ancient Sun Warriors.
character_words: But maybe there's another way.  The first people to learn from the dragons were the ancient Sun Warriors.

full_text: [Walks toward Zuko.] Sun Warriors? Well, I know they weren't around when I was a kid.
character_words: Sun Warriors? Well, I know they weren't around when I was a kid.

full_text: [Turning his head toward Aang.] No, they died off thousands of years ago. But their civilization wasn't too far from where we are now. [Cut to a shot of the two from the side, as Zuko turns his head toward the Avatar.] Maybe we can learn something by poking around their ruins.
character_words: No, they died off thousands of years ago. But their civilization wasn't too far from where we are now.  Maybe we can learn something by poking around their ruins.

full_text: It's like the monks used to tell me. Sometimes, the shadows of the past can be felt by the present.
character_words: It's like the monks used to tell me. Sometimes, the shadows of the past can be felt by the present.

full_text: So, what? [Aang and Zuko look back at him and the shot cuts to Sokka seated.] Maybe you'll pick up some super old Sun Warrior energy just by standing [Moves his hand in a strange motion.] where they stood a thousand years ago?
character_words: So, what?  Maybe you'll pick up some super old Sun Warrior energy just by standing  where they stood a thousand years ago?

full_text: [Cut to an aerial shot.] More or less. Either I find a new way to firebend, [Cut to a shot of the two from the side. Zuko turns his head toward Aang.] or the Avatar has to find a new teacher. [Aang looks concerned and worried at Zuko's statement.]
character_words: More or less. Either I find a new way to firebend,  or the Avatar has to find a new teacher.

full_text: Scene changes to Aang and Zuko flying on Appa over an ocean. Cut to a bored Zuko.
character_words: NA

full_text: We've been riding for hours. I don't know why, but I thought this thing would be a lot faster.
character_words: We've been riding for hours. I don't know why, but I thought this thing would be a lot faster.

full_text: Cut to Appa from below, as he growls.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Turning his head toward Zuko.] Appa's right, Zuko. In our group, typically we start our missions with a more up-beat attitude.
character_words: Appa's right, Zuko. In our group, typically we start our missions with a more up-beat attitude.

full_text: [Whispering.] I can't believe this. [He lies down.]
character_words: I can't believe this.

full_text: [Cut to Appa flying from behind.] Don't worry, you'll get the hang of it.
character_words: Don't worry, you'll get the hang of it.

full_text: Scene changes to an aerial shot of the ocean, as the screen pans above to an aerial shot of an island. Scene changes to an aerial shot of Appa descending to land on some ruins. The ruins make Aang and Zuko full of awe.
character_words: NA

full_text: Whoa!
character_words: Whoa!

full_text: Cut to Appa landing from the side. Shot cuts to show some mountains and pans below to an aerial shot of Aang and Zuko walking through the ruins.
character_words: NA

full_text: Even though these buildings are ancient, there's something eerily familiar about them. [Cut to Aang and Zuko walking.] I can tell the Fire Sages' temples are somehow descended from these.
character_words: Even though these buildings are ancient, there's something eerily familiar about them.  I can tell the Fire Sages' temples are somehow descended from these.

full_text: [Cut to some structures as screen pans right to show more of them.] Okay. We've learned something about architecture. [Cut back to the two walking.] Hopefully, we'll learn something about firebending too. The past can be a great teacher.
character_words: Okay. We've learned something about architecture.  Hopefully, we'll learn something about firebending too. The past can be a great teacher.

full_text: Cut to a tripwire, which is pulled when Aang walks by. He trips and yelps, as an overhead shot shows a small portion of the path in front of him going down and some spikes coming up from holes. Aang nearly falls on the spikes but blows a blast of air from his mouth which thrusts him up, and somersaults on to the other side, as he managed to regain balance.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Scared.] Zuko, I think the past is trying to kill me.
character_words: Zuko, I think the past is trying to kill me.

full_text: [Kneeling down to inspect the spikes.] I can't believe it. [He picks the tripwire up and examines it.] This booby trap must be centuries old and it still works.
character_words: I can't believe it.  This booby trap must be centuries old and it still works.

full_text: There's probably a lot more. Maybe this means we shouldn't be here.
character_words: There's probably a lot more. Maybe this means we shouldn't be here.

full_text: Zuko takes two steps back and runs toward the wall adjoining the path. He runs on the wall before jumping on the other side of the spikes.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Dusting some dirt on his shirt.] Where's that up-beat attitude you were talkin' about? [He smiles, as Aang turns back. Cut to Zuko's point of view of the path as screen pans above to a building.] Besides, people don't make traps unless they've got something worth protecting.
character_words: Where's that up-beat attitude you were talkin' about?  Besides, people don't make traps unless they've got something worth protecting.

full_text: Cut to Zuko and Aang coming onto the building from stairs.
character_words: NA

full_text: Look, this seems promising. [Cut to Zuko and Aang from the behind, as they see a carving of a person being surrounded by two dragons who are breathing fire at him.] Though I'm not sure what this tells us about the original source of firebending.
character_words: Look, this seems promising.  Though I'm not sure what this tells us about the original source of firebending.

full_text: [Cut to Zuko and Aang looking at the carving from the side.] They look pretty angry to me.
character_words: They look pretty angry to me.

full_text: [Cut to a part of the carving from below as screen pans right to show more of it.] I thought the dragons were friends with the Sun Warriors.
character_words: I thought the dragons were friends with the Sun Warriors.

full_text: Well, they had a funny way of showing it.
character_words: Well, they had a funny way of showing it.

full_text: Cut back to the both from the side, as Zuko looks down for a moment and starts walking, with Aang looking.
character_words: NA

full_text: Zuko, [Zuko stops walking.] something happened to the dragons in the last hundred years. [Zuko closes his eyes.] Something you're not telling me.
character_words: Zuko,  something happened to the dragons in the last hundred years.  Something you're not telling me.

full_text: [He opens his eyes.] My great-grandfather Sozin happened.
character_words: My great-grandfather Sozin happened.

full_text: Zuko walks away with Aang following him. Scene changes to the two walking on a bridge.
character_words: NA

full_text: He started the tradition of hunting dragons for glory. There were the ultimate firebenders. [Cut to them walking from below the bridge, with the screen panning right as they walk.] And if you could conquer one, your firebending talents would become legendary and you'd earn the honorary title, Dragon. [They approach a path which has one dragon's statue on both sides, and stop walking.] The last great dragon was conquered long before I was born, [Cut to a close-up of one of the dragon's statue's eyes as Zuko places one of his palms on it.] by my uncle.
character_words: He started the tradition of hunting dragons for glory. There were the ultimate firebenders.  And if you could conquer one, your firebending talents would become legendary and you'd earn the honorary title, Dragon.  The last great dragon was conquered long before I was born,  by my uncle.

full_text: [Cut to the both from a side.] But I thought your uncle was ... I don't know, good?
character_words: But I thought your uncle was ... I don't know, good?

full_text: He had a complicated past. [Cut to Zuko's face.] Family tradition, I guess. Let's just move on.
character_words: He had a complicated past.  Family tradition, I guess. Let's just move on.

full_text: Zuko starts walking as shot cuts to an overhead shot of him walking away, with Aang running to catch up to him. Scene changes to a vertical column with a sunstone in the center, as Zuko and Aang walk past it. Screen pans above to show a wall with two gates, with the both walking toward them. As the both come closer, Zuko stops walking, and Aang runs to the gates, drops his staff, and unsuccessfully tries opening the gates.
character_words: NA

full_text: It's locked up!
character_words: It's locked up!

full_text: Zuko rubs his head, and looks behind, before quickly going aside to show the sunstone from the column in front of the gates beaming light.
character_words: NA

full_text: Wait. [Cut to an overhead shot of Zuko, as he realizes something and takes a step behind, and looks at the position he stood at a moment before. Screen zooms in to show the light from the sunstone beaming on a circular carving on the ground.] It's a celestial calendar. [Cut to an aerial shot of Zuko and Aang standing in front of the column as screen pans to right to show the gates.] Just like the Fire Sages have in their temples. [Cut to a similar sunstone above the gates.] I bet that sunstone opens the door, but only when sunlight hits at just the right angle. [Screen pans below to show Aang in front of the gates.] On the solstice.
character_words: Wait.  It's a celestial calendar.  Just like the Fire Sages have in their temples.  I bet that sunstone opens the door, but only when sunlight hits at just the right angle.  On the solstice.

full_text: [Exasperated.] Monkeyfeathers! The solstice again? We can't wait here that long.
character_words: Monkeyfeathers! The solstice again? We can't wait here that long.

full_text: [Cut to Zuko.] No, we can't. [He unsheathes one of his swords.] But we might be able to speed time up. [Cut to the circle carved on the ground on which light from the sunstone is being beamed. He places his sword on it with an angle, causing it to reflect the light. Cut to Zuko reflecting the light from the column.] Let's see if we can outsmart the sunstone.
character_words: No, we can't.  But we might be able to speed time up.  Let's see if we can outsmart the sunstone.

full_text: Cut to the side of the gate as the light being reflected by Zuko's sword moves to the other sunstone on top of the gates. Screen pans below to show Aang looking at it.
character_words: NA

full_text: Nothing's happening.
character_words: Nothing's happening.

full_text: [Cut to Zuko, who is kneeling down and reflecting the light.] Come on ...
character_words: Come on ...

full_text: Cut to a close-up of the sunstone as the ground starts shaking. Cut to inside the room as the gates are opened and the shaking stops.
character_words: NA

full_text: [He picks his staff, and Zuko, walking up to the gates, unsheathes his sword.] You know, Zuko, I don't care what everyone else says about you. [Aang nudges Zuko with his elbow.] You're pretty smart.
character_words: You know, Zuko, I don't care what everyone else says about you.  You're pretty smart.

full_text: Zuko smiles at Aang's compliment, before realizing what Aang actually said. Aang walks inside the dark room and looks around it. He narrows his eyes, as the shot cuts to show a statue of a man with an angry expression. Cut back to Aang, who gasps.
character_words: NA

full_text: Relax. They're just statues.
character_words: Relax. They're just statues.

full_text: Cut to a shot of two statues from behind Aang and Zuko. Cut to an aerial shot of the room to show many statues lined up in a circle as they both walk into it. Aang walks up to a statue and reads something on it.
character_words: NA

full_text: It says this is something called the Dancing Dragon.
character_words: It says this is something called the Dancing Dragon.

full_text: Aang places his staff to lean on the statue. Cut to a shot of the statue from behind Aang to show him taking the same posture the statue is in. Cut to his leg, which presses a button on the ground. Aang comes out of the posture and examines the button. He looks around at all the statues, runs toward Zuko, catches him by the hand, and pulls him.
character_words: NA

full_text: Zuko, get over here! I want you to dance with me!
character_words: Zuko, get over here! I want you to dance with me!

full_text: [He pulls his hand back.] What?
character_words: What?

full_text: Just do it.
character_words: Just do it.

full_text: Aang pulls him to a side, as shot cuts to the both standing in front of two statues that are to the sides of the path that leads into the circle, as Zuko groans.
character_words: NA

full_text: Let's follow the steps of the statues. [Aang and Zuko take the posture of the statue in front of them and move to their right and left, respectively, taking the postures of the statues in front of them, which pressed similar buttons lying on the ground in front of all the statues. Cut to an aerial shot of the room.] Don't you see? These aren't dance moves. These statues are giving us a lesson. [Cut to Zuko moving through each statue.] I think this is some kind of Sun Warrior firebending form.
character_words: Let's follow the steps of the statues.  Don't you see? These aren't dance moves. These statues are giving us a lesson.  I think this is some kind of Sun Warrior firebending form.

full_text: This better teach us some really good firebending.
character_words: This better teach us some really good firebending.

full_text: Cut to Aang, as he does the same moves as Zuko. Cut to two statues with their waists bent toward each other, and their arms in the direction of each other. Zuko and Aang perform the same move. Cut to a part of the ground detracting and a vertical column emerging from it, as the both look behind at it. Cut to a close-up of the yellow, egg-shaped sunstone on the column. Cut to an aerial shot of Zuko and Aang standing in front of the column as Aang raises his arms in triumph.
character_words: NA

full_text: Hurray! [Putting his hands down, and rubbing his head.] Wait, what exactly is that?
character_words: Hurray!  Wait, what exactly is that?

full_text: [He runs toward the sunstone.] It's some kind of mystical gemstone.
character_words: It's some kind of mystical gemstone.

full_text: [Cut to the gemstone as Zuko runs toward it. Aang raises his arms.] Well, don't touch it! [Zuko stops and Aang catches up to him.]
character_words: Well, don't touch it!

full_text: Why not?
character_words: Why not?

full_text: Remember what happened out there with those spikes? [Turns to look at the side and raises his arms again.] I'm just very suspicious of giant glowing gems sitting on pedestals.
character_words: Remember what happened out there with those spikes?  I'm just very suspicious of giant glowing gems sitting on pedestals.

full_text: Zuko ignores the Avatar and picks the sunstone, as Aang's eyes twitch.
character_words: NA

full_text: It feels almost alive.
character_words: It feels almost alive.

full_text: He tries to put the sunstone back but yells in surprise as a geyser of viscous slime erupts out from the pedestal and pushes Zuko toward the grates in the ceiling, sticking him there.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Cut to a worried Aang's face, as he turns to look at the gates of the room, which close.] Oh no, it's another trap!
character_words: Oh no, it's another trap!

full_text: Cut to an overhead shot of the column as more viscous slime comes from it, causing Aang to walk back. Cut to Zuko who is stuck to the grates and unsuccessfully struggles to break free.
character_words: NA

full_text: Ugh, I can't pull free. It's like some kind of glue.
character_words: Ugh, I can't pull free. It's like some kind of glue.

full_text: Cut to Aang, as he jumps across the slime and grabs his staff on the other side of the room. He climbs on a statue's head, jumps onto another of the statues' head and airbends a gust of wind toward Zuko, due to which Zuko is pushed from his back to his front. Cut to an aerial shot to show that the slime is rising and the screen zooms to show Aang is still on the statue's head. His staff gets stuck in the slime and he is not successful in pulling it out. He jumps up toward the grates, as the slime engulfs the room.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Trying to pull his hands from the grates.] I can't move! Zuko, do something!
character_words: I can't move! Zuko, do something!

full_text: Me? I can't move either!
character_words: Me? I can't move either!

full_text: Cut to a shot of the entire room being filled by the slime. Cut to the other side of the grates as they groan due to the slime pushing them against the grates. The slime stops.
character_words: NA

full_text: It stopped.
character_words: It stopped.

full_text: At least we have air. Maybe if we stay calm, we can figure a way out of this.
character_words: At least we have air. Maybe if we stay calm, we can figure a way out of this.

full_text: Cut to an aerial shot of the two being stuck to the grates, as screen zooms out slowly. Screen fades to the building at night, and cuts to the two still stuck to the grates.
character_words: NA

full_text: You had to pick up the glowing egg, didn't you?
character_words: You had to pick up the glowing egg, didn't you?

full_text: [Cut to their heads sticking out from the grates.] At least I made something happen. If it were up to you, we'd never have made it past the courtyard.
character_words: At least I made something happen. If it were up to you, we'd never have made it past the courtyard.

full_text: [He opens his mouth very widely and yells.] Help!
character_words: Help!

full_text: Who are you yelling to? Nobody's lived here for centuries.
character_words: Who are you yelling to? Nobody's lived here for centuries.

full_text: Well, what do you think we should do?
character_words: Well, what do you think we should do?

full_text: Think about our place in the universe‌?
character_words: Think about our place in the universe‌?

full_text: Cut to the grates from the side, as Aang sighs, and a foot wearing a sandal steps near it.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Cut to Zuko and Aang's point of view, as the Sun Warrior chief comes into sight. Cut to his face.] Who is down there?
character_words: Who is down there?

full_text: Cut to both boys bearing shocked expressions. Cut to a shot of the building, before cutting to Zuko and Aang as the slime is removed by aardvark sloths on either side of them. Shot cuts to an aerial shot to show the two surrounded by men and women who are in circles.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Walking toward the two.] For trying to take our sunstone, you must be severely punished!
character_words: For trying to take our sunstone, you must be severely punished!

full_text: [Cut to Aang and Zuko from the side.] We didn't come here to take your sunstone. We came here to find the ancient origin of all firebending.
character_words: We didn't come here to take your sunstone. We came here to find the ancient origin of all firebending.

full_text: Cut to an aerial shot of the people, as Ham Ghao steps forward.
character_words: NA

full_text: Yeah, right. They are obviously thieves, [Cut to the chief and Ham Ghao from the side to show that he is holding the sunstone.] here to steal Sun Warrior treasures.
character_words: Yeah, right. They are obviously thieves,  here to steal Sun Warrior treasures.

full_text: Please, I don't normally play this card, but ... [Places his palm on his chest.] I'm the Avatar. [Cut to Ham Ghao looking toward the chief from the side, puzzled. Cut to Aang, who stands up and gives a weak smile.] Just hear us out.
character_words: Please, I don't normally play this card, but ...  I'm the Avatar.  Just hear us out.

full_text: [Standing up.] My name is Zuko, Crown Prince of the Fire Nation. [Looks down at the ground.] O-or at least I used to be. [Cut to Zuko's point of view to the Sun Warriors as screen pans right to show more of them.] I know my people have distorted the ways of firebending, to be fueled by anger and rage. But now I want to learn the true way, [Cut back to Aang and Zuko.] the original way. When we came here, I never imagined [Cut to an aerial shot that shows the Sun Warriors surrounding the two.] the Sun Warrior's civilization was secretly alive. I am truly humbled to be in your presence. [Cut back to the two, as they bow their heads.] Please, teach us.
character_words: My name is Zuko, Crown Prince of the Fire Nation.  O-or at least I used to be.  I know my people have distorted the ways of firebending, to be fueled by anger and rage. But now I want to learn the true way,  the original way. When we came here, I never imagined  the Sun Warrior's civilization was secretly alive. I am truly humbled to be in your presence.  Please, teach us.

full_text: [Cut to the chief.] If you wish to learn the ways of the Sun, you must learn them from the masters, Ran and Shaw.
character_words: If you wish to learn the ways of the Sun, you must learn them from the masters, Ran and Shaw.

full_text: [Cut to Aang and Zuko.] Ran and Shaw? There are two of them?
character_words: Ran and Shaw? There are two of them?

full_text: [Walks toward them and looks at Aang.] When you present yourself to them, they will examine you. [Turns to look at Zuko.] They'll read your hearts, your souls, and your ancestry. [Takes a step toward Zuko and towers over Zuko, who looks worried.] If they deem you worthy, they'll teach you. [Cut to a close-up of the chief.] If they don't, you'll be destroyed on the spot.
character_words: When you present yourself to them, they will examine you.  They'll read your hearts, your souls, and your ancestry.  If they deem you worthy, they'll teach you.  If they don't, you'll be destroyed on the spot.

full_text: The chief walks back, and Aang and Zuko look at each other. Scene changes to a building on the next day. Screen zooms to the top of the building.
character_words: NA

full_text: If you're going to see the masters, [Cut to an aerial shot of the Sun Warriors sitting in many arcs inside the room in front of the Eternal Flame. Aang, Zuko, and the Sun Warrior chief are standing.] you must bring them a piece of the Eternal Flame. [Cut to the chief standing in front of the fire from behind him.] This fire is the very first one. [Raises his hands to his head and turns back at Zuko and Aang.] It was given to man by the dragons. [Cut to the chief talking to Zuko and Aang from the side as the other Sun Warriors look.] We have kept it going for thousands of years.
character_words: If you're going to see the masters,  you must bring them a piece of the Eternal Flame.  This fire is the very first one.  It was given to man by the dragons.  We have kept it going for thousands of years.

full_text: [Surprised.] I don't believe it.
character_words: I don't believe it.

full_text: [Cut to the Sun Warriors sitting and the chief explaining their job to the two, as screen pans to the right.] You will each take a piece of it to the masters, to show your commitment to the sacred art of firebending.
character_words: You will each take a piece of it to the masters, to show your commitment to the sacred art of firebending.

full_text: [Cut to an unsure Aang as he places his palm on his neck.] Umm, Mister Sun Chief Sir‌, yeah, I'm not a firebender yet. [Pointing to Zuko.] Couldn't my friend here carry my fire for me?
character_words: Umm, Mister Sun Chief Sir‌, yeah, I'm not a firebender yet.  Couldn't my friend here carry my fire for me?

full_text: [Unyielding.] No. [He turns back to face the fire. Cut to Aang, who looks very uneasy, before cutting to the chief, who takes a part of the Eternal Flame on his hand and turns back toward the two.] This ritual illustrates [He turns around in a circle and splits the fire on his palm into two parts.] the essence of Sun Warrior philosophy. [Cut to Aang, as he stares at the flame.] You must maintain a constant heat. The flame will go out if you make it too small. [Aang cringes, as the screen pans to Zuko, who is standing beside Aang.] Make it too big, and you might lose control.
character_words: No.  This ritual illustrates  the essence of Sun Warrior philosophy.  You must maintain a constant heat. The flame will go out if you make it too small.  Make it too big, and you might lose control.

full_text: Zuko stares at the flame and brings his arms forward to take the flame. He looks at Aang, as shot cuts to the chief offering Aang the flame from the side.
character_words: NA

full_text: I'm sorry, I'm just a little nervous. [He takes the flame in his hand and his expression changes to a relieved one.] It's like a little heartbeat.
character_words: I'm sorry, I'm just a little nervous.  It's like a little heartbeat.

full_text: [Cut to the chief.] Fire is life, [Cut to Aang. Screen zooms in to his face as he smiles.] not just destruction. You will take your flames up there. [Cut to Zuko and Aang standing in front of the chief as he points to a mountain from the side. Screen zooms in to the mountain.] The cave of the masters is beneath that rock.
character_words: Fire is life,  not just destruction. You will take your flames up there.  The cave of the masters is beneath that rock.

full_text: Screen changes to Aang and Zuko walking through a steep forest, before changing to the steep surface. Cut to Zuko, who has reached the top of the steepness, turning back to look at Aang who is lagging behind.
character_words: NA

full_text: Hurry up.
character_words: Hurry up.

full_text: I can't. [Cut to Aang approaching a rock.] If I walk too fast, my flame will go out. [Climbs up the rock and looks at his flame.]
character_words: I can't.  If I walk too fast, my flame will go out.

full_text: Your flame's [Aang looks at Zuko.] gonna go out [Cut to Zuko from below.] because it's too small. You're too timid, give it more juice.
character_words: Your flame's  gonna go out  because it's too small. You're too timid, give it more juice.

full_text: [He climbs another rock.] But what if I can't control it?
character_words: But what if I can't control it?

full_text: [Cut to Zuko.] You can do it. I know you can. [Cut to an unsure Aang.] You're a talented kid.
character_words: You can do it. I know you can.  You're a talented kid.

full_text: Aang smiles at the compliment and climbs up another rock, reaching the top. Zuko starts walking and Aang follows him. Screen pans above to the top of the mountain. Scene changes to Zuko and Aang as the reach the top of the mountain, and see that warriors are already there, with the Sun Warrior chief, Ham Ghao, and another Sun Warrior standing. Screen zooms out to show two vertical rocks with a bridge in the center.
character_words: NA

full_text: [He and the other two Sun Warriors walk up to the two.] Facing the judgment of the firebending masters will be very dangerous for you. Your ancestors [Cut to Zuko.] are directly responsible for the dragons' disappearance. [Zuko looks toward the side.] The masters might not be so happy to see you.
character_words: Facing the judgment of the firebending masters will be very dangerous for you. Your ancestors  are directly responsible for the dragons' disappearance.  The masters might not be so happy to see you.

full_text: [He places his hand on his hip.] I know I wouldn't be.
character_words: I know I wouldn't be.

full_text: But once they find out I'm the Avatar ...
character_words: But once they find out I'm the Avatar ...

full_text: [Cut to the chief.] Have you forgotten that you vanished, allowing the Fire Nation to wreak havoc on the world‌? [Cut to a guilty Aang.] The decline of the dragons is your burden, too. [Aang looks toward the side.]
character_words: Have you forgotten that you vanished, allowing the Fire Nation to wreak havoc on the world‌?  The decline of the dragons is your burden, too.

full_text: Cut to an overhead shot of the chief rooting his staff on the ground. The other two Sun Warriors get into a kneeling position and the chief walks toward Zuko and Aang, takes a small portion of their flames and gives the flames to both of the Sun Warriors, who go to each of the sides. The chief turns back and walks. Cut to some Sun Warriors standing and sitting, alternately, as the two Warriors standing create a circle made of fire. Cut to Aang and Zuko watching the chief walk.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Turning to Zuko.] We could turn back now. We've already learned more about fire than we'd hoped. [Aang shows Zuko his flame and gives a weak smile.]
character_words: We could turn back now. We've already learned more about fire than we'd hoped.

full_text: No, we're seeing this through to the end. We're gonna meet these masters and find out [Cut to an overhead shot of Aang.] what's so great about them.
character_words: No, we're seeing this through to the end. We're gonna meet these masters and find out  what's so great about them.

full_text: [Looking toward the rocks.] What if they judge us, and attack us?
character_words: What if they judge us, and attack us?

full_text: [Cut to Zuko.] Well, we're the Fire Prince and the Avatar. [Unsheathes his swords slightly.] I think we could take these guys in a fight, whoever they are. [He smiles.]
character_words: Well, we're the Fire Prince and the Avatar.  I think we could take these guys in a fight, whoever they are.

full_text: Cut to Aang, who nods uneasily. Cut to the entire courtyard to show that all alternate Sun Warriors have made their fire circles. Zuko turns toward the Sun Warrior chief.
character_words: NA

full_text: Bring 'em out!
character_words: Bring 'em out!

full_text: [Cut to the chief to show him stretching his both hands out on both sides.] Chanters!
character_words: Chanters!

full_text:
Cut to an aerial shot of the courtyard as the chanters play the music. Cut to the Sun Warriors, who are sitting down, beating their drums in a synchronized rhythm. Cut to the other Sun Warriors holding the fire circle in their crouched positions. Cut to the Warriors, as Zuko and Aang walk toward the stairs. Cut to the other side of the circle to show the Warriors alternatively rising and bowing. Cut to an overhead shot of the two nearing the steps. Cut to a shot of the stairs as screen slowly pans below. Cut to the chief and the other two Warriors, as they step aside to let Zuko and Aang pass.
Zuko and Aang look at each other and take a deep breath before climbing. Cut to the warriors, who are still beating the drums and holding the fire circle. Cut to Zuko and Aang climbing the steps. Aang looks back, but continues forward. Shot cuts to them climbing from the side, before cutting to the chief and the two warriors beside him looking at them, with the screen zooming out. Cut to Zuko and Aang, who reach the top as the setting sun shines at them. The music stops playing as soon as they reach the top. Both of them look at the caves on each side of the bridge.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Cut to a Sun Warrior using an sound-amplifying device.] Those who wish to meet the masters, Ran and Shaw, will now present their fire.
character_words: Those who wish to meet the masters, Ran and Shaw, will now present their fire.

full_text: Aang and Zuko turn toward the caves and bow down with their hands stretched toward the caves. Screen zooms out to show them in this posture.
character_words: NA

full_text: Sound the call!
character_words: Sound the call!

full_text: A warrior takes a deep breath and blows a horn. The sound from the horn sends a flock of birds scattering. The cave Aang is facing rumbles, causing him to tremble. Aang accidentally places his hand down, extinguishing his flame.
character_words: NA

full_text: What's happening‌? [He looks to look at Zuko, who turns his head toward Aang. Aang cringes and quickly returns back to his position, and realizes that his flame is extinguished and gasps. He turns toward Zuko again, and whispers.] Zuko, my fire went out.
character_words: What's happening‌?  Zuko, my fire went out.

full_text: [Whispering.] What do you want me to do‌?
character_words: What do you want me to do‌?

full_text: Give me some of yours. [He reaches for Zuko's flame and Zuko pushes him behind.]
character_words: Give me some of yours.

full_text: [Whispering.] No, just make your own.
character_words: No, just make your own.

full_text: [Whispering as well.] I can't. [He reaches for Zuko's flame again.]
character_words: I can't.

full_text: [Cut to an aerial shot of the bridge.] Get some from those warriors. [Cut to the chief and the two Warriors beside him.] Hurry! [Cuts to shot of the Sun Warriors below; off-screen.] Stop cheating off me!
character_words: Get some from those warriors.  Hurry!  Stop cheating off me!

full_text: The chief and Ham Ghao look at each other.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Off-screen.] Quit being stingy!
character_words: Quit being stingy!

full_text: Shot cuts to Aang trying to reach for Zuko's flame; he is unable to do so as Zuko raises his hand high up in the air. Aang continues his attempt to get Zuko's flame but Zuko stretches his arms away. Aang pulls Zuko's arm down, extinguishing the flame. They both look at each other. Cut to the two from inside the caves as the ground rumbles. Cut to the two with a worried expression. They turn to look at the other cave as screen zooms in to the cave.
character_words: NA

full_text: Uh oh.
character_words: Uh oh.

full_text: Two eyes glow inside a cave and a red dragon comes out, roaring, circling around the bridge. Cut to the boys, who take a step back. Cut to Zuko, who looks at the dragon. Cut to a blue dragon coming out of the other cave. It joins the other dragon as they circle the bridge.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Cut to Zuko and Aang standing.] These are the masters.
character_words: These are the masters.

full_text: [In a low voice.] Still think we can take 'em?
character_words: Still think we can take 'em?

full_text: Sshh. I never said that.
character_words: Sshh. I never said that.

full_text: Cut to the dragons circling the bridge from below. Screen pans down to the warriors as they bow down. Cut to Ham Ghao and the chief.
character_words: NA

full_text: Oh, here it comes. [Looks up at the bridge.] Any moment now. Dinner for the masters.
character_words: Oh, here it comes.  Any moment now. Dinner for the masters.

full_text: [Turns toward Ham Ghao.] Quiet, Ham Ghao!
character_words: Quiet, Ham Ghao!

full_text: What? [Turns his head away.] Everyone's thinking it.
character_words: What?  Everyone's thinking it.

full_text: Cut to the bridge where the dragons are still flying around the bridge. Cut to Aang, who looks at them flying.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Whispers.] Zuko, I think we're supposed to do the Dragon Dance with them.
character_words: Zuko, I think we're supposed to do the Dragon Dance with them.

full_text: [Turning his head toward Zuko.] What‌? What about this situation makes you think they want us to dance‌?
character_words: What‌? What about this situation makes you think they want us to dance‌?

full_text: Well, I think they want us to do something. Let's just try it.
character_words: Well, I think they want us to do something. Let's just try it.

full_text: [Unwillingly.] Fine.
character_words: Fine.

full_text: Aang and Zuko get into the first posture of the Dancing Dragon and change their postures to the next. Cut to Aang spreading his arms out as the blue dragon flies behind him following the shape of his arms. Aang turns his arms to his side as the dragon turns as well. Screen zooms out to show the dragons performing the same movements as each other. Cut to Zuko, who pushes his hand up as the red dragon behind him goes up as well. Zuko dips and the dragon dives down accordingly. Cut to the dragons flying above the bridge as screen pans below to show the two performing the Dancing Dragon. Cut to them performing the final move. They look to either side as shot cuts to show that the dragons have stopped moving and are hovering on either side of the bridge.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Still bowing.] Judgment time.
character_words: Judgment time.

full_text: Cut to the blue dragon which stares at Zuko, as Aang trembles. Zuko looks at it, with his mouth wide open. Cut to Aang trembles, as shot cuts to the two dragons sitting, with their legs at the bottom of the bridge. Cut to the red dragon as it breathes fire at the two. Cut to the blue dragon doing the same. Cut to Zuko and Aang yelling and covering their faces as they are engulfed by a multi-colored flame vortex. Cut to the top of the vortex from inside it. It slowly pans down to the boys who look at it, shocked. Cut to the bridge as the dragons continue breathing fire. Screen pans above to the flame vortex. Cut to the inside of the vortex and the two stare at the scene in awe. Cut to Aang's eyes.
character_words: NA

full_text: Wow.
character_words: Wow.

full_text: [Cut to Zuko's face, as he stares at the flames.] I understand.
character_words: I understand.

full_text: The vortex slowly dissipates and the dragons curl their bodies, fly up, circle one time and go into their caves. Cut to the boys who still remain on the bridge. Cut to an annoyed Ham Ghao, before cutting to one of the warriors holding the circle of fire as he moves his arm in a circle, and extinguishes the flame and ending his hands in a position. Cut to an aerial shot of Zuko and Aang descending from the steps.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Cut to Zuko.] Their fire was beautiful. I saw so many colors, colors I've never imagined.
character_words: Their fire was beautiful. I saw so many colors, colors I've never imagined.

full_text: [Cut to the two descending from the side.] Like firebending harmony.
character_words: Like firebending harmony.

full_text: Yes. They judged you, and gave you visions of the meaning of firebending. [The other two Sun Warriors walk away.]
character_words: Yes. They judged you, and gave you visions of the meaning of firebending.

full_text: [Cut to Zuko.] I can't believe there are still living dragons. My uncle Iroh said he faced the last dragon and killed it.
character_words: I can't believe there are still living dragons. My uncle Iroh said he faced the last dragon and killed it.

full_text: [Looking at Zuko.] So your uncle lied.
character_words: So your uncle lied.

full_text: [Cut to the smiling chief from the side.] Actually, it wasn't a total lie. Iroh was the last outsider to face the masters. [Raising his hand above slightly.] They deemed him worthy and passed the secret onto him as well.
character_words: Actually, it wasn't a total lie. Iroh was the last outsider to face the masters.  They deemed him worthy and passed the secret onto him as well.

full_text: [Surprised. Shot cuts to an aerial shot of the courtyard.] He must have lied to protect them, so no one else would hunt them.
character_words: He must have lied to protect them, so no one else would hunt them.

full_text: [Cut to Aang.] All this time, I thought firebending was destruction. Since I hurt Katara, I've been too afraid and hesitant. But now I know what it really is ... it's energy, and life. [He smiles.]
character_words: All this time, I thought firebending was destruction. Since I hurt Katara, I've been too afraid and hesitant. But now I know what it really is ... it's energy, and life.

full_text: Yeah. It's like the Sun, [He curls his hand into a fist.] but inside of you. Do you guys realize this?
character_words: Yeah. It's like the Sun,  but inside of you. Do you guys realize this?

full_text: [Smiling.] Well, our civilization is called the Sun Warriors ... so yeah.
character_words: Well, our civilization is called the Sun Warriors ... so yeah.

full_text: That's why my firebending was so weak before. Because for so many years, hunting you [Turns toward Aang as screen zooms out to show Aang.] was my drive ... it was my purpose. [Aang turns toward Zuko as well.] So when I joined you, I lost sight of my inner fire. But now, I have a new drive. [Cut to Zuko's face as screen zooms in.] I have to help you defeat my father and restore balance to the world.
character_words: That's why my firebending was so weak before. Because for so many years, hunting you  was my drive ... it was my purpose.  So when I joined you, I lost sight of my inner fire. But now, I have a new drive.  I have to help you defeat my father and restore balance to the world.

full_text: Zuko delivers two fire blasts more powerful than in the Western Air Temple. Aang also bends a similar blast. Cut to Aang's face, as he grins at his success. Cut to both of them, who walk toward each other, smiling.
character_words: NA

full_text: [He walks toward the two and become serious.] Now that you have learned the secrets, and you know about our tribe's existence, [He stops walking.] we have no choice but to imprison you here forever. [Cut to the two, who are shocked, before cutting back to the smiling chief.] Just kidding. [Cut to the two as they look relieved. The chief's expression becomes serious again.] But seriously, don't tell anyone!
character_words: Now that you have learned the secrets, and you know about our tribe's existence,  we have no choice but to imprison you here forever.  Just kidding.  But seriously, don't tell anyone!

full_text: Scene changes to the upside-down pagodas in the Western Air Temple.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Cut to Aang and Zuko demonstrating the Dancing Dragon to the rest of Team Avatar and friends.] With this technique the dragons showed us, Zuko and I will be unstoppable.
character_words: With this technique the dragons showed us, Zuko and I will be unstoppable.

full_text: The two get into their final postures and Team Avatar applauds.
character_words: NA

full_text: Yeah, that's a great dance you two learned there.
character_words: Yeah, that's a great dance you two learned there.

full_text: It's not a dance. It's a firebending form.
character_words: It's not a dance. It's a firebending form.

full_text: [Cut to Sokka, as he moves his fingers in a dancing manner.] We'll just tap-dance our way to victory over the Fire Lord.
character_words: We'll just tap-dance our way to victory over the Fire Lord.

full_text: [Walks toward Sokka.] It's a sacred form that happens to be thousands of years old!
character_words: It's a sacred form that happens to be thousands of years old!

full_text: Oh, yeah‌? What's your little form called‌?
character_words: Oh, yeah‌? What's your little form called‌?

full_text: [Embarrassed.] The Dancing Dragon.
character_words: The Dancing Dragon.

full_text: Team Avatar laughs, and the shot cuts to Zuko who shuts his eyes and cringes in embarrassment. Fade to credits.
character_words: NA

full_text: The scene opens to the Western Air Temple at nightfall. Zuko is pouring tea to give to the members of Team Avatar.
character_words: NA

full_text: [Cut to a tray full of tea cups with Zuko's hand holding a kettle and filling up the empty cups.] No one can make tea like Uncle [Camera pans up to Zuko's face.], but hopefully I learned a thing or two. Would you like to hear Uncle's favorite tea joke?
character_words: No one can make tea like Uncle , but hopefully I learned a thing or two. Would you like to hear Uncle's favorite tea joke?

full_text: Sure. [Cut to an overhead of the group sitting around a fire.]
character_words: Sure.
